1a1(mdo sde): @#/ /mdo cha pa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya g+ha na byU ha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
1b2(mdo sde): pa rgyan stug po bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang
1b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
1b4(mdo sde): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba 'dod pa dang / gzugs
2a1(mdo sde): dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams las 'das te /
2a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po na stobs mnga' ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis rnam par
2a3(mdo sde): 'phrul zhing rjes su spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor dam pa'i rnal 'byor
2a4(mdo sde): can 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mur 'dug byed pa thams cad kyi gzhung rnam par
2a5(mdo sde): 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
2b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / byang chub
2b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen
2b3(mdo sde): po brnyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
2b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying
2b5(mdo sde): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba bye ba snyed kyi byang chub
3a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pa'i yul las yongs su 'das pa/ sems dang /
3a2(mdo sde): yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi'i spyod yul las yongs su 'das pa/ ye shes dang yid kyi lus su gnas gyur
3a3(mdo sde): pa| sgyu ma lta bu dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dang / chos kyi sprin gyi sa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas du ma'i phyag gi
3a4(mdo sde): dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ khams gsum pa'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'i gzhal med khang gi pad+mo chen po la
3a5(mdo sde): 'khod pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de na mur 'dug dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyu
3a6(mdo sde): ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'i
3b1(mdo sde): c hos la bde bar spyod pa bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i spyod yul btsun par dbyangs 'byin pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs du ma ston
3b2(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs so/ /bzhengs nas kyang pho brang 'ja' dang glog gi 'od can rgyan dang / lta ba lhub du mas brgyan pa nas mngon par byung ste/ zla ba dri ma med
3b3(mdo sde): pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i khang steng du gshegs so/ /gshegs nas kyang stug po'i ris kyi rgyan seng+ge'i gdan dam pa la byang chub sems dpa' dang thabs gcig tu
3b4(mdo sde): bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir gzigs te gtsug gi rin chen 'od kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po'i 'od zer
3b5(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya'i 'khor can smin mtshams nas byung ste/ 'od zer gyi tshogs de byung bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gcig dang 'dra bar
3b6(mdo sde): yongs su snang bar gyur to/ /mchog tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rang bzhin phra ba nyid kyang yongs su snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
3b7(mdo sde): stug po'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi rang bzhin rdul gyi phra ba nyid las 'das te gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po ni 'od dang / gza' dang / zla ba spangs pa ste/
4a1(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi phra ba nyid du mi snang gi /gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa dang / nam mkha'
4a2(mdo sde): dang ma brtags par 'gog pa lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
4a3(mdo sde): zhing gzhan dag na spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gzigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /
4a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu phyung ba de dag gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas
4a5(mdo sde): pa la gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa la bka' stsal pa/ rnam
4a6(mdo sde): par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ stug po'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang /
4a7(mdo sde): 'du shes med pa'i sems can du gtogs pa'i gzugs sred pa dang / ma rig pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu ye shes kyi mes rnam par bsregs te gnas
4b1(mdo sde): gyur pa'i phyir ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yid bzhin gyi lus stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gis brgyan pa/ gseb med
4b2(mdo sde): pa| ring du gnas pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / 'ja' dang / byu ru dang / ba bla dang / ldong ros dang / mtshal dang / mgo nag gi 'bru dang / king+shu
4b3(mdo sde): ka dang / in+d+ra go pa dang / gser dang / tsam+pa ka dang / pad+mo dang / dung dang / rma bya'i mgul dang / mdongs bu me long gi nang na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu thob
4b4(mdo sde): nas/ sa dang sar zag pa med pas sbyangs pa'i rgyu ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir smon lam gyi mthar phyin pa bcu'i bsngo bas lus thob pa'i khyad par can dag
4b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'ong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
4b6(mdo sde): ston pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
4b7(mdo sde): bas phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
5a1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o/ /bcom
5a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
5a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas sems mgu bar bya'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig /de
5a4(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs
5a5(mdo sde): phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs
5a6(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang de bzhin nam ci lags/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi
5a7(mdo sde): zhing stug po 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can las 'das te gnas pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
5b1(mdo sde): dag kyang yod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas pha rol la shin tu'ang pha rol sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das pa'i steng gi phyogs cha na tshangs pa'i dbyangs de bzhin
5b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dang / skar ma'i rgyal po de
5b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
5b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi pha rol shin tu'ang pha rol tu 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgya mang po byang chub sems
5b5(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs kyis brgyan pa shin tu yangs shing che ba dag yod de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'khor gyi tshogs de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'
5b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams la bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi gtam dang / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i chos tshig
5b7(mdo sde): dang rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / yi ge dang bral ba de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'dug
6a1(mdo sde): par ston/ de ni rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston te/ de ni gang rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa khyod
6a2(mdo sde): kyis 'di'i pha rol na 'jig rten gzhan dang sangs rgyas dag yod dam zhes smras pa de'i lan du ngas 'di smras so/ /rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
6a3(mdo sde): ston pa khyod 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dri bar sems par ma
6a4(mdo sde): zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin 'di'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas
6a5(mdo sde): kyi sgra'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug tshad med pa la ltad mo blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyar song nas sangs rgyas
6a6(mdo sde): k yi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog gis gyen du song yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shugs 'dzin 'dis de bzhin gshegs
6a7(mdo sde): pa gcig tsam gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan tam/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ram/ spyi gtsug tshad med pa'ang ma mthong ste/ des ma mthong
6b1(mdo sde): ba dang / ngo mtshar du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / spyi gtsug ltar tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang dag par rjes su dran zhing mi
6b2(mdo sde): mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du phyin nas mnyan du yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas sangs
6b3(mdo sde): rgyas rnams nam mkha' dang mnyam par shes te mngon par bstod nas/ bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul la mngon par
6b4(mdo sde): mos shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po nyid du song ste gnas par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po sa dang sa'i mtshan nyid
6b5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa phra ba dang / dmigs su phebs pa dang / rnam par gdon mi za ba'i gtam zlos pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo
6b6(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
6b7(mdo sde): 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs gcig bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan
7a1(mdo sde): pa'i slad du skabs dbye bar gnang na bdag gis zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i snying po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
7a2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dris shig dang / ngas ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de'i dri ba dris pa lung bstan pas sems mgu bar
7a3(mdo sde): bya'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la bcom
7a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba dang / 'tshang rgya
7a5(mdo sde): bar bgyi ba zhes bya ba'i don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ don dam pa 'phags pa'i yul chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs ston pa 'das pa dang / ma
7a6(mdo sde): 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i spyod pa'i sa la spyod pa dang / gzugs dang / mtshan nyid dang / yang dag par bsdu ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams dang / mur
7a7(mdo sde): 'dug gzhan gyi smra ba la mngon par chags pa'i blo'i spyod yul la spyod pa rnams dang / rdul dang / gces pa dang / dbang po dang / phyogs dang / dus dang /
7b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang / bdag dang / yid dang / dbang po dang / don nye bar 'du ba'i lta bar ltung ba rnams kyi blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ bde bar
7b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ bstan du gsol/ ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / las dang / mig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / de la skye ba'i yid la byed pa dang / gsum
7b3(mdo sde): 'du ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa can dang / rgyu dang / de ma thag pa dang / dbang dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags par spyod pa
7b4(mdo sde): dang / yod pa dang / med par smra ba'i rtog pa can dang / chos 'di pa'i phung po dang / gang zag stong pa nyid du lta bar lhung ba rnams kyi'ang blo rnam par bzlog pa'i slad
7b5(mdo sde): du| bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ chos kyi dbang po thob par 'gyur gyi/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bstan du gsol/ /rnam shes lnga yi rgyu la sogs/ /mnga'
7b6(mdo sde): bdag dam pa ma gtogs par/ /sangs rgyas blo dang shes bya dang / /ji ltar gang gis 'tshang rgya zhing / /shes bya rnam pa lnga po rnams/ /thugs su chud pa sangs
7b7(mdo sde): rgyas te/ /chos rnams thams cad mkhyen pas na/ /mya ngan 'das dang mnyam gshegs pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge'o/ /rdo rje'i snying po/ sa bcu la
8a1(mdo sde): dbang ba/ rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/ mkhas pa chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs grags par byed pa dge'o/ /rnal 'byor dam pa la dbang
8a2(mdo sde): pa/ sangs rgyas dang 'tshang rgya bar yongs su dri ba 'di la ni khyod 'ba' zhig ltad mo byung ba ma yin gyi/ sgyu ma byed pa bzang po dang / rgyal ba'i bu gzhan dag kyang don 'di la ltad
8a3(mdo sde): mo byung zhing sangs rgyas kyi dngos po 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don 'di ci zhig /ci gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ 'on te gzugs las gzhan
8a4(mdo sde): zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed las kyang ste/ nang dang phyi'i mnyam pa nyid kyang mi mthong zhing byas pa'i rgyu dang
8a5(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i chos can gyi phyir phung po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa med de/ rdul phra mo med pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir shes rab dang / ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod
8a6(mdo sde): yul te/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i thugs kyi yang dag par rjes su ma gzigs shing / phung po rnams skyes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku yin pas na rtag pa
8a7(mdo sde): nyid do snyam mo/ /kye rgyal ba'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings kyi shin tu phye ba la mkhas pa de dge'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i bu/ /de bas na dge bar shin tu nyon te yid la gyis shig dang ngas khyod
8b1(mdo sde): bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dge'o zhes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das las phyir nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de
8b2(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rdo rje lta bu'i snying po ting nge 'dzin la dbang pa rdo rje'i snying po phung po rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin/ phung po las gzhan na yang med
8b3(mdo sde): de| phung po la gnas pa'ang ma yin/ phung po'ang gnas ma yin/ skye ba dang 'jig pa'ang gnas ma yin/ shes par bya ba'ang ma yin/ shes pa'ang ma yin/ don kyang ma
8b4(mdo sde): yin| dbang po rnams kyang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / yul rnams ni ma no bsam med pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
8b5(mdo sde): ni 'di rnams las nang dam phyir yang mi blta'o/ /gzugs ni spyod pa med cing sems med pa ste/ 'byung ba med pa'i chos can/ mthar 'jig pa/ rtswa dang shing dang por rdo
8b6(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba/ shin tu phra ba'i rdul gyi tshogs dbu ba dang 'dra ba'o/ /tshor ba ni gnyis tshogs pa las chu'i chu bur dang 'dra bar skye'o/ /'du shes ni bum pa dang / snam bu dang /
8b7(mdo sde): cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ de'ang gnyis las skyes pa'i smig rgyu dang 'dra ba ste/ dper na/ dpyid kyis mngon par gdungs pa'i sa la nyi ma'i 'od zer bab
9a1(mdo sde): p a gyen du langs pa rnams chu'i rlabs lta bur rlab cing ri dwags dang bya skom gyis nyen cing chu 'tshol ba rnams la chur rmongs par bya bas
9a2(mdo sde): rmongs par byed do/ /de bzhin du 'du shes kyang de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa/ de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i gzugs su 'jug pa/ yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su
9a3(mdo sde): brtags pa las skyes pa/ dpyod pa rnams kyis brjod pa las logs shig tu mi dmigs pa/ /bong bu'i rwa dang / mo gsham gyi bu brjod pa ltar ming tsam du zad
9a4(mdo sde): pa ste/ rmi lam gyi gzugs brjod pa ltar blta'o/ /dper na/ rmi lam na gzugs kyi 'du shes mthong ba sad pa'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa dang / bud med bzang
9a5(mdo sde): mo'ang dmigs su med do/ /de bzhin du mi shes pas log pa na bud med dang skyes pa la sogs pa mthong ba'ang mngon par sangs rgyas na mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams
9a6(mdo sde): ni chu shing gi snying po lta bu ste btsal na/ lus dang ngag dang yid las byung ba gzugs med pa rnams rnal 'byor can gyi dpyod pa pa rnams kyis mi rnyed do/ /rnam par
9a7(mdo sde): shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu de'i bdag nyid med pa ste/ sgyu ma byed pa'am/ de'i slob mas nan tan du rtswa dang shing dang bong rdo tsam la brten te/ gzugs kyi yan lag du ma
9b1(mdo sde): las mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sgyu ma'i gzugs glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / mi dang / rgyan ma brtags pa'i gzugs kyi phyogs gcig ngo mtshar du bstan pa lta bu dang /
9b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang mkhas pa rnams la ma yin gyi/ bus pa'i 'gro ba rnams la 'drid pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'ang rnam pa gzhan du 'dug la/ rnam pa gzhan du shin tu
9b3(mdo sde): brtags shing shin tu rtog ste/ de'ang bdag nyid kyis bdag la 'dzin pa gnyis su shes nas/ sgyu mas mngon par grub pa'i gzugs gcig po'i ngo mtshar dang 'dra bar phyir
9b4(mdo sde): ldog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa/ brtan pa/ ther zug /mi 'jig pa ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi yul yin te/ de bzhin
9b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bsgrags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang / nam mkha' lta bur mi 'jig pa ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig gis
9b6(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / byung ba dang / 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung /
9b7(mdo sde): chos rnams kyi chos nyid chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa gnyis pa 'di ni de bzhin gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje'i snying po/ skyon med pa zhes bya
10a1(mdo sde): ba ni yang 'byung ba'i nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /rdo rje'i snying po/ /skyon med pa ni nyes pa thams cad dang bral bar ma zad kyi ting nge 'dzin
10a2(mdo sde): la'ang 'jug go/ /skyon med par 'da' ba ni byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de nyid du myos te/ sems can la
10a3(mdo sde): lta ba med par gyur cing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas lcags bsregs pa'i me dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur te/ de sems can gyi dgos pa
10a4(mdo sde): la brtson 'grus btang zhing snying rje chen po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi gdung rnam par chad par byed cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
10a5(mdo sde): mur 'dug byed pa'i lam du 'gro ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dam du glang po che chen po 'dra bar rnam par thogs te/ rnam par shes pa'i yul rab tu zhum pas sangs
10a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos kyi skye mched thams cad kyis kun nas mi gnas shing rdzogs par mi byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon du mi bya zhing / ma reg pa dang / nye bar mi
10a7(mdo sde): bsgrub par gnas par bya'o/ /de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i rjes su zhugs ste sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid shes pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sangs rgyas rnam
10b1(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi yul la nye bar spyod pa/ sprul pa'i yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba'i sbyor ba/ sa brgyad pa las
10b2(mdo sde): 'das pa/ chos kyi sprin gyi sa la shes par rab tu byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid myong nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi so so rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i ye
10b3(mdo sde): shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul gyi sar zhugs te thams cad du 'gro ba ma g.yos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ rtag pa/ ther zug pa/ brtan pa sangs rgyas
10b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing stug po na gnas par 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sa la dbang ba rnams la 'phrul pa'i 'jug pa ston par 'gyur te/ gnas gyur pa/ yid bzhin gyi ye shes dang ting nge
10b5(mdo sde): 'dzin can/ stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang la spyod pa/ ngang pa'i rgyal po dang 'dra bar ma zhugs pa'i chu'i zla ba lta bur 'gro ste/ blta ba'i
10b6(mdo sde): don yod pa/ mi'i bdag po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi 'khor du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa'i gzugs dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bstan
10b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po thams cad dang / dbang sgyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
11a1(mdo sde): chen po nor bu rin po che'i snying po la sogs pa'i gnas dag tu bde ba rnams myong bar byas te/ sa'i rim pa rnams bstan nas zhing nas
11a2(mdo sde): zhing du phun sum bde ba rnams rab tu ston cing phyi ma'i mthar thug par bsku ba grub pa'i sngags 'chang ltar mi snang zhing / khang khyim gyi lha ltar de na gnas bzhin du
11a3(mdo sde): mi snang ba'i gzugs su khyim na 'dug pa ltar de dag sprul pa'i 'od zer dang / 'phrul bas sprul pa la spyod cing 'gro'o/ /song nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul
11a4(mdo sde): pa'i sku nub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la zhen nas gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /dbang po
11a5(mdo sde): phung po sprul yin te/ /sred dang ma rig las kyang yin/ /bag chags kyis bcings mi bzad pa/ /yul dang dbang po'i rgyu las byung / /rnam dpyod tshogs ni 'dod
11a6(mdo sde): chags rnams/ /zhags pa sems bskyed de yin no/ /khro ba me lce mnyam pa ste/ /zhe sdang dug gi dngos po yin/ /thub spyod rnal 'byor bzang can gyis/ /'di dag
11a7(mdo sde): rtag tu rnam gzhigs te/ /phung po rnams ni dor ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rnal 'byor spyod/ /gzugs ni 'byung ba'i tshogs yin te/ /phung po lhag ma gzugs
11b1(mdo sde): med pa/ /ji bzhin par snang ri mo dang / /grib la sdong dum la sogs med/ /mkha' la rlung gzugs mi snang dang / /bya yi rjes rnams ji bzhin ni/ /mkhas pas so so
11b2(mdo sde): rang rig pa/ /yang dag nyid dang yang dag mtha'/ /tshig gi spyod yul 'das pa ni/ /sangs rgyas dngos po mi snang ste/ /sangs rgyas sgras ni mya ngan 'das/ /mya ngan las 'das kyang
11b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas te/ /rnam rtog rtog dang bral bas na/ /de ni bstan du mi nus pa'o/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa ste/ /yod dang med kyis rnam par spangs/ /rngo ba phye mar btags pa
11b4(mdo sde): la| |gser ni yod par mi snang ste/ /sbyang ba'i las kyi khyad par gyis/ /gser ni snang bar 'gyur pa yin/ /gzugs rnams rdul du rnam gzhigs te/ /mkhas pas phung po
11b5(mdo sde): lhag ma dang / /khams dang skye mched tshogs rnams dang / /rnam par shes dang dbang po dag /gcig dang tha dad dngos po yang / /rdul phran rnam par rab sbyangs na/ /dngos
11b6(mdo sde): por sangs rgyas yod pa min/ /sangs rgyas med pa'ang ma yin te/ /rnal 'byor can rnams sangs rgyas mthong / /mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can/ /gang na sdug bsngal
11b7(mdo sde): de na bde/ /de nyid la ni snang ba yin/ /sangs rgyas med ces mi bya ste/ /sangs rgyas mnyam par bzhag pa yod/ /rgyu yi sangs rgyas dge ba can/ /rtsa ba mkhas pa nyid kyang
12a1(mdo sde): ste| |'jig rten kun gyi rgyal ba dang / /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /'di dag sangs rgyas lngar gsungs so/ /sprul pa'i rgyal ba lhag
12a2(mdo sde): ma rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod/ /mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can/ /de bas sangs rgyas yod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor can gyi thub pas mthong / khams
12a3(mdo sde): rnams gsum po 'das pa dang / /rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas shing / /de bzhin gshegs kyi lha rdzas zhing / /rgyal sras bzang pos kun tu gang / /de na thub chen sangs
12a4(mdo sde): rgyas bzhugs/ /mtshan gyis kun nas yongs su rgyas/ /rnal 'byor rnal la mnyam par bzhag /chos dang bcas su rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin phan tshun bsam gtan
12a5(mdo sde): mdzad/ /shes rab ma shes shes byed la/ /stug po de na rnam par spyod/ /stug po de yi sems can su/ /sangs rgyas gzugs can de dag kun/ /skad cig 'jig
12a6(mdo sde): par shin tu 'das/ /ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mos/ /dga' ldan nas babs 'phrul ba gang / /rtog pa can rnams kun gyis mthong / /stug po nas gshegs glang po
12a7(mdo sde): ste/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni stug na bzhugs/ /sna tshogs rnam mang gzugs tshul te/ /sems can bsam bzhin zhugs pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam
12b1(mdo sde): bzhag pa/ /chu yi zla ba bzhin du snang / /sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu ni/ /tshon gyi 'byor las rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas stug zhing na/ /mnyam par bzhag
12b2(mdo sde): pas rnam par mdzes/ /thams cad chos la gzugs brnyan ltar/ /gcig dang tha dad spangs par te/ /dgos pa kun la 'jug pa ni/ /skyes bu dam pa thams cad
12b3(mdo sde): mkhyen/ /rdul las ma yin dus las min/ /dbang po las min gces las min/ /rkyen gyis ma yin 'jig rten dang / /sangs rgyas ldan par rnam mdzes pa/ /
12b4(mdo sde): rgyu yi tshul du sangs rgyas ni/ /'bras bu rnams la rnam par mdzes/ /'jig rten sku la 'khod bya ste/ /rgya mtsho ri dang shing dag dang / /de la 'gro ba sna tshogs
12b5(mdo sde): bcas/ /mnyam par bzhag pas shin tu dgyes/ /bye ba thams cad phyi nang du/ /gza' zla la sogs mdzes pa'i rnams/ /phyir yang phyag gi mthil bkod de/ /yungs
12b6(mdo sde): 'brur 'gro ba kun 'dzud ba/ /sangs rgyas thub pa'i rnal 'byor mnga'/ /thub chen thub pa'i dam pa'o/ /'jig rten rnams la byed pa med/ /sangs rgyas 'phrul gyis sprul
12b7(mdo sde): pa ste/ /'byung ba gsum po 'di dag kun/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par sprul/ /rab rib mi shes myos ldongs pa'i/ /rtog pa can rnams 'phyan pa yin/ /bdag dang
13a1(mdo sde): bdag med lta ba'i rnams/ /yod dang med pa'i smra bas bcom/ /'on tam thams cad 'jig pa dang / /cung zad 'jig pas smra ba rnams/ /
13a2(mdo sde): 'di la med dam cung zad dam/ /bdag dang bdag med ga la yod/ /sangs rgyas sna tshogs 'byung kun na/ /rnal 'byor mkhan po rnam par mdzes/ /dri za'i grong
13a3(mdo sde): la bya ba rnams/ /ji ltar snang ba 'jig rten na/ /rmi lam rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /ri dwags rnams la smig rgyu bzhin/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sna tshogs dag /
13a4(mdo sde): gdeg la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang / /rlung ldan gsog pa'i thag pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mkhyen gyi mchog /mi la 'khrul 'khor bskor ba ste/ /
13a5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i skya ba 'dzin pa 'dra/ /stug po'i ris kyi ye shes kyi rgyan las byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
13a6(mdo sde): pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs
13a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
13b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong pa rnams dang / 'phags pa spong ba rnams dang / mnar med pa la gzhol pa rnams
13b2(mdo sde): dang / ma dang pha la snying ring ba rnams dang / tshangs pa 'gums pa rnams dang / ba lang dang / dgum pa 'gums pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar
13b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ji ltar yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/
13b4(mdo sde): sbyin pa gnyis byin pa'i sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur te/ de 'di ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa'o/ /chos kyi
13b5(mdo sde): sbyin pas ni skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /zang zing gi sbyin pas ni sems can thams cad la phan btags par 'gyur ro/ /zang zing gi sbyin pas ni bkres pa dang / skom pa'i
13b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal yongs su sbyong ngo / /chos kyi sbyin pas ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las
13b7(mdo sde): yongs su 'grol to/ /'jam dpal/ sbyin pa gnyis po 'di byin na sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang sbyin pa lngas sbyin pa
14a1(mdo sde): dang nye ba'i sbyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bzhon pa sbyin pa dang / gdugs sbyin pa dang / dar sbyin pa
14a2(mdo sde): dang / gos sbyin pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa rnams kyis sdug bsngal thams cad
14a3(mdo sde): yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ yang sems can la la mtshams med pa lnga dag gam/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dag gam/ 'phags pa spong ba dag
14a4(mdo sde): gam/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba dag gam/ bskal bar gnas pa dag gam/ sems can gang la la dkon mchog gsum la snying ring pa'am/ sangs rgyas dang
14a5(mdo sde): chos dang dge 'dun la gnod par byed pa'am/ tshogs kyi nor la 'phrog pa dag gam/ chung du na lug gsod pa dag kyang rung / phyag dar ba'ang rung / sme sha can yang
14a6(mdo sde): rung ste/ 'jam dpal/ /sus shin tu rgyas pa chen po rmad du byung ba'i chos stug po'i rgyan rin po che 'di thos pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa
14a7(mdo sde): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / chung du na yi ge gcig kyang rung ste brjod pa dang / su'ang chos de
14b1(mdo sde): smra ba la mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / nang par langs nas ngo phrad par byed cing lta bar sngar smra ba sbyin par byed pa dang / lag pas reg par byed pa'i sems can de dag
14b2(mdo sde): thams cad/ 'jam dpal/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar
14b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ sa'i phyogs gang na chos smra ba 'dug gam/ de'i dur ram/ /ro'am/ ro bam pa zhig yod la/ de'i ngo mthong na'ang mtshams med pa'i las lnga
14b4(mdo sde): rnams byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yi dwags lto dpag tshad brgya stong du mar skyes pa yod de/ yi dwags de bdag gi las kyi sdug
14b5(mdo sde): bsngal mi bzad pa'i tshor ba yod do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du sems can su mdo sde chen po rin po che 'di spong ba de dag kyang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur
14b6(mdo sde): ro| |'jam dpal/ sus mdo sde rin po che 'di rim gror byas te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
14b7(mdo sde): chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan gyis mchod pa dang / chos smra ba de'ang mchod par bya ste/ ci ste chos smra ba de mtshams med pa lnga
15a1(mdo sde): byed na'ang 'on kyang de'i sems 'khrugs par mi bya'o/ /chung ngu na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dwags dang / bya gang la las chos
15a2(mdo sde): smra ba de shi ba'i ro bam pa dur khrod na 'dug pa'i sha zos kyang de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang
15a3(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ri dwags dang bya gzhan po de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po 'di nyid du 'thob par 'gyur te/ de la nem nur dang / the tshom dang /
15a4(mdo sde): yid gnyis mi bya'o/ /sems can gang la la sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpas yongs su bzung ba/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa
15a5(mdo sde): bon las yongs su ma nyams pa de dag thams cad phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde rin po che 'di thos par 'gyur ro/ /thos nas kyang mchod pa chen pos mchod
15a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan stug po rin po che las/ sbyin pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //mtha' yas yul can shin tu
15a7(mdo sde): phra| |bsam gtan mkhyen pa skyes bu'i mchog / dbang po 'das pa mngon sum pa/ /chags dang dbang po rnam par spangs/ /bsam gtan bsam pa bsam
15b1(mdo sde): gtan pa'i/ /de ni dgos pa'i tshul yin te/ /thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams/ /kun gyi snying la gnas pa yin/ /yod dang med kyi phyogs dang bral/ /sangs rgyas
15b2(mdo sde): phyogs ni dri ma med/ /blo dang shes bya bral ba ste/ /tshang dang dbang po spangs pa yin/ /sems shes rnams kyi yul ma yin/ /de ni grol ba rnams kyi yul/ /mtshan rnams
15b3(mdo sde): kun kyang snang ba ste/ /de bzhin gshegs ni mtshan med pa'ang / /dregs can rnams kyi dregs med mdzad/ /mnyam par bzhag cing gos pa med/ /g.yo ba ma yin
15b4(mdo sde): g.yo med min/ /chags med lam la gnas pa ste/ /lha yul byung ba'i lha rnams dang / dri za lha min mi'am ci/ /thub pa rnams dang mur 'dug gis/ /bstod kyang
15b5(mdo sde): rtag tu yong mi g.yo/ /de la ngo mtshar sred pa med/ /'gro ba gang na'ang g.yo ba med/ /sngon nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor gyi/ /de ni pha rol yin pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas
15b6(mdo sde): 'phrul pa'i spyod pa yis/ /bya ba tsam du lha rnams kyis/ /mthong yang de dang 'di na med/ /ji bzhin nyi zla de dang 'dra/ /rnal 'byor yul du gnas pa ni/ /dregs pa med
15b7(mdo sde): mdzad 'gro bas mthong / /rnam par tha dad mur 'dug rnams/ /gang la gang gis dbang gyur pa/ /de la de lta'i chos ston te/ /rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /
16a1(mdo sde): rnal 'byor chos can rnam phye zhing / /rgyal po'i tshul dang gsum po dag /rgyal po'am rgyal po'i 'khor rnams dang / /rgyal po'i yul gyi bya
16a2(mdo sde): ba dang / /dka' thub tshul dang zhing rnams kyi/ /phun sum tshogs pa de las byung / /lha rdzas rnams dang nam mkha' dang / /rin chen 'byung khungs rnam dag pa/ /lha
16a3(mdo sde): yi lha yi mthu yis na/ /phyogs dang yul na 'bar ba yin/ /'byung ba gsum gyi thabs rnams gang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas rnams kyis/ /gang rnams byed gzhug
16a4(mdo sde): bya ba dag / sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub 'bras bu/ /de ni mdo 'dzin 'gro ba yi/ /dgos dang dka' thub can rig dang / /gad mo rtse ba'i sbyor ba dang / /gar mkhan
16a5(mdo sde): rnams la rtag tu'o/ /dga' ldan gnas babs 'jig rten gyis/ /mthong ba bud med 'gro dang bcas/ /'phrog cing sbyin dang 'brel ba dang / /cod pan can dang
16a6(mdo sde): lag na gzhur/ /dam pa rnams kyis kun tu mthong / /stug po nas ni de ma bral/ /yul 'di thub pa de yis te/ /thams cad na yang shin tu snang / /rab rib can
16a7(mdo sde): gyi rab rib bzhin/ /ri dwags rnams kyi smig rgyu 'dra/ /'jig rten rnams kyis sgyu ma la/ /ji ltar gzhan du mthong ba dang / /rmi lam na yang gzhan du ba'i/ /rmi lam bzhin du
16b1(mdo sde): bus pas mthong / /khyad par rab tu mthong ba ni/ /rnal 'byor can rnams log long bzhin/ /lha yi lha yi yul yin te/ /de yi sras kyi dus kun tu/ /mi sbyin gu lang tshangs pa
16b2(mdo sde): dang / /sa nan ta dang sa nan 'da'/ /sa nan gzhon nu ser skya dang / /ne tsho la sogs rnams bsams kyang / /de yi yul la rnam par bslad/ /de dag rnal 'byor gyis mi
16b3(mdo sde): mthong / /thub pa gang dag 'byung ba dang / /byung dang da ltar gang 'khod pa/ /de dag yul na gang yang min/ /lta ba'i bag chags g.yogs pa'i phyir/ /sa dang sar ni rnam
16b4(mdo sde): spyod pa'i/ /rdo rje'i snying po de la bstan/ /lha yi lhas ni byas pa yi/ /stug po'i zhing na yod pa yis/ /'di dag rdo rje'i snying po de/ /mnyam par bzhag la shin tu bstan/ /
16b5(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul/ /ji ltar gang gis 'byor pa dag /dbyibs dang mdog dang khyad par dag /bzo bor gyur pas byas pa ni/ /gces dang rdul phran dag
16b6(mdo sde): gi ste/ /brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa min/ /skye ba dag ni chos tsam ste/ /ldog par 'gyur ba'ang chos tsam mo/ /kun tu phra ba'i bdag nyid kyi/ /yon tan dag tu dngos yod
16b7(mdo sde): brtags/ /mar me bzhin du gsal byed pa/ /rgyu rnams dgos pa grub pa dag /mtshan nyid snga nas mi rnyed de/ /'jig dang bral bas mi gnas pa'o/ /'das pa 'das pa'i dngos
17a1(mdo sde): por yang / /yod pa ma yin 'byung ba med/ /rkyen du bya rnams med par yang / /brtag pa'i dngos po gang yang med/ /rkyen rnams yin te 'dus pa la/ /
17a2(mdo sde): dngos po yod pa ma yin te/ /rkyen rnams gang gi rkyen du 'gyur/ /yod dang med pa'i dngos mi snang / /med pa'ang snang ba yod ma yin/ /phra ba'i bdag gis rnam par brtags/ /
17a3(mdo sde): phung po rdza ma ras la sogs/ /ri dwags skom gdungs smig rgyu bzhin/ /rmi lam dri za 'dra ba ste/ /gtsug lag nor ba dug dang bcas/ /rab tu smra ba sum brgya yis/ /'jug pa dag
17a4(mdo sde): dang phyir ldog dang / /mya ngan 'da' ba gang yang med/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par bkod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa sa'i dbang po/ /lag pa'i phreng
17a5(mdo sde): ba tshad med pa/ lus dpe med pa/ dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gtsug gi nor bu dang / se mo dos shin tu chas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
17a6(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ theg pa gsum dang 'jig rten dang mi 'gal ba/ /lta ba'i chos la bdag gi so so rang rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig
17a7(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul bde ba la gnas pa rdo rje snying po'i dbang po rnal 'byor chen po'i rnal 'byor can/ rnal 'byor gyi mkhan po sa dang sa'i mtshams thams cad mi 'gal bar
17b1(mdo sde): ston pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rdo rje'i dbang po khyod skye ba thams cad dang / rgyal po'i 'khor dag tu cod pan dag la chos ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir rgyal ba'i sras khyod la
17b2(mdo sde): gsol ba gdab kyi/ bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'i spyod yul la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir 'phags pa lta ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa gzhan
17b3(mdo sde): gyi dring mi 'jog par spyod pa'i gnas ston cig / des bdag dang cod pan 'di dag gis bdag mngon sum du gyur pa'i spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi sa'i sgo'i bde ba nan tan gyis
17b4(mdo sde): rab tu thob ste/ yid bzhin gyi lus rnam pa bcu la dbang sgyur zhing stobs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang gi gzhal med khang gi gnas gyur te/
17b5(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas spangs te/ sna tshogs kyi lus yid bzhin nor bu dang 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du gyur te/ rgyal po'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dang stug por stug po na
17b6(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams la chos sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ rgyal po smros shig /dge'o dge'o/ /cod pan can la khyad par du/ /chos la 'jug pa bdag med
17b7(mdo sde): pa| |stug po'i rgyan ni rab ston pa/ /sems kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid dag /rnam rtog spyod yul yin shes na/ /rnam rtog don las phyir ldog pa/ /'gro ba rnam rtog mthong nas te/ /
18a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i rang bzhin mthong nas kyang / /ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur/ /chos kyi ngo bo nyid bstan gyi/ /rgyal po nga la de nyon cig /dpyid kyi smig rgyu ji
18a2(mdo sde): bzhin pa/ /de yi rnam pa 'gro ba 'di/ /mtshan bzhi mtshan ma rgyu rnams las/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam mi rtog /blo dang rtogs byas bskyed pas te/ /rtogs bya de yi khyad
18a3(mdo sde): gyur pa/ /gnyen por gyur pa gcig med pa/ /nyi ma dang ni grib ltar gnas/ /sems med tsam po'ang yod pa min/ /tshad dang gzhal dang gnyis ka med/ /rnam par rtog
18a4(mdo sde): pa sems tsam ste/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam mi brtag /shes dang shes bya rnam rtog pa/ /sems tsam de ltar yin na ste/ /shes bya sems tsam yin pa ste/ /rtag tu
18a5(mdo sde): tsam la shes yod min/ /sems chos kyi ni ngo bo nyid/ /gang zag dag dang g.yo ba rnams/ /gang tshe sems la rnam brtags na/ /rtog dang brtags pas spangs pa yin//
18a6(mdo sde): brgyad po rnyed nas dag par 'gyur/ /dgu la bsam gtan spyod yul te/ /bcu la sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyis/ /dbang bskur rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyal ba'i yul
18a7(mdo sde): la chos rnams kyang / /mi zad chos kyi skur 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i zad dang 'dra ba ste/ /sems dang rnam shes de bzhin te/ /mi 'jigs pa yang ma yin zhing / /rtag cing
18b1(mdo sde): zhi ba bde ba brtan/ /'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes ste/ stug po'i zhing na rnam par mdzes/ /rnam shes 'byung gsum 'das pa ste/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin/ /de bzhin
18b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sa bsam med/ /stug bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas gyur pa/ /ji ltar gyo mo rnams kyi rgyu/ /rdza ma chag pas bstan pa bzhin/ /gyo mo rnams kyang rdul gyi ste/ /rdul yang mchog
18b3(mdo sde): phra'i de bzhin du/ /dngos po rnams kyi rkyen rnams la/ /rgyu rnams ji ltar snang ba bzhin/ /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /rgyu ni de bzhin zag bcas pa'o/ /ji ltar shing las me 'byung
18b4(mdo sde): ba| |phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya/ /de bzhin ye shes byung ba'i me/ /phyis kyang gzhan du 'bar bar bya/ /gnas kyi lus las 'phos gyur cing / /sems dang rtog pas rnam spangs
18b5(mdo sde): pa| |chags pa med pa'i ye shes ro/ /stug po'i dbus na rnam par mdzes/ /bskyed med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /sa la gnas pa ma yin pa/ /lta ba thams cad zad byed pa'i//
18b6(mdo sde): bdag med nyid la skyabs su song / /rgyud kyi rgyun rnams chad pa'i phyir/ /'jig pa med cing 'byung med pas/ /lta ba thams cad zag byed pa/ /bdag med nyid la skyabs su song / /
18b7(mdo sde): zhir gyur zhi ba zhir ma byas/ /zhi bas zhi ba bden nyid du/ /lta ba thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /bdag med nyid la skyabs su song / /sa rnams sna tshogs byas pa ni/ /bdag med pa
19a1(mdo sde): la bdag med pas/ /mi rtag tho bas bcom pa dang / rnam par ston pa'i mdas kyang ste/ /bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin du/ /bdag nyid zhir 'gyur de nyid
19a2(mdo sde): du| |de bzhin lta bas rnam brtags te/ /bdag med bsam gtan rab gnas pa/ /lta ba'i chos la ba der gnas kyi/ /so so rang rig spyod yul la/ /thog ma med nas nyes dri
19a3(mdo sde): med/ /'phags pa rnams kyis la gnas/ /'phags gnas 'jig rten pas spangs te/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i 'phags la gnas/ /sems kyi sa las rab gyur te/ /stug
19a4(mdo sde): po'i dkyil na rnam par mdzes/ /mi bdag mi bdag dbang po rnams/ /thams cad kyis kyang yang smras pa/ /rdo rje'i snying po skyabs dang mgon/ /gang la skyabs su mchi bar
19a5(mdo sde): bgyi| |sangs rgyas yod min med pa min/ /phung po'i skye shing rnam bsregs te/ /dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom nas/ /stug po sangs rgyas sa la gnas/ /shes bya dri med
19a6(mdo sde): zhi ba la/ /skyabs su song zhig grogs po dag /rtag dang chad las bral ba ste/ /blo dang rtogs bya'i gnas ma yin/ /stug po'i dkyil bzhugs rnal 'byor can/ /de yang grogs po
19a7(mdo sde): mgon skyabs so/ /rnal 'byor can rnams kun gyi zhing / /zhing mchog bzang ba stug pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ba ni mang pos gang / /stug po de la skyabs su song / /spros pa kun dang
19b1(mdo sde): bral ba ste/ /lta ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs/ /ri mo'i thag thug lta bu dang / /rmi lam mo gsham bu 'byung dang / /rmi lam bud med bzang mo ltar/ /thub pa rnams kyis 'gro ba mthong / /
19b2(mdo sde): dri za'i grong khyer spyod pa bzhin/ /skra phung mgal ba bskor ba ltar/ /smig rgyu ri dwags sred mtshungs su/ /yod dang med pa rnam par spangs/ /sgyu ma'i lus gzugs sna tshogs dang //
19b3(mdo sde): 'phrul pa'i sprul par de dag ni/ /'jig rten spyod tshe mthong ba ste/ /sa dang sa la thub pa rnams/ /bsdor med du ma'i gzugs gyur pa/ /sgyu ma'i shing gi 'bras bu ltar/ /sprin dang du ba
19b4(mdo sde): glog ltar yang / /thub pas rnal 'byor rnam par mthong / /rdzas la sogs pa'i bzo bzung ltar/ /'gro ba bdag gi rnam rtog byung / /yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang / chos lda'i ngo bo nyid
19b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'jug pa'i rnam shes spyod pa ni/ /bdag med mi gnyis brgyan pa ste/ /bag chags thog ma med pa yi/ /sems kyi gnas ngan len byung yod/ /'od pa'i dba' rlabs
19b6(mdo sde): 'dra bar ni/ /kun gzhi sa la gnas pa yin/ /rlung gis ji ltar 'od pa la/ /phan tshun dag tu bskyod byas na/ /dpa' rlabs rnams la 'jig pa med/ /'od pa'ang med par mi
19b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /snga med bag chags gnas can rnams/ /'jug pa'i yul la gzhol ba dag /sems brgyad rnams kyi 'jug pa ni/ /rnam par tha dad ma yin te/ /dus gcig tu
20a1(mdo sde): yang de dag 'byung / /bar bar du ni rim gyis so/ /thog ma med nas sems 'jug pa/ /skar ma gza' yi dkyil 'khor dang / lo ma me tog 'bras
20a2(mdo sde): bu dang / /ri dang sde dang tshal sogs la/ /rtag tu dus gcig 'jug pa ste/ /rim gyis kyang ni shes par byos/ /yang dag ma yin snga ma'i yul/ /mal la gnas bzhin
20a3(mdo sde): mthong ba yin/ /lus kyi 'jug pa rim gyis kyang / /srog la brten cing 'byung ba yin/ /rdzas dang grangs dang chos rnams la/ /tha dad rim gyis 'byung ba ste/ mur zhing
20a4(mdo sde): bca' dang bza' rnams la/ /tha dad rim gyis 'da' ba min/ /ro dang dri yi rnam pa la/ /rim gyis tha dad 'byung ba yin/ /rim gyis kha dog khyad par gyi/ /sna tshogs la yang
20a5(mdo sde): dus gcig tu/ /rgyal po sems ni bsam mi khyab/ /rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste/ /rdo ba rnams kyi gser bzhin gnas/ /yid ni
20a6(mdo sde): kun gyi gzhi las byung / /yid kyi rnam shes de bzhin te/ /rnam shes drug po rnam pa mang / /sa yi khyad par byed pa'o/ /bag chags sems dang lhan cig tu/ /sa bon kun
20a7(mdo sde): pa'i kun bzhi ni/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag pa'i/ /rtag tu rang bzhin 'od can gyis/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs/ /nges dang ma nges dge ba yin/ /rtag
20b1(mdo sde): tu gnas ltar 'byung ba ni/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs dag ji bzhin du/ /tha ma 'bring dang rab rnams su/ /de bzhin kun gzhis khyab par byed/ /sa dang sa la rnam dag cing / /gzhan du gyur nas
20b2(mdo sde): rnam par mdzes/ /yang dag ji bzhin don ston la/ /rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa/ /mthong zhing thos te shes pas na/ /sa chen bdag po khyod nyid kyis/ /spobs pa can la
20b3(mdo sde): bstan par gyis/ /khyad par du 'o khyad par bdag /khams phran rnams kyi khams rnams dang / /sa la 'khor lo 'khor rnams dang / /kun gzhi rnam par dag gyur na/ sa yi
20b4(mdo sde): rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/ /dzam+bu'i gling la dbang ba yi/ /'khor lo 'khor bar yang 'gyur ro/ /dga' ldan la sogs gzhal med du/ /mtshe ma rab kyi dbang por 'gyur/ /dbang
20b5(mdo sde): po'i gnas su dbang por te/ /dbang sgyur gnas su de bzhin no/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po'i bdag /gzugs khams bdag po'ang de bzhin te/ /gzugs med 'du shes
20b6(mdo sde): med sems can/ /bsam gtan bde ba'i 'bras bur yang / /yang dag mngon bya ma chags pas/ /yang dag mtha' la ma reg par/ /'jigs med seng+ge'i sgra sgrog cing / /
20b7(mdo sde): dga' dang ye shes yang dag ldan/ /bsam gtan dbang gi bde bas ngoms/ /de ni stug por smon pa yin/ /khams gsum spyod pa'i nyes pa yis/ /chags med mnyam
21a1(mdo sde): par bzhag pa ste/ /mthar gyis stug por zhugs nas su/ /rnam par sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sar/ /chos kyi dbang por bdag gyur te/ /rten las
21a2(mdo sde): gzhan du gyur cing bde/ /rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba'i chos/ /stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas/ /chos kyi bdag po rnam par mdzes/ /'jigs pa med pa mi yi mchog/
21a3(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa 'jig pa min/ /mur 'dug rnams kyis jir brjod bzhin/ /mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi/ /rgyal po bcu po'i las rnams kyis/ /theg pa gsum du
21a4(mdo sde): gyur pa ste/ /stug po 'tshol ba'i khyad par yang / /rgyal po yang dag skye bar 'gyur/ /sa dang sa la gnas pas so/ /'jig na 'dus byas nyes par 'gyur/ /'chi ba rnams
21a5(mdo sde): la'ang de bzhin te/ /rgyal po 'jig pa mthar ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku/ /sems can zad cing med 'gyur ba/ /de ste mya ngan 'das 'jig na/ /sngon gyi
21a6(mdo sde): mtha' yang 'jig pa dang / /sems can 'byung ba med par 'gyur/ /sems can khams rnams zad gyur na/ /rgyal ba'i shes bya dngos po med/ /mya ngan 'dar med
21a7(mdo sde): shes bya med/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid kyang med/ /me mar bsregs pa'i dpe rnams dang / /sa bon tshig pa'i dpe dag gi/ /rtog can thar la mkhas pa rnams/ /
21b1(mdo sde): lus can rnams la thar pa ston/ /yod dang med pa'i rnam thar gyis/ /thar pa'i bde las de dag ring / /bsam gtan gnas pa thams cad de/ /lugs su 'jug dang
21b2(mdo sde): bzlog pa dang / gzugs med 'du shes med pa dang / /mngon shes dbang dang stobs rnams dang / /ma nyams nyams pa med pa dang / /chos kyi mtshan la mkhas pa
21b3(mdo sde): rnams/ /sa yi khams la mkhas pa dag /mi yi dbang po stug por 'gro/ /yod dang med pa 'jig pas ni/ /de dag 'khor las mi 'byung ste/ /phrad pa gsum po 'jig
21b4(mdo sde): med cing / /rgyu dang dmigs pa'i rkyen rnams dang / /de ma thag dang dbang yang ste/ /sa rnams bdag med phyi rol dag /mig dang gzugs dag rgyur byas te/ /phrad pas gang
21b5(mdo sde): rnams 'jug gyur pa/ /gzugs rnams mngon byed ye shes dang / /de dag thams cad zhig par 'gyur/ /phyi dang nang gi sa rnams ni/ /phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste/ /yod dang
21b6(mdo sde): med pa'i lta ba las/ /de ste grol nas 'jig na ni/ /sems dang dmigs las bral ba'i phyir/ /rnam par dmigs pas mi gnas te/ /mdun du rtog pa med gyur cing / /de yi rang bzhin
21b7(mdo sde): mi gnas la/ /gang tshe dmigs pa spang ba la/ /rnam par rtog pa mi gnas shing / /gang tshe gnyis las rnam grol te/ /rtog med rtog pa spangs pas na/ /de tshe sems ni mnyam par
22a1(mdo sde): bzhag / 'gro ba rnam rtog med par mthong / /gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab shes la gnas/ /brten pa las ni gyur pa ste/ /ye
22a2(mdo sde): shes gnas ngan len spangs/ /yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyis brgyan pa ste/ /sa gsum rgyal po rab byed cing / /rgyal po stug por rab tu 'gro/ /
22a3(mdo sde): gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung / /mi ldan pa dang 'dus ma byas/ /nang dang phyi yi sa rnams dang / /tha dad rnam par rab mthong zhing / /so so rang gi ye shes mkhas
22a4(mdo sde): lta ba'i chos la rnam par gnas/ /rgyal po stug por 'dong ba ni/ /ye shes mkhas pa rnal 'byor can/ /mtshan ma ming dang de bzhin nyid/ /rnam par rtog dang ye shes dang / /
22a5(mdo sde): yang dag mtha' yi gnas pa yis/ /so so rang rig spyod yul du/ /rgyal po dag dang rgyal po'i bu/ /rnal 'byor sems dpa'i rnal 'byor can/ /rgyal po stug por 'dong ba
22a6(mdo sde): na| |sangs rgyas bstod pa'i zhing du'o/ /phrad pa gsum dang rkyen spangs te/ /bdag gi phyogs las 'phags gyur na/ /phyogs las nyams pas 'jig pa ni/ /rtog pa
22a7(mdo sde): can dang mnyam par 'gro / ma grub pa dang yang dpe yi/ /rgyal po 'gal bar shin tu 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog dang nyes pa'i ma tshang / /de dag rnam pa sngar 'gyur ro/ /phrad pa
22b1(mdo sde): gsum po sun 'byin pa/ /chud zos bung ba ji bzhin du/ /de bzhin 'jig rten sun 'byin pa/ /yang dag ma yin rtog pa smra/ /de la nyes pa rnam lnga ste/ /rtog pa bslad pa'i
22b2(mdo sde): mig can la/ /'dra chos mi 'dra'i chos skyon can/ /nor dang bzlog pa med pa dang / /bdag gi phyogs las nyams pa'i blo/ /pha rol phyogs la brten pa dang / /lta ba de dag
22b3(mdo sde): 'byung ba ni/ /thog ma'i mtha' ni 'jig byed pa'o/ /sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha'/ /rgyal po yod pa ma yin te/ /kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba dag /'byung ba dog par
22b4(mdo sde): rgyug pa'o/ /de dang de yi lam rgyud du /thugs rje dbang gis rgyal ba gshegs/ /sprul pa'i 'od zer lha rdzas kyis/ /zla ba lta bur rgyu zhing 'khor/ /snga ma'i las dang tshul
22b5(mdo sde): mthun par/ /pha skyabs chos rnams ston pa mdzad/ /rgyud dang rgyud du bying rnams la/ /chos kyang bstan par mi 'gyur te/ /de ste mya ngan 'da' 'jig rten na/ /rgyal bas yon
22b6(mdo sde): tan ci zhig brnyes/ /dbang sgyur gsum po rnams dang yang / /rnam par thar dang bden pa mthong / /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po dang / /dran pa nyer gzhag stong pa nyid/ /tha dad
22b7(mdo sde): yang dag shes bzhi dang / /'dri la lung bstan pa rnams dang / /dmigs pa dang ni de ma thag /rgyu dang dbang yang de bzhin te/ /gzugs med pa dang spyod pa dang / /dbang
23a1(mdo sde): po stobs rnams bcas pa dang / /mngon par shes dang dad pa rnams dang / /rnam par shes dang de rgyu dang / /'dus byas ma byas chos rnams dang / /
23a2(mdo sde): byang chub yan lag gang zag dang / /rnam par thar dang skyes bu brgyad/ /sa rnams dag dang shes pa dang / /zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang / /ye shes mngon du chud
23a3(mdo sde): pa bcu/ /sdug bsngal chos nyid shes pa dang / /sdug bsngal gyis su so sor rtog /sdug bsngal nyid kyi rjes su shes/ /'dus pa rnams kyi chos shes dang / /'dus
23a4(mdo sde): pa la ni kun rtog dang / /'dus la rjes su 'gro shes dang / /'gog pa dag la chos shes dang / /'gog pa dag la rtog pa dang / /'gog la rjes su 'gro shes dang / /
23a5(mdo sde): lam la chos kyi shes pa dang / /lam la so sor rtog pa dang / /lam la rjes su 'gro ba shes/ /shes pa rnams dang slob pa bcu/ /brgyad pa mang na lan bdun
23a6(mdo sde): dang / /rigs las rigs dang lan gcig 'ong / /bar chad gcig po gang zag dang / /bar mar mya ngan 'da' ba dang / /gzhan skyes mya ngan 'da' ba dang / /mngon
23a7(mdo sde): par 'du byed ma byas dang / /steng ma'i rgyud kyang de bzhin te/ /rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / /ye shes spyod yul yin par gsungs/ /rnal 'byor can yul
23b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs te/ /tha ma mchog dang bar ma'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du/ /mchog dang bcas par de la sgom/ /rang sangs rgyas ni dbu mar te/ /nyan thos pa ni tha ma'o//
23b2(mdo sde): bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa/ /lnga gsum bco lnga dag tu yang / /sems kyi tshogs kyi 'gog pa ni/ /rnal 'byor can rnams shin tu byed/ /gang 'das de ni 'gags pa
23b3(mdo sde): yin/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od snang can/ /zag pa gang yin pa de sems min/ /sems dang lhan cig gnas pa'ang med/ /ma 'ongs pa ni ma phyin te/ /de ltar byung ba gnas
23b4(mdo sde): pa med/ /sems ni rkyen dang mi ldan par/ /'di dang gzhan du'ang skye ba med/ /bsam gtan bzhi na sems med de/ /'byung ba'i rgyu la gnod pa med/ /'byung ba'i rgyu ni rnam
23b5(mdo sde): shes te/ /yid dang rnam shes lnga pa'o/ /rang gi rnam rtog mi shes pas/ /dpa' rlabs bzhin du 'byung ba yin/ /brtag dang rtog las rnam grol ba/ /thub pa kun gyi kun gzhi
23b6(mdo sde): 'o| |yod dang med las lha rdzas su/ /gzhan 'gyur 'jig pa ma yin zhing / /stug po dang ni stug dkyil du/ /zla ba lta bur rab tu mdzes/ /de ni mi 'jig bde bar gnas/ /
23b7(mdo sde): stug po'i dkyil na sras dang bcas/ /tha dad ma yin mtshan nyid mkhyen/ /ye shes ro gcig nyid du gyur/ /bsam yas rnal 'byor yul can te/ /rgyal po zla ba lta bur spyod/ /rgyal
24a1(mdo sde): po phun sum tshogs pa 'di/ /rnal 'byor khyer ba thub rnams kyi/ /rtag par rgyal po de yi phyir/ /khyod kyi yid kyang rnal 'byor shog /'dod
24a2(mdo sde): gnas rnam pa drug po dang / /tshangs pa dag gi bcu gnyis dang / /gzugs med shes med sems can du/ /rgyal po khyod ni dbang por gyis/ /stug por 'dod pa'ang
24a3(mdo sde): 'thob par te/ /bzang po'i stug por smon pa'i phyir/ /rgyal po ye shes bcu po rnams/ /bsgoms na stug por 'gro bar 'gyur/ /chos dang rjes su 'gro shes dang / /
24a4(mdo sde): pha rol sems dang kun rdzob dang / /sdug bsngal 'dus pa'i shes pa dang / /'gog dang lam las skyes pa dang / /byang ba'i shes dang mi skye dang / /khong bzo bsgom
24a5(mdo sde): pa de bzhin te/ /sha kun ta la'i rgyal rigs dang / /ig shwa khu dang so ma'i rigs/ /yang dag don ston rgyal po'i mchog /khyod kyi rigs ni khyad par 'phags//
24a6(mdo sde): de yi rigs su khyod skyes shing / /zhum pa med par stug por song / /lta ba'i chos la gnas pa yi/ /rnal 'byor can gnas dri med du/ /sbud pa bzhin du dbugs rgyu
24a7(mdo sde): zhing / /'gro rgyu lug dang 'dra ba ste/ /rnga phrug bzhin du lus phyed kyis/ /'gro zhing 'ong ba byed pa ni/ /thams cad lus la yid yin te/ /sgyu ma'i ri dwags bzhin
24b1(mdo sde): du gnas/ /sgyu ma'i shing ltar shin tu snang / /chu bo'i nang gi me bzhin du/ /smin ma mig dang yan lag rnams/ /sgyur pas rgyal po bzhin du rtse/ /sems dang sems las byung
24b2(mdo sde): dang yid/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag/ /chos rnams 'di dag dngos po med/ /sprin gyi tshul du 'byung ba ste/ /kun gzhi thams cad sa bon 'di/ /bag chags rnams kyis
24b3(mdo sde): yongs su dkris/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu dang / /'ja' dang glog rnam ji bzhin du/ /lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul/ /de lta'i gzugs su snang ba yin/ /lu ma'i
24b4(mdo sde): pad+mo lta bur dag / dri med ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ /gsal ba gdon mi za ba'i rigs/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhin du gnas/ /mtshan ma'i mthu las ming 'byung ste/ /mtshan
24b5(mdo sde): ma rkyen las byung ba yin/ /mtshan ma ming dang 'brel ba yin/ /rkyen rnams kyis kyang rnam par brtags/ /mtshan ma'i tshul dang dbyibs dag las/ /rnam par rtog pa
24b6(mdo sde): shin tu 'byung / /rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa yis/ /rgyu la rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /phyi rol mtshan ma sems rnams dang / /bag chags yid kyang de bzhin te/ /sems
24b7(mdo sde): dang lhan cig ldan pa ni/ /khong pa la ni gnas pa yin/ /yid dang dbang por ldan pa ni/ /rnam shes lnga mi rgyu yin te/ /rtag tu yang dag ye shes kyis/ /'jig rten rgyu la
25a1(mdo sde): rnam par lta/ /de ltar byed dang bya ba med/ /de bzhin nyid 'di rnam gzhan min/ /thams cad chos kyi de bzhin nyid/ /phan tshun stobs kyis 'byung
25a2(mdo sde): ba ste/ /rnal 'byor can rnams de ltar lta/ /de bzhin nyid du gsal bar mthong / /rang bzhin yongs su grub pa ni/ /chos rnams chos nyid de yin te/ /brtags pa'i
25a3(mdo sde): dngos po rang bzhin du/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ /stong pa ngo bo nyid med de/ /yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa/ /sgyu ma rmi lam rnams dang 'dra/ /dri
25a4(mdo sde): za'i grong khyer lta bu ste/ /skra tshogs rnams dang smig rgyu bzhin/ /du ba sprin stug lta bu ni/ /mtshan ma tshul dang dbyibs rnams kyis/ /ji ltar ming du 'jug pa yi/ /tshig
25a5(mdo sde): dang yi ge mang po dang / /ming rnams mang po la yang ste/ /kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /gzhan gyi dbang ni de las gzhan/ /yid don dbang po 'dus pa las/ /sa
25a6(mdo sde): bon kun can bag chags dang / /tha dad ma yin sems dang bcas/ /rnam par shes pa kun tu 'byung / /gzhan gyi dbang gi rang bzhin yang / /phan tshun stobs kyi
25a7(mdo sde): rgyu las so/ /so so rang rig shin tu phra/ /mthong ba'i chos la gnas pa ste/ /rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa 'di/ /'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ /'phags pa'i
25b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugs chud pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/ /rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ /yang dag mtha' ru gzigs pas na/ /skye ba zad ces rnam par
25b2(mdo sde): gsung / /tshangs pa'i lam yang non ces so/ /byas kyis bzod yang bya ba med/ /phyin chad 'byung ba med do zhes/ /sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/ /g.yo ba thams
25b3(mdo sde): cad shin tu byung / /bag chags ma lus bsregs pas na/ /rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung zhing / /bdag med shin tu mthong ba ni/ /chos dang gang zag bsgrags pa ste/ /sa bon
25b4(mdo sde): rnams dang bral bas na/ /sems kyi tshogs rnams mi 'jug go/ /thog ma med pa'i dus bsags pa'i/ /yid kyi gnas ngan len rtog pa'i/ /spros pa thams cad mngon
25b5(mdo sde): bsal bas/ /mya ngan 'das pa lcags bsregs bzhin/ /ji ltar rab tu bsregs pa'i lcags/ /bsil bar gyur kyang 'jig pa med/ /de bzhin grol ba thams cad kyang //
25b6(mdo sde): me zad bzhin du bsil ba yin/ /zag pa med pa'i chos dbyings su/ /zhugs pa stug po'i dkyil 'khor na/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras bcas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi zas
25b7(mdo sde): gnas pa/ mnyam par bzhag la mnyam bzhag cing / /mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas/ /rgyal po rnal 'byor can gyi yul/ /rnal 'byor 'di yin brtsam par gyis//
26a1(mdo sde): de ste rgyal sras dge ba'i gnas/ /stug por 'gro bar 'dod na ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /zhing gi mchog ni stug
26a2(mdo sde): po'o| / de phyir rgyal po dge bar rtsoms/ /rgyal po rnams la'ang dge bar bgyis/ /ming ni mtshan ma'i mthu las byung / /mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste/ /mtshan
26a3(mdo sde): ma las kyang rnam rtog 'byung / /grub pa rnams ni ma gtogs par/ /rdza la sogs pa dbang po'i yul/ /phung po yon tan ldan pa'i rnams/ /rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan
26a4(mdo sde): ma 'di/ /skye ba la ni rgyu yin no/ /khyad par byed pa rnam rtog ste/ /gnas kyang rnam par shes par byed/ /'gro dang mi 'gro 'gro ba yi/ /gti mug rnams kyang shin tu skye/ /ring
26a5(mdo sde): po thung du kha dog dang / /rtsub pa dag dang 'jam pa'i rnams/ /sgra dang dri la sogs pa'i yul/ /mngar dang kha dang tsha ba dang / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul/ /ji snyed
26a6(mdo sde): dge dang mi dge dang / /'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas/ /mya ngan 'da' ba ye shes yul/ /skad cig skad cig rab tu 'byung / /byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste/ /de ni
26a7(mdo sde): mgyogs par shin tu 'gro / rnam par shes pa rgyu las byung / /yid dang kun gzhi rab 'brel bas/ /khab long lta bur shin tu 'khor/ /kha gnyis sprul ni ji bzhin
26b1(mdo sde): pa| |yid kyi spyod pa de bzhin te/ /kun gzhi rnam shes yog par byed/ /gcig tu 'on kyang rab tu 'byung / /yid kyi rnam par shes dang bcas/ /rgyu yi dgos pa byas nas
26b2(mdo sde): ldog/ /bdag tu dgos pa'ang shin tu byed/ /bdag gir bya ba'ang 'phel bar byed/ /lus la drod kyang skyes pa ste/ /sna tshogs rnam par rab tu spyod/ /zas dang skom dang longs
26b3(mdo sde): spyod dang / gos dang spos sogs rnam spyod dang / /mchong ba dag dang rgyug par yang / /mi yi lus ni 'dzin pa yin/ /gar dang gad mo rtsed mo dang / /yid kyang rtag tu byed
26b4(mdo sde): pa ste| / skra tshogs mgal pa bskor ba dang / /dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang / /smig rgyu la'ang de bzhin du/ /rnam par rtog pa kun tu 'jug /pra bab kun tu 'khor ba'i sems/ /
26b5(mdo sde): bdag sems khong du mi chud pas/ /lus dang snod kyi rnam par yang / /phyang mo nyug ltar gnas pa'o/ /nyam chung snying po med pa ste/ /rnam par rtog pa rgyu med pa/ /bdag gis brtags
26b6(mdo sde): pa'i don la spyod/ /mthong nas gnas pa gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /rgyal po rnam shes sa bon ni/ /lta ba'i yul du g.yo ba ste/ /bus pa'i tshogs rnams myos par byed/ /'phags
26b7(mdo sde): pa ma yin sa yi bdag / rgyal po rnam shes gsum po yi/ /'jug pa rab tu bstan pa ste/ /'di rnams dang bral gab pa yi/ /rang bzhin yang dag nyid yin no/ /bye ba phrag zhing ji
27a1(mdo sde): snyed rnams/ /shugs 'dzin gyi ni mthong ba dang / /'phags pa mod+gal bu yis kyang / /lus dang lus che mdzes pa rnams/ /de dag las ni 'di
27a2(mdo sde): dag 'phags/ /stug po'i zhing na sa yi bdag /thams cad zhing na ci mdzes pa/ /de dag dpe'am char mi rung / /bde ba yod dang mngon dga' dang / /'og gi zhing rnams
27a3(mdo sde): bye ba dag / de dang de na gang bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas de dag stug la bstod/ /stug ces bya yod sngon mtha' med/ /rang byung 'phrul pa de yin te/ /zag pa med pa'i sangs
27a4(mdo sde): rgyas so/ /'byung ba gsum las 'das te gnas/ /de ni bde ba nyer len med/ /khyod dang nga yir spyod dang bral/ /ther zug mchog tu rtag pa ste/ /brtan pa stug por
27a5(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas/ /yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub tu/ /'tshang rgya 'og min gnas mchog tu/ /sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa mi mdzad
27a6(mdo sde): de| |de dag stug po'i zhing gshegs nas/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa bye ba yis/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor mnyam par bzhag /sprul pa dag dang thabs gcig rol/ /thams cad
27a7(mdo sde): zhing du zla ba ltar/ /gang la gang gis dbang 'gyur pa/ /de la de ltar 'byung ba ste/ /'phrul pa'i sprul pa dag gis kyang / /sa bcu pa yi mdo mchog dang / sdong pos
27b1(mdo sde): brgyan dang dru ma yi/ /gang yang rnam par sprul pa'i mdo/ /dpal gyi phreng ba la bshad dang / /rnam par snang ba'i mdo sde dang / sgyu ma dpal las 'gro ba sogs/ /mdo sde
27b2(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs dag / stug po'i rgyan nas rnam par 'byung / /stug po'i rgyan gyi mdo sde 'di/ /mdo sde kun las 'phags pa yin/ /rgyal po 'di la rim grong yang / /
27b3(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang bcas pas gyis/ /gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs rnams dang / /'du shes med pa de bzhin te/ /gnas las 'das te sangs rgyas dpang / /
27b4(mdo sde): bzhugs so stug po'i dkyil 'khor na/ /pad+mo 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang / /gzugs mang rnam pa sna tshogs na/ /lha rdzas smad kyi ye shes te/ /de bzhin gshegs
27b5(mdo sde): pa'i rnam dag gis/ /rnam grol rnal 'byor can rnams dang / /de na bcom ldan thabs gcig bzhugs/ /stug po'i dkyil bzhugs bsam gtan zhugs/ /sangs
27b6(mdo sde): rgyas sa mchog rnam bzhi la/ /de na bzhugs shing gzugs 'dzin pa/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa nyid tshul gyis/ /de yi mtha' ma mi gzigs pas/ /gzugs rnams
27b7(mdo sde): dang ni yul rnams kyi/ /thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnams/ /gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / /stug po'i dkyil na rnam bzhugs shing / /thams cad rnal 'byor
28a1(mdo sde): can gyis bstan/ /ba bla gser dang zla 'od tsam+pa ka /rma bya'i mgrin pa pad+mo 'dra/ /de yi sa la bzhugs pa'i lha/ /lha yi gzugs ni rnam par
28a2(mdo sde): mdzes pa ste/ /de gzugs lha rgyal go pa ka dag glog dang 'ol ma byu ru'i 'od bzhin du/ /la las bal chung sku dang na bza' lo ma rtswa la sogs pa'i mal bzhugs
28a3(mdo sde): par| |mthong ngo nyi ma stong ltar shin tu rnam par 'bar ba'i sku gzugs mnga' ba la/ /thub can la las rnal 'byor dbang la stug dbus chu skyes re rer bzhugs
28a4(mdo sde): par mthong / /thub pa'i thor tshugs tshogs ni lag gis 'gro ba yi mgo bo klad pa bzhin du ste/ /la lar gzugs ni rdo rje an+da rnyil gyis spras pa'i cod pan brgyan
28a5(mdo sde): par ro/ /la las la lar thub pa de la 'khor lo ri mo nya dung bcas par mthong / /la las ji ltar nam mkha'i rgyu pa'i lam la 'ja' zug bzhin du thub pa mthong / /
28a6(mdo sde): lha rdzas phyag sor can gyi sna tshogs yul can ri rab phyag tu rab gzhog cing / /khams gsum chu srin gnas dang chu gnas de bzhin ba lang mig par shong
28a7(mdo sde): bar mdzad/ /sbyin pa'i shugs kyis mi yi bdag po'i gtsug gi cod pan rnams kyis rab mchod cing / /la la dag na rgyal dang rgyal po'i 'khor na dgos pa rnams
28b1(mdo sde): na mkhas gyur cing / /chad pas gcod par snang ngo stug po'i dbus na gzhan du rnam par snang ba ni/ /thub pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor shin tu byed pa rnams
28b2(mdo sde): la ste/ /rang gi yul rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag rnal 'byor gyis ston cing / /la las gnas dang lta ba yid dang blo rnams shin tu gzhan du gyur pa dang / /
28b3(mdo sde): dbang dang ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs ting nge 'dzin dang yid bzhin sku mnga' bar/ /la las yul la chags med spyod yul rig pa'i blo yi bya ba gcod par te/ /'di dang gzhan
28b4(mdo sde): med sreg med gyur pas tshig bya med phyir mya ngan 'das par ro/ /snum dang 'od 'phro med pas ji ltar 'jig rten 'di na me bzhin shin tu mya ngan 'das/ /la las pha rol phyin
28b5(mdo sde): pa'i mchod sbyin mchod bcug mchod sbyin byed pa dag tu ste/ /sbyin dang mchod dang thub pa dag kyang rnam pa tshul bzhin mdzad pa shin tu mthong / /bde ba yod ces bya ba'i
28b6(mdo sde): zhing mchog de na skyes bu yod pa de dag ni/ /mngal nas skyes pa ma yin bde bar 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dag ste/ /lha rdzas gser ltar 'bar ba zla ba lta bu'i
28b7(mdo sde): lus 'chad rnal 'byor can gyi bdag / lha rdzas 'od bzang de dang gang yang mi na brnal 'byor can gyi dbang po'i yul/ /de dag brgya char mi phod rnal 'byor can gyi dbang pho
29a1(mdo sde): dag gi de bde la/ /gzhan du bdag cag nyid kyis bshams pa'i longs spyod pa yi zhing gi mi de dag /mtha' yas 'od kyi bde ba can na rgyal ba'i
29a2(mdo sde): sras rnams lha rdzas 'od 'khor can/ /rnal 'byor yang dag nyid mos thub dbang khyu mchog bsam gtan bdud rtsi myong byed dang / /rnam pa tha dad sna tshogs rin po
29a3(mdo sde): che dag yal ga dpyangs pa'i gnas tshal zhing / /lha rdzas gser phye'i khams las bsags pa'i zhing gi mchog de shin tu rnam par mdzes/ /gser dang rin chen
29a4(mdo sde): sna tshogs me tog pad+mo de ni mchog tu rab tu brgyan/ /'di ni sangs rgyas zhing gi gter yin dpe med de kun mi yang pad+mo skyes/ /thub pa de la dad cing bsam gtan
29a5(mdo sde): mkhas la sangs rgyas la ni rab tu smos/ /bdag gi ston pa la ni bdag bstan yid can pad+mo dag las skye ba ste/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog na gnas pa'i mi
29a6(mdo sde): ni bzang po'i mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan/ /dpe byad bzang po bcas pas rmad du 'bar ba'i lus can dpal gyi be'u dang bcas/ /yod dang med pa'i rnam rtog rtog
29a7(mdo sde): pa med pas dri med rdzub pa dag go/ /de ltar na 'di dag rnam par bstan nas rdo rje khyu mchog mthe bo tsam du gyur/ /sro ma rdul phran shin tu phra ba'i skra yi brgyad cha'i
29b1(mdo sde): gzugs su'ang de bzhin gyur/ /la lar ba de gshegs rang rgyal nyan thos gzugs dang de bzhin sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang / /gang dang gang la sems kyi spyod pa ji
29b2(mdo sde): bzhin de 'dra'i gzugs kyi khyad par dag / rnal 'byor mkhas pa rdo rje zhes byas tshad med gzugs kyi yul dag rnam par spangs/ /de skad bshad nas yang smras pa/
29b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs gzugs cha rgyal ba'i sras/ /sa rnams de bzhin dbang rnams dang / /ma nyams mngon par shes pa dang / /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de ltar yid bzhin
29b4(mdo sde): lus kyang ste/ /gzungs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / /rnam thar tha dad yang dag rig /stobs dang 'jigs pa med pa dang / /phung po khams rnams zag med pa/ /'di dag
29b5(mdo sde): gzhan du gyur nas 'thob/ /rtag pa'i sangs rgyas sa yang ngo / /chos rnams lnga yi rang bzhin dang / /rnam par shes pa brgyad rnams dang / /bdag med gnyis po rab rtogs
29b6(mdo sde): nas| |gzhan du 'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /yid bzhin lus ni bcu po dag /sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro bas bskor/ /mi zad smon lam bcu po dang / /lam gyi rnams kyis
29b7(mdo sde): shin tu sprul/ /rmi lam me long gzugs brnyan nam/ /chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong / /rnal 'byor lam la thub pa'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas la zhugs pa dang / /rgyal ba
30a1(mdo sde): pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun du byas/ /yod dang med pa phyogs bral pa/ /rdul phran rnam par 'jig rnams kyis/ /
30a2(mdo sde): dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang / /lha yi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshogs/ /ri rabs la 'dong rgyu zhing / /nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'dod spyod kyang / /ji ltar snang bar ma gyur ba/ /de
30a3(mdo sde): bzhin rgyal sras bcas pa'i rnams/ /rnal 'byor med pas mi mthong ngo / /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan/ /sa dang zhing rnams bye ba na/ /rgyal ba mchod la mngon
30a4(mdo sde): par mos/ /smon dbang la gnas pa'i rnams/ /pad+mo'i khang par rab tu skye/ /dbang dang bsam gtan sems pa dag /zhing dang zhing du mya ngan 'da'/ /ting nge
30a5(mdo sde): 'dzin las skyes pa ston/ /lhun gyis grub par thams cad du/ /chur byung zla ba 'dra bar te/ /nyi ma lta bur khyad med pa/ /snang ba sems can spyod yul du/ /yang dag mtha'
30a6(mdo sde): la mi reg par/ /ting nge 'dzin la rab tu ldog /gru la gnas pa'i bud pa dag /gangs chen mtsho la 'gro ba bzhin/ /gang du gru 'gro der rgyug ste/ /dpag tshed shin tu mang bar
30a7(mdo sde): yang / /thugs rjes nyon mongs dma' pa'i lus/ /sdug bsngal can gzigs de bzhin du/ /de dag 'byung bar rab tu ston/ /phyir ldog bdag med pa yang ste/ /'jig pa dag
30b1(mdo sde): kyang rnam mkhyen nas/ /zad pa'i dus su mi gnas pa/ /gzung dang 'dzin gyis 'phangs pa'i rnams/ /gzung dang 'dzin la spyod pa'i rnams/ /gzung dang 'dzin gyis bskyed pas
30b2(mdo sde): na| |mtshan ma'i gzhi med mtshan nyid med/ /'khor ba'i rgyun gyis khyer ba'i rnams/ /yang dang yang zhing skye ba yin/ /bcags med mtsho yi gter gyur la/ /gcig la
30b3(mdo sde): gcig 'ju'i spre'u ltar yang / /byed pa gru la gnas kyis mthong / /'ju ba'i gnas dang rten med par/ /de bzhin rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams/ /sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa
30b4(mdo sde): yi| |rnam rtog sdug bsngal gnas pa'i rnams/ /sa yi gnas nas nyon mongs phyir/ /rab tu 'byung dang phyir ldog dang / /sbyin dang mchod pa dag kyang 'byung / /'di 'dra rnal
30b5(mdo sde): 'byor can gyis chos/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par gyis// //'phags pa rgyan stug po/ /bam po gnyis pa/ kun tu bzang po mi yi bdag /gzi brjid chen
30b6(mdo sde): po sna tshogs gzugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/ /rdo rje'i snying po la smras pa/ /mthun pa dag la dbang byed dang / /lha gnas 'khod pa gzhan dag dang / /
30b7(mdo sde): rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang /gang yang stug po'i dkyil 'khor pa'i/ /rgyal sras rnal 'byor ldan pa dag /gang gis stug ces bya thos te/ /thos nas nan tan byed pa'i rnams
31a1(mdo sde): gzhan du 'gyur la gzhol ba dag / gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshul thos shing / /ting 'dzin de yi tshul song ba/ /stug par ring bor mi thogs 'gro/ /
31a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yang dag 'gro la mos/ /'gro ba 'dzin dang shugs 'dzin dang / /'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul ba dang / /mthu chen 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang / /zla ba la sogs
31a3(mdo sde): gzugs dbang rgyal/ /blo gros shin tu zhe ba dang / /lte ba rdo rje rnal 'byor rig /dru ma nam mkha'i bdag po dang / /phyag na rdo rje blo chen dang / /rnal 'byor can dang rgyal sras
31a4(mdo sde): rnams/ /gang yang bye ba'i zhing dag nas/ /chos mnyan phyir ni 'ongs pa'i rnams/ /stug po'i rgyal la gzhol ba dag /rgyal ba ma 'ongs mthong nas kyang / /khong nas
31a5(mdo sde): snying rje snying brtse ste/ /rnal 'byor ldan can dbang po'i gtso/ /sna tshogs gzugs la rab tu smras/ /rnal 'byor can gyi gtso la dris/ /'jigs med rdo rje snying po la/ /rin
31a6(mdo sde): chen khang pa sna tshogs dang / /dbang sgyur khang pa bzang por yang / /ji ltar gang gis sna tshogs byas/ /sna tshogs gzugs can khyod kyis smros/ /dngos po kun gyi sna
31a7(mdo sde): tshogs nyid/ /'gro ba dag gi yang rab 'byung / /rdza la sogs pa'i dngos po dag /ji ltar chu 'jim thal sbyar las/ /las su bya ba thams cad bskyed/ /'gro ba 'di
31b1(mdo sde): dag de bzhin byas/ /rnga dang pi wang sgra la sogs/ /las su bskyed las dbyangs 'byin te/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'di yang ci/ /bskyod pa'i las las kun 'byung ngam/ /rang bzhin
31b2(mdo sde): gsum po ji bzhin du/ /dngos po gcig la kun tu gnas/ /sa rnams 'di ltar thams cad du/ /dngos dang dngos la rab tu gnas/ /de bzhin 'di dag kun kyang ci/ /dngos po
31b3(mdo sde): gcig la rab gnas sam/ /gang phyir 'di ltar rgyan dag snang / /khams gsum g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas/ /dga' ldan mtshe ma rab rnams dang / /dbang sgyur rnams kyis
31b4(mdo sde): byas sam ci/ /mi 'am ci dang dru ma dang / /gya nom snang bas byas sam ci/ /'og min thor tshugs can gyis sam/ /'on tam gzugs med rnams kyis byas/ /lha rnams bdag
31b5(mdo sde): po thams cad kyis/ /gcig tu 'dus te 'di byas sam/ /'phrul ba'i sprul pa dag gis sam/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog gis mdzad dam/ /'on tam rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams//
31b6(mdo sde): zhing gzhan rnam par bzhugs pas sam/ /rnal 'byor la mkhas rnal 'byor can/ /sangs rgyas zhing du zhugs rnams kyis/ /sa rnams thams cad byas sam ci/ /
31b7(mdo sde): gang la nor pa rab tu gnas/ /gang 'di nor pa snang ba dag /smig rgyu rnams la chu bzhin te/ /rdza ma'i phyogs la yon tan bzhin/ /'gro ba gang gi phyogs la gnas/ /yon
32a1(mdo sde): tan mi 'bral yon tan can/ /yon tan med dang yon tan gnas/ /ma yin phan tshun 'brel bas na/ /yon tan tshogs su rnam par gnas//
32a2(mdo sde): nor pa sna tshogs de bzhin du/ /ga la'ang de bzhin gnas yin nam/ /'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /sa rnams la ni gang snang ba/ /'on tam tshangs pas phyung
32a3(mdo sde): ba'am/ /'gro ba mthu bo che yis sam/ /khyu mchog gis sam spun zas sam/ /ser skya yis sam rang gis sam/ /gces pa'i rkyen gyis byas sam pa/ /rang bzhin
32a4(mdo sde): gyis sam dbang pos sam/ /dus dang phyogs kyis bskyed pa'am/ /'on tam ma rig sred pas sam/ /lha yi drang srong the tshom za/ /lha yi tshogs kyang de bzhin
32a5(mdo sde): te| |grub dang dri za'i rgyal po rnams/ /sa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /'on tam 'di dag mig 'phrul lam/ /'gro ba dri za 'dra zhig gam/ /rmi lam yin nam
32a6(mdo sde): smig rgyu'am/ /sngon med rnam par rtog yin nam/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang / /kha gnyis sprul bzhin gnas pa'am/ /'on tam rang bzhin 'di med
32a7(mdo sde): dam/ /'khrul 'khor ro langs bzhin gnas sam/ /mgal pa bskor ba 'dra ba'am/ /'on tam skra'i tshogs lta bu'am/ /byed dang las kyis ma byas shing / /dbang po
32b1(mdo sde): ku be ras ma byas/ /mchod sbyin sbyin sreg mchod 'bras sam/ /smrang gi gzhung gi lam gyis sam/ /rgyu rnams shin tu phal che bas/ /nan tan rtag pa ma yin te/ /'gro ba
32b2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa med pa'ang min/ /rgyu rnams kyi yang rgyu dag ste/ /'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ /las kyi bag chags rnams las byung / /rnam shes brgyad po'i skyes bu ni/ /kun gzhi
32b3(mdo sde): zhes kyang bya ba ste/ /des ni sna tshogs 'di dag kun/ /rdza ma'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du bskor/ /til bkrum til mar ji bzhin du/ /lan tshwa'i tsha bro ji lta bar/ /gzugs la
32b4(mdo sde): mi rtag nyid ji bzhin/ /skyes bu 'di yang de bzhin gnas/ /ji ltar bsung la sogs las dri/ /yon tan rnams la yon tan mtshan/ /nyi zla gnyis kyi 'od zer bzhin/ /de
32b5(mdo sde): ltar skyes bu gnas pa yin/ /dgos dang byed pa med pa ste/ /yod dang med kyi phyogs kyis spangs/ /gcig dang tha dad med pa ste/ /mur 'dug phyogs kyis rnam par
32b6(mdo sde): spangs/ /rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa med/ /nam yang rnam par mi brtag ste/ /grol ba'i so so rang rig pa/ /sangs rgyas sar skyes thub can gyi/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa
32b7(mdo sde): ste/ /snga med sems dang sems byung gis/ /rnam shes brgyad dang bral ba ste/ /nam yang rnam par mi brtag pa'o/ /de la gnas pa chu rlabs bzhin/ /phan tshun mtshan
33a1(mdo sde): nyid tha mi dad/ /'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa ste/ /de yi ldan pa rig pa min/ /ji ltar thub pa'i rnal 'byor dang / /rdzu 'phrul can gyi rdzu 'phrul
33a2(mdo sde): bzhin| |mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu mthong / /rnal 'byor 'gro ba gzhan gyis min/ /de bzhin 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnams/ /de dag kun gzhi lhan cig gnas/ /
33a3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong / /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras de bzhin/ /des ni 'di dag thams cad kyang / /ji ltar nor bu phug pa rnams/ /skud la brgyus dang
33a4(mdo sde): 'khor lo bzhin/ /las kyi rlung gis skor byed pa/ /ji ltar rdza mkhan 'khor lo dang / /lag dang thal sbyor bskor ba yis/ /kun tu bskor cing snod byed pa/ /yon tan sna
33a5(mdo sde): tshogs rnam par ldan/ /de bzhin rnam shes brgyad kyi mi/ /khams kyi gzugs brnyan lhan cig tu/ /sa ni rnam par byed pa ste/ /phyi nang rgyu ba'i 'gro ba rnams/ /gang la
33a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di dag kun/ /nam mkha' skar tshogs ji bzhin du/ /gnas shing rnam pa sna tshogs gnas/ /rlung gi rta yis shin tu bskor/ /ji ltar mkha' la bya rnams
33a7(mdo sde): kyi| |rjes ni snang ba ma yin te/ /bar snang yod pa ma yin na'ang / /bya rnams rgyu ba'i byed pa med/ /de bzhin rnam par shes pa'i mi/ /bdag yod ma yin gzhan med min//
33b1(mdo sde): rnam dag par snang 'dra ba dang / /dpa' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung / /bag chags rnam pa'i nyes pa yis/ /mi chags pad+mo'i zla ba bzhin/ /pad+mo la ni chu med min/ /chu la
33b2(mdo sde): zla gzugs med pa yang / /chu song zla ba yod pa ste/ /pad+mo'i 'dab la de bzhin chu/ /mig la bud med gzhon nu dag /mig gis mthong ba jir mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin kun
33b3(mdo sde): gzhi rnam par shes/ /las rnams cig car byed pa ste/ /'gro ba dag gi lus la ni/ /khyab gnas sa bon kun can no/ /stug po'i sprin dang 'dra bar yang / /sa rnams yog
33b4(mdo sde): par shin tu gnas/ /tshe dang rnam shes kun nas yog /drod kyang de bzhin stobs chen gyis/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi lus can gyi/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs kyang
33b5(mdo sde): ston/ /rdza mkhan ji ltar sa snod la/ /spyod pa ji bzhin de lta'o/ /ba lang sogs pa'i rwa mthong zhing / /bong bu rwa ni med pa ste/ /ma mthong bar ni med pa med/ /ba lang
33b6(mdo sde): rwa yi med pa yang / /phyin ci log tu dmigs pas med/ /phyin ci log tu mnar sems la/ /shin tu phra ba'i rdul gshig na/ /yod pa de dag med par 'gro/ /med pa
33b7(mdo sde): yod pa'i rgyu las te/ /med pa yod ces rtog pa ni/ /yod pa med las bltos pa ste/ /phan tshun ltos pa'i rgyu las so/ /blo dang rtogs bya med pa ste/ /khong du chud pa skye
34a1(mdo sde): med/ /mgal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor lo min/ /ji ltar skra tshogs mthong ba bzhin/ /dri za'i grong khyer sgyu ma dag /ci zhig mthong nas 'byung ba
34a2(mdo sde): bzhin/ /blo yi 'byung ba rgyu med par/ /yod pa ma yin rnam rtog pa/ /rtog bya rnam par rtog pas bskyed/ /lus can rnams kyi yid skyes te/ /ming dang 'du shes
34a3(mdo sde): 'brel ba dang / /rang bzhin gnyis kyi bag chags kyi/ /mi yi sems ni rab tu 'byung / /grub pa'i don ni mi skye'o/ /thog ma med pa'i dus na bsags/ /gnas ngan
34a4(mdo sde): len gyi yul las byung / /rab tu spros pas bsgos yid las/ /sems kyi tshogs ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por yang / /kun tu skye ba mi yi
34a5(mdo sde): sems/ /rdza la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi dbyibs/ /snang ba gzhan yod ma yin te/ /'di dag thams cad blo tsam pas/ /rtogs bya'i dngos po yod pa min/ /blo dang rtogs
34a6(mdo sde): bya'i dngos por ni/ /bdag nyid rab tu 'jug pa ste/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi rigs pa/ /bag chags rnams kyis sems myos rnams/ /rnam pa brgyad dang rnam
34a7(mdo sde): bdun dang / /dus gcig tu yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sngon med bag chags ldan pas na/ /kun gzhi sa bon thams cad can/ /rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ji bzhin du/ /
34b1(mdo sde): rlung gi rkyen gyis bskyod pa ltar/ /gar byed cing ni rab tu 'byung / /rnam par rgyun kyang mi 'chad do/ /blo yi 'od pa de bzhin rtag /yul dang reg pas bskul ba'i phyir/ /sna tshogs
34b2(mdo sde): bdag rtog rnam shes kyis/ /bdag la bdag gir 'dzin par byed/ /ji ltar sa la rnam rtog med/ /'gyur med rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /dgos pa'i rnam par gyur pa
34b3(mdo sde): ni| |de 'dra kun gzhi rnam shes la'o/ /ji ltar mi zhig lag pa yis/ /rang gi lus la mnyed pa dang / /phyogs kyi glang po bdag lus la/ /bdag gis sna yis chu 'thor
