34b4(mdo sde): dang | |ji ltar shed can la la dag / bdag gi lus la sos 'debs pa/ /de bzhin blo ni brtags don la/ /don gnyis tshul du 'jug pa'o/ /blo yi yul du bya ba 'di/ /khams
34b5(mdo sde): gsum rnam par khyab par gnas/ /phyi dang nang gi bya bar yang / /rnal 'byor mkhas pas mthong ba yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di kun gzigs/ /sa la ji
34b6(mdo sde): snyed snang ba dag / rnam pa sna tshogs dbyibs kyi gzugs/ /sa la rnam pa sna tshogs so/ /chos 'di yang dag bshad pa dang / /rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa/ /mi smra'i
34b7(mdo sde): dngos la dag rgyur te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos dbyings kyi/ /lha yi bsam gtan mi g.yo ba/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa dang / /stug po nas ni 'ongs pa'i
35a1(mdo sde): gzugs/ /mthong nas rnal 'byor lam gnas pa/ /thub pa de yi lha rdzas lus/ /rnal 'byor btang ste yang gnas so/ /'dod dang gzug
35a2(mdo sde): dang gzugs med dang / /'du shes med pa'i gnas rnams kyi/ /mun pa'i tshogs nas phyir byung ste/ /stug po de nas 'dir 'ongs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bzhugs
35a3(mdo sde): pa'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni mchog rab nas/ /gzugs kyi rnam pa du ma yi/ /sangs rgyas sku yang rnam byung nas/ /mi yi khams na rnam par 'phrul/ /su blo ci
35a4(mdo sde): 'dod phan par ro/ /stug po yi ni ming phyung nas/ /rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad kyang / /phan tshun gcig la gcig bltas te/ /gcig la gcig ni rab smras pa/ /
35a5(mdo sde): stug po dri med bsod nams te/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ /rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog /sangs rgyas zhing gi dam pa phul/ /yu bus de yi sgra
35a6(mdo sde): thos te/ /thos nas bdag cag dga' ba'i yid/ /stug po rnal 'byor can gnas kyi/ /brtan lam bdag cag thob par bya/ 'og min tshangs pa thor tshugs can/ /
35a7(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i gnas kyis rnam spangs pa/ /zhing gi ngo mtshar ltad mo dang / /sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i sras kyi yab/ /tshangs pas de tshe gsol nas su/ /gtsang ma'i
35b1(mdo sde): gnas kyi 'jigs med rnams/ /de dag thams cad sems pa ni/ /tshangs pa stug por 'gro mi 'gro/ /tshangs pa rnal 'byor chen po can/ /mun pas de dag bslad par
35b2(mdo sde): gyur| |thub pa mi shes thub rig gi/ ji ltar gnas ni thob par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa de na kun tu sems/ /blo yis tshangs par rig pa'i mchog /'dod dang gzugs kyi
35b3(mdo sde): bdag po dag / rgyu ba de na med pa ste/ /nam mkha' khang pa gnas rnams dang / 'du shes med pa de bzhin te/ /mur 'dug gzhan la grags pa yi/ /rnal 'byor can
35b4(mdo sde): rnams der mi 'gro/ /bdag gis bya ba byas sam ci/ /bsams te 'dir yang 'ongs par gyur/ /bdag 'gro'ang brtan zhing rtag pa yi/ /ther zug 'dus ma byas stug
35b5(mdo sde): tu| |gal te yang na thub pa de/ /rnal 'byor mnga' ba lha'i yang lha'i/ /mthu yis rnal 'byor mkhyen rnams kyi/ /pho brang stug po der 'gro'am/ /thub pa de la phyag
35b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de skad smras nas thor tshugs can/ /mthong ba shin tu 'bar ba yi/ /sangs rgyas lam na bzhugs pa rnams/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig thub pa'i
35b7(mdo sde): rnams/ /khyed la rtsi 'tshal ci gyis shig /sangs rgyas dbang po bka' stsal gsol/ /stug po ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs yul 'di las phyir log gcig
36a1(mdo sde): der 'gro med pa gzugs can rnams/ /stug po de ni thub chen yul/ /bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas zhing / /'du shes med pas mi 'thob
36a2(mdo sde): ste| |de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams dbang gi / mur 'dug gzhan na grags pas kyang / /rnal 'byor rig lam stug mi 'thob/ /tshangs pa nyid kyis de gsung thos/ /
36a3(mdo sde): mchod sbyin gsol ba'i zhal na ste/ /de ni de nas phyir log ste/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su yang song ngo / /de yi phyir na der 'gro ba/ /tshangs pa yis kyang mi thob pas/ /
36a4(mdo sde): gzugs med 'dod dang gzugs can rnams/ /der 'gro yod pa yod ma yin/ /ci phyir dad pa 'di 'dra rnyed/ /stug po'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba yang / /rnal 'byor can
36a5(mdo sde): gyi gnas kyi mchog / de phyir ngo mtshar thob par gyur/ /sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul/ /rnal 'byor can gnas stug po de/ /'di ni gcig nas gcig tu thos/ /de nas
36a6(mdo sde): byung bas rnam par bsnyad/ /sna tshogs tshig 'di thos pa ni/ /thub can rdo rje snying po yi/ /rgyal sras khyod kyis smra bar gyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod/ /
36a7(mdo sde): dbang sgyur rgyal po de bzhin gyis/ /gzi brjid chen po ma thogs shig /mtshe ma rab dang dga' ldan dang / /gtsang gnas 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/ /thub pa'i
36b1(mdo sde): bka' ni ma lus par/ /smra bar su zhig nus pa yod/ /gzhan du khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams/ /thub chen thub pa bsnams pa dag /sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab/ /
36b2(mdo sde): mchog gi gtso bos sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor med pa la/ /su yis ji ltar bstan par nus/ /mtshe ma rab dang shugs 'dzin dang / /dbang sgyur rgyal
36b3(mdo sde): ba'i sras po dag / gcig pa'i dbyangs su yang smras te/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras/ /rnam par 'phrul dang 'jam dpal dang / /byams pa mi'am
36b4(mdo sde): ci yi bdag / rnal 'byor can gzhan gang de ni/ /de dag smra ba smros shig sgrogs/ /nam mkha' las kyang sgra byung ste/ /lha dang sngags 'chang rnams kyis kyang / /de nas
36b5(mdo sde): shin tu rnga brdungs pa/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal ba'i sras/ /de dag de skad smra ba na/ /thor tshugs can gyi tshangs pa 'ongs/ /sa 'khod kun las smras pa ni/ /
36b6(mdo sde): stan gyi mchog la 'dug nas de/ /ngo mtshar lha rdzas 'di ci zhig /thub pa rnams kyi tshogs 'khor na/ /rnal 'byor dbang po thams cad dang / /slob ma mkhas pa
36b7(mdo sde): de dag kyang / /khyu mchog thub la 'dri bar 'dod/ /rgyal sras rdo rje dbang po la/ /skabs 'di ji zhig su zhig la/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsungs pa yin/ /ku ru'i bu
37a1(mdo sde): dang di li pa/ /'khor lo 'khor ba man mtha' ste/ /yang na yo ba na shwa la/ /lha rdzas mi yi gtam brjod dam/ /gnyi bu ig shwa ku la'am/ /
37a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gzhu stong bdog pa la'am/ /'on tam gnas srung po la'am/ /'khor lo 'khor ba gzhan dag la'am/ /'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med la'am/ /
37a3(mdo sde): 'du shes med gnas gnas pa la'am/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas rnam shes sam/ /'on te cung zad med pa dag /thub chen rang sangs rgyas dag la'am/ /nyan thos
37a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras la 'am/ /sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa yi/ /rgyal dbang rnams la gtam 'di 'am/ /'di ci lha min lha rdzas sam/ /'on te skar ma'i de bzhin nam/ /
37a5(mdo sde): ji ltar gyur ba khyod kyis gsungs/ /bdag cag slob ma phyogs su nyan/ /bla ma'i tshig ni thos nas kyang / /rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad dag /phan tshun shin tu dpyod
37a6(mdo sde): par byed/ /de yi ting 'dzin 'gro song rnams/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams tshig thos pa/ /thor tshugs can las mngon du ste/ /slob ma bcas par nyan 'dod pa/ /gtsang
37a7(mdo sde): gnas bdag po nyid kyang yin/ /thar zla blo gros mi zad dang / /nam mkha'i dbang po 'gro ba 'dzin/ /mthu chen spyan ras gzigs dbang dang / /rnal 'byor shes pa
37b1(mdo sde): gzungs kyi dbang / /lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor dbang / /gtsug na rin chen blo gros shing / /lag na rdo rje zhi ba'i blo/ /lag na rin chen blo chen dang / /'di dag rgyal sras gzhan dag
37b2(mdo sde): kyang / /bye ba'i zhing rnams kun nas 'ongs/ /rdo rje'i snying po blo can la/ /de dag kun gyis rnam bltas nas/ /pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa'i rnams/ /rgyal ba'i sras la gsol ba
37b3(mdo sde): 'debs/ /blo chen rab tu bshad par gyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod/ /'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs tshul/ /da ltar byung ba'i gang tshig kyang / /rgyu dang dpe yis rab
37b4(mdo sde): gsal bar/ /khyod kyi zhal nas byung ba rnams/ /gdon mi za ba'i tshig 'di yang / /khyod kyis rgyal ba de zhal nas/ /thams cad ma lus thos pa ste/ /skyon med de bzhin gshegs
37b5(mdo sde): pa'i mkhyen/ /ting 'dzin dbang sgyur rgyal po yis/ /thams cad blo gros rnam bltas nas/ /rdo rje snying po 'jigs med kyis/ /rnal 'byor can la tshig smras pa/ /rgyal ba'i
37b6(mdo sde): gsung rab ma lus par/ /smra bar sus kyang nus pa med/ /de yi byin rlabs ma gtogs par/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal
37b7(mdo sde): te| |sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa dag / nor bu rin chen sna tshogs khang / /dbang sgyur gnas bzang 'khod rnams la'ang / /ye shes dad pas smra bar bya/ /sangs
38a1(mdo sde): rgyas rigs byed tshul yin te/ /nga las 'di dag thams cad nyon/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes dge /rgyal po rnams la gtam 'di
38a2(mdo sde): min/ /mi bdag mchog rnams 'das pa yang / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs kyi gtam/ /stug dkyil phun sum tshogs rnams kyi/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor
38a3(mdo sde): yul/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi ye shes phra/ /rtog med rtog pa spangs pa ste/ /so so rang rig mkhas pa'i yul/ /brjod pa
38a4(mdo sde): dang ni rnam par bral/ /de ni smra bar dad pa med/ /bdag gis de yi mthu thos pa/ /lha rdzas kyi ni ye shes dang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi me tog gis/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs
38a5(mdo sde): rgyas gsungs pa ni/ /stug po'i dkyil du mnyam bzhag pas/ /thams cad phyogs las rnam grol zhing / /yod dang med pa'i phyogs spangs pa/ /yod dang med pa'i
38a6(mdo sde): phyogs dang bral/ /dbu ma'i lam ni dge ba ste/ gzhan du 'gyur ba'i lha rdzas tshul/ /sangs rgyas sa la 'jug par byed/ /dbu ma'i lam po de nyid kyang / /mtha' bzhi
38a7(mdo sde): rnam par spangs pa ste/ /rnam par rtog med dmigs med pa/ /stug na gnas pas shin tu mthong / /thub chen de nyid la ma shes pa/ /bdag med ye shes mkhas rnams
38b1(mdo sde): kyis/ /bla ma'i tshig 'di thob pa dang / /rnal 'byor can rnams thams cad kyang / /rkang pa gnyis la mnyam btud nas/ /rdo rje zhes la smras pa ni/ /rnal 'byor can rnams nyan
38b2(mdo sde): par brtson/ /skom pa rnams ni chu 'tshol bzhin/ /khyod kyi zhal nas btung 'dod pa/ /tshig gi sprang rtsi bung ba bzhin/ /rnal 'byor dbang po yang dag gsungs/ /rgyal ba'i
38b3(mdo sde): sras rnams shin tu nyan/ /rnal 'byor can rnams rnal 'byor blo/ /ye shes dbang po 'phrul chen rnams/ /zhing gi bdag po rgyal chen rnams/ /rnal 'byor lam la rtog
38b4(mdo sde): byed pa/ /bde gshegs bka' ni nyan par ro/ /khyod kyi zhal nas rnam byung ba/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dka' ba'i sgra/ /khong du chud byed mtshan bzang dang / /tshangs pa'i yang dag
38b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang / /dbang po'i don grags khyad par du'o/ /sna tshogs thub pa de yi gsung / /sgra yi don la mkhas pa yi/ /de phyir bdag ni smras ma mos/ /brtag bya rtog
38b6(mdo sde): pa rnam par spangs/ /par snang ri mo ji bzhin dang / /grib ma stong la sogs pas spangs/ /de ste snang na rmad du rung / /de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'/ /mkha' la
38b7(mdo sde): bya rjes ji bzhin du/ /blta bar shin tu dkon pa bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i bka'/ /de ni bstan par mi nus so/ /sa rnams gsum du mkhas pa yis/ /dpe
39a1(mdo sde): yis kun tu rab bstan gyis/ /dpe dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid/ /thub pa'i zhal nas rnam par byung / /de yi tshig la dpe med de/ /rmi lam lta bur
39a2(mdo sde): bdag la snang / /rab rib mgal pa bskor ba dang / /skra yi tshogs dang ji bzhin 'dra/ /ji ltar sgyu ma'i grong khyer dang / /rlung ni shin tu blta dka' dang / /sgyu ma smig rgyu
39a3(mdo sde): 'dra ba ste/ /rnam rtog gnyis po rab tu spangs/ /'on tam rnal 'byor sna tshogs pa/ /thub pa'i gsung ni de bzhin te/ /bdag gis rnal 'byor can dbus su/ /bshad par
39a4(mdo sde): de phyir dad pa med/ /'di dag thams cad mkhas pa ste/ /de bzhin nyid blo shes pa'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul bsam yas pa/ /de phyir smra bar dad pa med/ /
39a5(mdo sde): 'on kyang brjod do thub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /de ring bdag las nyon cig rgyal sras rnams/ /sna tshogs tshig gi don ldan thub pa'i bka'/ /dpe med sems dang
39a6(mdo sde): yid las rnam par 'das/ /ji ltar bung bas me tog ro 'thungs shing / /lhag ma gzhan dag 'thung bar byed pa bzhin/ /snying khu thub pa'i mchog rnams kyis 'thungs
39a7(mdo sde): te| |de yi 'thungs lhag bdag gis de ring bshad/ /de ni yid dang tshig gis kyang / /bstan par nus pa ma yin la/ /lha yi lha yi yul yin te/ /mkhas rnams dge ba
39b1(mdo sde): 'phel bar byed/ /mi yi gzugs su byas nas su/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni mtshan ldan pa/ /cod pan can dang gzhan la snang / /gzhan med khang gnas gzhan la yang /
39b2(mdo sde): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / /mtshan bzang rnam pa sna tshogs su/ /sa la sna tshogs snang ba ni/ /mur 'dug 'dus pa'i dregs pa sel/ /dus rnams bzhi po
39b3(mdo sde): thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dus dus la/ /stug na bzhugs pas dus sprul te/ /rnam par phye ba rab tu mdzad/ /bzang dus de bzhin gsum pa dang / /gnyis
39b4(mdo sde): kyi pha rol dus ngan dang / /de dag tu yang ci dgos pa/ /sa la lus can rnams kyis te/ /ldan pa de dag thams cad mdzad/ /stug po'i dkyil na bzhugs shing ste/ /
39b5(mdo sde): stug po de ni dri med gnas/ /sbyor chen rnams kyi bde ba'i gzhi/ /ngan dang gnyis kyi pha rol mtshams/ /thub pa gzugs ni rnam bzung nas/ /dri med stug na rnal
39b6(mdo sde): 'byor ldan/ /zla ba bzhin du 'gro la snang / /sna tshogs 'gro ba gang shes kyis/ /sna tshogs gzugs su mdzes pa ni/ /gang la gang snang gang gis kyang / /ji ltar gang la
39b7(mdo sde): de ba de ba/ /de dag de la thams cad du/ /de phyir cha yis mig la gnas/ /shes can yul can thub pa ni/ /rnal 'byor mkhyen pa shes pas snang / /dbang po che gzugs
40a1(mdo sde): gzhan dag dang / /'jug 'dod kyi dang de bzhin gzhan/ /ser skya yi yang gzugs su ste/ /thub pa la lar mkha' bzhugs pa/ /shes byed shes
40a2(mdo sde): la yang dag snang / /sa nad sa nan da na la/ /sa nad gzhon nu me dag dang / /sgra gcan mi ci tum bu ru/ /ig shwa ku dang / zla ba'i rigs/ /thams cad sa yi rgyal po la/ /
40a3(mdo sde): thams cad sa yang mchod pa ste/ /sku ni su su ci 'dod bzhin/ la lar mur 'dug spyod sprul te/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong / /tshul gyi gtsug lag ston par
40a4(mdo sde): yang / /ci bzhin rigs par rab ston cing / /rdo rje dngul dang gser dag dang / /zangs dang lcags kyi 'byung khungs dang / /ro nye zha nye mu tig dang / /pad+ma rA dang an+da rnyil/ /
40a5(mdo sde): bai DUr+ya dang shel dag dang / /a sma garba mu sa ra/ /tshul dang rtag pa thams cad ldan/ /mkhan po bla ma kun 'gro dang / /gang gis lus can su su cir/ /sa la bde ba
40a6(mdo sde): skye ba bzhin/ /de la de bde thams cad du/ /thub pa'i rnal 'byor rab las byung / lha yi bu mos mi spyod do/ /de bzhin dri za'i bud med kyis/ /'dod khams dbang po'i
40a7(mdo sde): bud med dang / /de bzhin klu yi bud med kyis/ /mi ci lha min bu mo dang / /gnod sbyin bu mos de bzhin no/ /de ni 'dod pa'i yul las rgyal/ /gzugs can rnams
40b1(mdo sde): kyi yul de bzhin/ /nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang / /cung zad med pa'ang de bzhin te/ /'du shes yod mi na ma yin gyi/ /gnas na rnam par rmongs pa med/ /kun tu la
40b2(mdo sde): sogs 'di dag lam/ /rnal 'byor can gyi 'ching ba'i dngos/ /ma zhi mi dge gzhan dag kyang / /srog chags rnams kyi sa yod pa/ /lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul/ /stug
40b3(mdo sde): kyi zhing rab ste/ /stug po de ni yun du rtag /mnga' rnams bcu po de dag dang / /stobs dang mngon mkhyen ting nge 'dzin/ /yid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i skus/ /sangs rgyas de na rnam
40b4(mdo sde): par mdzes/ /sa rnams bcu po kun bsgoms te/ /rnam thar bden pa stong pa nyid/ /mtshan med smon pa med pa dang / /pha rol phyin drug de bzhin te/ /bsgom dang sbyin dang
40b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / /shes rab rnams kyis de sku 'thob/ /yan lag gzugs kun me tog gi /'dus ma byas pa sangs rgyas sku'o/ /rtog med rtog dang bral ba ste/ /bdag
40b6(mdo sde): med yid dang dbang po rnams/ /shes rab dbang po'i sgor ldan zhing / /mtshan gyis kun nas shin tu bsags/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs kyi/ /dkar po'i las rnams
41a1(mdo sde): byas pas na/ /sangs rgyas sku yi gnas kyi mchog /stug po'i ris su 'thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas gnas/ /nyi zla rnam
41a2(mdo sde): par spangs pa ste/ /rgyu skar skar phran snang ba dang / /zla ba dus dang ltad mo med/ /rnal 'byor can gyi 'od 'char dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od kyis kyang / /kun nas
41a3(mdo sde): bzang po'i stug po de/ /nyi ma bzhin du kun nas snang / /dus kyi 'bri ba de na med/ /nad rnams gang yang yod pa min/ /'chi rga med pa'i gnas yin te/ /stug po de ni
41a4(mdo sde): zhing gi mchog / thams cad gzugs ldan zhi ba'i gnas/ /dri med mthong ba'i chos can gyi/ /sangs rgyas zhing stug bsod nams te/ /lha rnams kun gyis smon par bya/ /
41a5(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can rnams khyad par du/ /sa dang sa la gnas pa dag /sems tsam rang bzhin dngos po rnams/ /gang phyir rab tu bstan pas na/ /yid dang sems dang
41a6(mdo sde): kun gzhi'i tshul/ /rang bzhin gsum po de bzhin te/ /chos la bdag med rang bzhin can/ /gnas ni gzhan du 'gyur pa ste/ /lus ni shin tu gnas gyur pas/ /
41a7(mdo sde): thub pa rnams ni der 'dong ste/ /rnal 'byor can gyi gnas kyi mchog /stug po zhing rab dam par ro/ /stug por 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// //
41b1(mdo sde): lus ni rdzas dgu'i rang bzhin can/ /'dus byas rdul phran tshogs yin te/ /yon tan tshogs kyis rnam sna tshogs/ /'byung dang 'byung gnas tshogs yin te/ /khu chu khrag
41b2(mdo sde): las kun 'byung ba/ /sngon med rnam par 'phel pa ste/ /stong gzugs 'og tu 'gro ba yin/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor thog ma med/ /las kyi rnam pa brgyas kyang g.yog /
41b3(mdo sde): dug gi shing gis sa bzhin du/ /dpa' dang rdul gyis de bzhin du/ /mun pas kyang ni gsos pa ste/ /lam rgyud dog par shin tu 'phyan/ /dus kyis bskul cing rab tu skye/ /
41b4(mdo sde): yon tan las kyis 'da' ba ni/ /phyugs dang mi yi mngal skyes pas/ /klu dang yi dwags sha za dang / /'bar ba lha yi nang du yang / /skye 'am lha min 'jig rten nam/ /sngags
41b5(mdo sde): 'chang rigs su de bzhin te/ /'on tam rnal 'byor can dbus su/ /bsam gtan zhig cing mngon skye ba/ /'khor lo 'khor rigs dam par yang / /bar bar du ni skye bar
41b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /skyes nas rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ /gang tshe dbang po 'phel ba na/ /su yi gang gi gang tshe las/ /lhan cig skyes pa rab byung zhing / /lhan cig skyes pa'i las tshul
41b7(mdo sde): gyis/ /lam dang lam du rab tu 'jug /brtag med rtog dang bral ba yi/ /gang tshe chos ni mngon rtogs na/ /thar pa rnams kyi thar gsum ste/ /yi ge yi ge med byas
42a1(mdo sde): pa'o/ /'byung ba thams cad rgyu yi tshogs/ /de ni 'od snang mchog yin te/ /yang dag bla nas blar sbyangs pa/ /stug po'i dkyil na rnam
42a2(mdo sde): par gnas/ /bye ba'i zhing dang mnyam lus kyis/ /sprul pas khyab par byas shing gnas/ /de ste de shes yod na ni/ /dog pa'i lam nas 'grol bar 'gyur/ /de lta'i
42a3(mdo sde): skyes bu skyes pa ni/ /khyad par shes zhes rnam par brjod/ /lha yi lha yis yang dag gsungs/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas shing / /mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba
42a4(mdo sde): ni| |byas pa yin no mi rnams kyi/ /ma rig sred dang las skyes min/ /nyon mongs las las shin tu byung / /mtshan ma med pa mngon gyur cing / /mtshan ma med las
42a5(mdo sde): rab 'das te/ /yi ge med pa de byung nas/ /spros pa thams cad rab bral zhing / /stug po'i dkyil du rab tu 'gro/ /dmigs las sems zhig 'gyur ba ni/ /rnal 'byor
42a6(mdo sde): can gyi sgra rmongs pas/ /rtsed mo la sogs lha rdzas dang / /mtho ris bud med bsten rmongs kyis/ /gang tshe thub chen ma 'dug pa/ /de tshe sems ni 'byung ba ste/ /lam
42a7(mdo sde): las skyod ces bya ba yi/ /ting 'dzin 'dod pa'i khams skyes pa/ /gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba na/ /ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu skye/ /sems can 'du shes med song
42b1(mdo sde): na| |ting nge 'dzin las bral bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin la dbang med 'gyur/ /rgyas la gang tshe thub dbang gyur/ /gnyis dang
42b2(mdo sde): bral bas byang ba yi/ /sems ni mngon par mi 'byung ngo / /de bden de ni rnal 'byor te/ /bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan yin/ /bsam gtan rtag tu bsam gtan bya/ /
42b3(mdo sde): de ste stug dkyil 'dod na'o/ /mngal gyi skye ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //rnam brgyad rnam pa dgu yi sems/ /ma rig 'jig rten rgyu yin
42b4(mdo sde): te| |'di ni sems dang sems 'byung mthu/ /gang gnas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/ /de yi mthus kyang 'jug pa ni/ /rnam shes rnams dang dbang po rnams/ /ma rig la sogs
42b5(mdo sde): rnam pa 'di/ /rtsa ba'i sems ni brtan gnas pa/ /yan lag bcu gnyis thams cad dang / /'byung ba rnams dang 'byung gnas dang / /yul dang dbang po 'jig rten
42b6(mdo sde): dang / /skad cig 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no/ /thub pa lha yi lhas gsungs pa/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pa ste/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug gi/ 'gro ba dbang por
42b7(mdo sde): bcas pa 'di/ /'jig rten btsal bas ma bskyed de/ /bdag nyid rdza ma bzhin 'jig pa/ /nang dang phyi dag rtag par te/ /'gro ba gnas dang g.yo ba dag /lha yi lha yi yul
43a1(mdo sde): yin te/ /sa la sus kyang mi mthong ba/ /mur 'dug grags pa gzhan dag ste/ /thub grags mtshan ma can gyis so/ /phan tshun bcings pas bcings
43a2(mdo sde): pa ni/ /sred pa sna tshogs rnam pas te/ /rnam shes myur du 'gro bas na/ /sems kyi rnam par mi rtogs so/ /lo stong mtha' ru thug pa yi/ /mchod sbyin rnams kyis tshangs
43a3(mdo sde): pa'i thabs/ /thob nas slar du ldog pa ni/ /sa ma ya ru rigs sems pa/ /'dod sbyor bkag srog 'bras bu dang / /gang yang zla ba'i 'bras bu dang / /mer gzhug
43a4(mdo sde): pa yi 'bras bu dang / /gang gzhan mchod sbyin 'bras bu dang / /phyugs bcing ba yi 'bras bu yang / /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas ldog go/ /chos gsum can gyi 'gro ba
43a5(mdo sde): dag / ci nyes mi rig thor tshugs can/ /yon tan gsum gyi 'bru 'brel ba/ /chu skyes bzhin du snying po med/ /'di yis thar pa mi rnyed pa/ /stug po de bzhin gshegs
43a6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas/ /de ni rnal 'byor gyis 'thob ste/ /stug po rnal 'byor rig pa'i gnas/ /de bas tshul gcig tshangs pa'i bdag /rnal 'byor can rnams 'jug brtson
43a7(mdo sde): par/ /'di la bdag gnyen gang dag kyang / /skye zhing 'chi ba yong med de/ /mi chod gzhig tu med pa ni/ /lus can kun gyi rnam par shes/ /bag chags kyis ni mi gos
43b1(mdo sde): pa| |sngon med dus nas byung bas so/ /yid kyi gnas ngan len bsags pa'i/ /spros pas kyang ngo cir mi 'jug /ji ltar lha rdzas chu skyes dang / /nam mkha' la yang phyag dar
43b2(mdo sde): dang / /sprin gyi dri mas nyi zla la/ /de bzhin mi gos rnal 'byor can/ /ma bshol rab tu brtson par gyis/ /thams cad sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /rnal 'byor bde gshegs
43b3(mdo sde): lha yi rdzas/ /rnal 'byor can gyi tshul bskyed pa/ /tshul khrims can gyi tshul 'thungs te/ /ye shes can gyis shes 'thungs shing / /mchog gi ye shes 'thungs nas kyang / /'khor
43b4(mdo sde): ba las ni 'da' bar gyis/ /'di la khams rnams gang yang med/ /phung po lnga dang rnam shes kyang / /ming dang gzugs dag rgyur byas shing / /lus can rnams kyi yid kyang
43b5(mdo sde): skye| |ji ltar me ni shing dbang gis/ /'bar te 'bar bar rtog pa med/ /de bzhin phung po shing rta stong / /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /ri dwags sred dang dri za yi/ /gnas
43b6(mdo sde): dang skra tshogs snang ba ru/ /ri dwags bus pa la sogs mthong / /yang dag ma yin ltas bslad pas/ /de bzhin yul las byung ba'i sems/ /khab long lta bur 'khor ba ste/ /
43b7(mdo sde): gang yang 'di la dngos med pa/ /'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba yo/ /g.yo ba dro ba bsher sra bar/ /bus pa rnams ni rtag tu rtog /'byung ba sems kyi tshogs las na/ /
44a1(mdo sde): ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /ji tsam ma zhig lus yod dang / /ji tsam du ni blo 'byung ba/ /de bar rnal 'byor ye shes la/ /ma bshol bsam
44a2(mdo sde): gtan rab tu gyis/ /thams cad sgyu ma rmi lam ltar/ /'byung ba gsum kun rab tu ltos/ /smig rgyu chu zla lta bu ni/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /ji bzhin dri za'i
44a3(mdo sde): grong khyer na/ /'gro ba'i spyod pa rnam par snang / /de bzhin lus la phung po'i spyod/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /rmi lam dag na 'gro ba'i tshogs/ /ji ltar rmi lam
44a4(mdo sde): rmi bas mthong / /de bzhin phung po'i gnas yin na/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /sa 'di sa la sogs pa'i tshogs/ /'dus pa rdul gyi phung po yin/ /'di sems
44a5(mdo sde): sems byung tshogs yin par/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun ltos shig /'byung ba chen po bzhi po rnams/ /phan tshun kun nas 'dus pa ste/ /gdeg pa la sogs
44a6(mdo sde): ldan pa yin/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /'di ni rlung dang mkhris pas myos/ /ro bslas lta bur gnas pa ste/ /byed pa gang yang yod pa min/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor
44a7(mdo sde): 'jug mi bya/ /dbu ba'i gong bu lta bu kun/ /'gro ba gnas shing g.yo ba'i rnams/ /smig rgyu 'dra ba'i 'du shes su/ /rdza la sogs pa shin tu rtogs/ /tshor ba chu bur lta bu
44b1(mdo sde): ste| / bde dang mi bder rtog pa yin/ /chu shing 'dra ba'i 'du byed rnams/ /zhig pa grugs pa snying po med/ /rnam par shes par sgyu ma 'dra/ /de yi dngos la gnas pa med/ /rtswa
44b2(mdo sde): shing gnas pa ji bzhin te/ /ci phyir rnal 'byor 'jug mi bya/ /'di ni rmi lam rnam myos 'di/ /'di ni sgyu ma bus pa 'drid/ /'di dag thams cad smig rgyu ste/ /de bzhin dri za'i
44b3(mdo sde): grong khyer ro/ /gang rgyan 'di dag snang ba yi/ /khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de kun blo yis rtogs bya ba/ /'jigs med rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /nyes pa'i rkyen
44b4(mdo sde): ni rtswa dang bcas/ /ye shes me yis rab bsregs na/ /lha rdzas bde ba yod par 'gro/ /rnal 'byor can gnas stug por yang / /'jigs med 'di ni mtshan ma med/ /mtshan
44b5(mdo sde): ma bcings pa'i ngo bo can/ /mtshan ma med pa rtag tu bde/ /mtshan ma sems kyi spyod yul lo/ /sems kyi spyod yul bden pa min/ /bden pa blo gros spyod yul te/ /
44b6(mdo sde): sems ni shes rab spyod yul te/ /mtshan mar gnas pa med pa'o/ /kye ma mtshan ma 'di kun yin/ /gnas gsum tshangs par bsgrags pa ste/ /mtshan ma ming dang yul
44b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / /sgra la sogs pa kun brjod pa'o/ /dbang po kun gyi yul rnams ni/ /lus can rnams kyi 'ching ba'i rgyu/ /'ching bar bya dang 'ching dang rgyu/ /gang 'grol gang
45a1(mdo sde): gis 'grol ba dang / /thar dang thar ba'i bde ba dang / mthong pa'i chos la gnas pa dang / /bdag med pa ru shes nyid kyang / /'dod chags bcom
45a2(mdo sde): par gyur pa na'o/ /de nas mi bdag rin chen gtsug /blo chen byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /rnal 'byor can kun dbang la smras/ /rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med la/ /
45a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i zhing rnams thams cad la/ /rgyal sras khyod ni brtson pa ste/ /rgyal ba rnams la khyod tshad de/ /rnal 'byor can la nye bar gnas/ /rnal 'byor the tshom bcad pa
45a4(mdo sde): ste| |dpe rnams grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /brtag bya yan lag thams cad dag /lus can rnams kyi lus skyes pa/ /tshul ni sgra yis brjod par mdzod/ /tshig tu brjod
45a5(mdo sde): par cir mi bgyi/ /gnad dang zung gis rnam par mdzod/ /mi zin pa yi rgyu rnams dang / /bgab zungs nor gyis gzhom par gyis/ /phung po'i rgyu rnams bsal bar
45a6(mdo sde): mdzod/ /yang dag 'gyur ba med pa dang / /dge ba yis kyang mkhas pas so/ /ring po mi thogs thar pa 'thob/ /phung po'i rgyu rnams bsregs nas su/ /chos min
45a7(mdo sde): chos kyi tshe 'byung ste/ /'di dang gzhan du'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /shes pas sdug bsngal rnams las 'grol/ /sred pa yis ni rtag tu bcings/ /mi shes las dang
45b1(mdo sde): sred pa yis/ /lus can rgya cher shin tu byas/ /gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang / /rnam shes yul la mngon gyur pas/ /myur phyir khong du mi chud pa/ /spyod yul
45b2(mdo sde): du ni sems rgyu ba'o/ /yid sngon 'gro ba chos rnams te/ /lus can kun gyi de bzhin no/ /yid 'gro yid ni gces pa dag/ yid du 'ong bas cir mi bshad/ /gang dang gang
45b3(mdo sde): gi rdzas kyis su/ /mi rnams stug por 'grub pa yi/ /des ni de yi dngos 'gyur pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu bzhin/ /ji ltar nor bu sna tshogs gzugs/ /tshon
45b4(mdo sde): dang 'byor na rnam par mdzes/ /rnal 'byor can dbus khyod de bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs gzugs sna tshogs kyis/ /dbang sgyur po brang dge ba na/ /thams cad dag na
45b5(mdo sde): snang ba ni/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi mdun du byas/ /mya ngan 'da' dang mya ngan 'das/ /stug po mthar mchog ye shes te/ /chos kyi dbyings dang rdzu 'phrul yang / /stug po rnal
45b6(mdo sde): 'byor can gyi gnas/ /de ni mtshon gyis mi chod de/ /de ni mes kyang mi tshig pa/ /mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa/ /de ni yul gnas rtag pa'o/ /de ni chus kyang mi gsher
45b7(mdo sde): te/ /rlung gis kyang ni mi skam mo/ /de ni rdza ltar 'jig pa dang / /nan tan byas shes byung ba min/ /rtag pa brtan pa mi 'jig pa/ /skye can kun gyi rnam par shes/ /rgyu
46a1(mdo sde): yis sun dbyung ma yin pa/ /'dra dang mi 'dra rnams kyi ste/ /dam bcas yan lag rnams kyi yang / /mtha' ma thug pa med par 'gyur/ /dam
46a2(mdo sde): bcas pa yi dam bca' dang / /rgyu yi khyad par rgyu dag ste/ /de bas de la rgal du med/ /rtog pa can gyi spyod yul min/ /rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur na/ /de ni stug po
46a3(mdo sde): sems spangs pa'o/ /rtog can rnams kyi yul ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang stug /ma skyes sngon dang tha ma med/ /lhun gyis grub pa'i stobs las
46a4(mdo sde): byung / /rgyu med pa dang las skyes min/ /dbang po chen pos byas pa'ang min/ /gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pa las/ /yang dag 'das te gnas pa yin/ /
46a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams las 'das nas su/ /gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes med/ /mun pa'i rgyu las rab 'das nas/ /stug po'i zhing ni rnam par mdzes/ /
46a6(mdo sde): phyogs 'di mkha' las grub pa ste/ /rgyu can rnams kyi spyod yul min/ /yod dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral/ /gcig dang gzhan pa spangs pa'o/ /gces pa dang
46a7(mdo sde): ni rang bzhin min/ /'dod rgyal dang yang dbang po min/ /khyu mchog gi yang phyogs ma yin/ /de bzhin rig can gsum gyi yang / /rdul gyi rkyen las byung ma yin/ /
46b1(mdo sde): sgra rnams kyis kyang brjod du med/ /ngo bo nyid kyis bskyed pa min/ /'dod rgyal gyis kyang mi rnyed do/ /ma rig las dang sred pas min/ /mi shes las kyang smos pa min/ /
46b2(mdo sde): khur med khur gyi yul yin te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul/ /lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs kyis mkhyen/ /sa bcu dag tu rnam par sbyangs/ /rnal 'byor can
46b3(mdo sde): gyi sna tshogs yul/ /don gyi dam pa ston pa'o/ /las ci las min gang zhes te/ /byis pa rnams ni myos par gyur/ /las dang las min bshad pa ni/ /rnal 'byor can
46b4(mdo sde): rnams bder gyur pa/ /sna tshogs snang ba rang sems te/ /lus can rnams kyi bdag nyid gnyis/ /phyi dang nang dang thams cad du/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa lta bur gnas/
46b5(mdo sde): sems kyis sems ni mthong yin yang / /khong du mi chud bus pa rnams/ /kha gnyis sems de lus can gyi/ /yin kyang shes par ma gyur pa/ /bdag gi byed pa'ang
46b6(mdo sde): de bzhin byed/ /yul lta bur yang rab tu snang / /rdza ma la sogs gzugs su gnas/ /rdza la sogs pa'ang yod pa min/ /'di yi don la thub pa dag /rnal 'byor
46b7(mdo sde): nyam chung rnam par myos/ /rnal 'byor de yang mi rtogs pa/ /bdag gi rnam rtog lam gnas pas/ /sems 'di gnyis ka'i bdag nyid de/ /me long zla ba bzhin
47a1(mdo sde): du gnas/ /ji ltar rab rib rab rib can/ /skra tshogs ltos shig ltos shig kye/ /phan tshun dag tu ston mod kyi/ /bdag nyes dbang po
47a2(mdo sde): zhan byung gi / 'di na gang yang skra tshogs med/ /rgyan dang nor bu dag kyang ngo / /yod dang med pa'i dngos po ltar/ /dbang po'i nyes pas mthong ba yin/ /de bzhin
47a3(mdo sde): rtog can dbang gis 'di/ /bdag gi blo ni ji ltar gnas/ /tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas thub par/ /rtog pa med pas rab tu 'dzin/ /gang 'di mang po snang ba
47a4(mdo sde): dag / sna tshogs tshangs la sogs pa'i mtshan/ /sna tshogs thams cad bdag gi sems/ /rdza la sogs pa'i yon tan mtshan/ /nang du gyur pa'i gzugs
47a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / /mtho ris gnas pa'i gnas rnams dang / /gang 'di phyi nang bya ba rnams/ /thams cad sems las byung ba'o/ /rgyan stug rnal 'byor gang yin
47a6(mdo sde): pa/ /de ni gud na yod pa min/ /rnal 'byor can gyi bsod nams kyis/ /zhugs pa 'di la bslab par gyis/ /dbang sgyur lha rdzas gnas dag dang / /yang na
47a7(mdo sde): gzugs can rnams gnas dang / /'du shes med pa'i gnas su'am/ /'og ma yin pa'i gnas su yang / /cung zad med dang rnam shes dang / /'du shes yod pa ma yin dang //
47b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi ni gnas dag tu/ /'dod chags kyi ni phyogs bshig na/ /khyod ni myur du der gnas pa/ /stug po rnal 'byor can gnas su/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun byas te/ /
47b2(mdo sde): stug po der ni 'gro bar gyis/ /rnal 'byor de la spyad par gyis/ /bdag gi gnyen gyis ci zhig bya/ /bdag gi gnyen ni rtag tu 'ching / /'khor ba'i lam rgyud rgyu yang yin/ /dbang
47b3(mdo sde): po rnams ni g.yo ba ste/ /bud med rnams la'ang blo 'khrul pas/ /khu chu khrag mnam mi zhim pa'i/ /'ji bar srin bu skyes gyur pa/ /dgu 'am bcu zhig pa dang yang / /khu chu smin
47b4(mdo sde): nas mngon bar skye/ /dbang po rnams kyis kun yog pa/ /srin bu g.yo ba ji bzhin te/ /rim pa de yi tshul gyis na/ /ji srid sems can gnas par du'o/ /lus can rnams kyi
47b5(mdo sde): skye la ltos/ /tshe tsher de dag byung ba ste/ /pha dang ma ni stong dag dang / /bu dang chung ma brgya dag kyang / /thams cad gnas su rnyed pa ni/ /lus can skye la gnas pa'o/ /rmi lam dag na bu
47b6(mdo sde): med pa'i/ /mo gsham bu 'byung ji bzhin du/ /bu rnyed pa yi dga' ba dang / /rmi lam rmi tshe de nyid ldan/ /de ni shir gyur de nas de/ /rmi lam shes nas sad pa dang / /rmi lam gyi ni bu shi
47b7(mdo sde): med/ /gang yang skye ba yod pa min/ /chu bo rab tshal bu dang ni/ /grong khyer dag dang ri rnams dang / /grong dang tshong 'dus phyugs lhas dang / /dka' thub tshal bu'i gnas rnams dang / /
48a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba dag gis rgyas pa'i yul/ /zhing dang ba lang lug gis gang / /'jig rten gyi ni longs spyod kyang / /de dang 'di dang gzhan du'ang snang / /ji ltar
48a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'dir rgyug pa/ /rmi lam rgyug pa de bzhin te/ /gdeg dang bskum la sogs pa yang / /de dang 'dir yang snang ba yin/ /mkhas pas rmi lam gang mthong ba/ /
48a3(mdo sde): skye ba med cing 'chi med par/ /slar sad nas su sems pa ni/ /bu mo mkhas pa dag yin no/ /ji ltar ri dang de'u rnams kyi/ /grib ma kun tu snang ba bzhin/ /de ltar 'jig
48a4(mdo sde): rten rmi lam yang / /mkhas pa rnams ni de bzhin bsam/ /ji ltar skyes bu nyal ba zhig /bud med lhan cig rtse dga' rmi/ /sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang / /lha rab btsun
48a5(mdo sde): mo mnyam pa dang / /gzhan yang sna tshogs dngos pos te/ /sad nas rnam par sems pa ni/ /ci zhig bden nam rmi lam yin/ /rmi lam bud med lhan cig tu/ /rtses nas
48a6(mdo sde): phyir ni bdag sad de/ /'di rdzun bus pa slu ba yin/ /de bzhin bdag gi gnyen pa kun/ /rgyal srid stobs kyang de bzhin no/ /dmag pa gyos po bu dag dang / /ma dang phu nu
48a7(mdo sde): pho dag kyang / /rmi lam lta bur rig bya ste/ /rnal 'byor sbyar bar jir mi bya/ /dka' thub tshal dang zhing rnams dang / /ri dang ri yi sman gshong dang / /'o ma 'byung dang ma la
48b1(mdo sde): ya| |lhun po byin dang dbang chen dang / /gdangs kyi ri dang kai la sa/ /char 'bab la yang gang gnas dang / /dzam+bu 'bras bu'i khu ba dang / /gang dag bdud rtsi za ba dang / /phan du
48b2(mdo sde): kam pam par ya tra/ /ko bi dar na gang 'khod dang / /ri rab nang na gang gnas dang / /dpag bsam shing la gnas pa dang / /rang rgyal rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang / /nyan thos
48b3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / /thams cad kyi ni rnal 'byor 'di/ /gang 'byung 'byung ba rnams kyi ste/ /pad+mo'i gnas su brtan bcas te/ /skyil mo krung du mnyam gzhag cing / /rtag tu rnal
48b4(mdo sde): 'byor sbyar bar gyis/ /'dod dang bde las rnam par dpen/ /dbang po dbang po'i don gyi rnams/ /thams cad las kyang phyir bzlog cing / /lcags kyus glang po ji bzhin du/ /
48b5(mdo sde): sems ni mnyam par bzhag par gyis/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das bsam gtan/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge /'dod dang dga' ba dben la sogs/ /yang
48b6(mdo sde): na thams cad bsgrags pa dang / /khyad par du yang gzugs med dang / /'du shes med pa'i bsam gtan rnams/ /nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang / /'du shes yod
48b7(mdo sde): min med min rnams/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i dbyibs/ /pad+mo dang ni 'od 'dra zhing / /nam mkha' ri mo me 'dra bar/ /rnal 'byor zhugs pas rab tu mthong / /'di dag thams
49a1(mdo sde): cad spangs nas su/ /snang ba med par rab tu gnas/ /gang tshe mtshan med rnal 'byor can/ /rnam par mi rtog chags med na/ /sangs rgyas bye ba
49a2(mdo sde): rnams kyang mthong / /zhing dang zhing na mnyam gzhag pa/ /de dag phyag gis dbang bskur bar/ /de yi spyi bor dbang bskur te/ /sangs rgyas sa la zhugs pa dang / /sna tshogs
49a3(mdo sde): gzugs ni rab tu 'byung / /sna tshogs tshul gyi dngos thob nas/ /kun mkhyen thams cad rig par 'gyur/ /stobs dang mngon shes dbang yang 'thob/ /gzungs dang thams
49a4(mdo sde): cad ting nge 'dzin/ /thams cad kyi ni 'byung gnas 'gyur/ /thub pa rnal 'byor skyed pa'i yang / /gzugs ni rdul du rnam gzhigs shing / /mchog rdul yan chad nyin
49a5(mdo sde): dben phyir/ /yod las med par 'gyur ba ste/ /bong bu'i ba lang rwa mthong bzhin/ /cha shas med phyir cha shas can/ /phung po las ni phung can med/ /de bas las kyi
49a6(mdo sde): 'bras gyur pa/ /'di ni sgyu ma'i bus byas bzhin/ /'di na las med 'bras bu med/ /las kyi sgrub pa'ang yod pa min/ /'jig rten byed pas ma byas te/ /byed
49a7(mdo sde): pa byed pa ma yin no/ /byed la byed pa yod na ni/ /'di rnams thug pa med par 'gyur/ /thug med byas pa'i nyes pa yis/ /thub pa dri ma can du gyur/ /de ste lam rgyud
49b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs rnams/ /chu dang nam mkha' sa gnas pa'i/ /lus can lus la kun gnas te/ /skye ba bzang po gnas su ste/ /ris su 'gro ba yod pas na/ /ji ltar 'dod par lus
49b2(mdo sde): can 'gro / dbang po so so bya ba yang / /ji ltar 'dod par yul 'dzin te/ /'di ni rnam rtog rnam 'gyur ba/ /zho mar ji ltar 'o ma las/ /de bzhin skye dang gnas dang 'jig
49b3(mdo sde): las kyis byas par 'gyur sems na/ /rmi lam dri za sgyu ma sprin/ /brag ca dang ni glog 'dra ba/ /smig rgyu ri dwags sred pa ltar/ /dngos po rnams bsgoms rnal 'byor can/ /thog
49b4(mdo sde): ma med nas bsags pa yi/ /mi yi rnam spros bag chags kyis/ /sna tshogs gnas ngan len pa dang / /sna tshogs rtog pas las su brtags/ /dbang po sgyu ma lta bu yin/ /
49b5(mdo sde): yul rnams rmi lam 'dra ba ste/ /byed dang las dang bya ba yang / /rnal 'byor sgrub pas mi brtag go /rtog pa nyams pa'i rtog pa can/ /rnam myos shes pa nyam chung bas/ /
49b6(mdo sde): byed par rab tu rtog pa ni/ /bya bas 'gro bar byas par te/ /'jig rten gces pas byas ma yin/ /rdul gyi rkyen las byung ba'ang min/ /rgyu med pas kyang byas ma yin/ /
49b7(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid kyis byung ba'ang min/ /rdo rje lcags dang khab long dang / /rin chen phreng ba rgyan rnams kyis/ /ji lta bu yi las shig byas/ /nor bu gser du ming btags
50a1(mdo sde): pas/ /bya dang ri dwags khra bo dang / /tsher ma rnams kyi rno dngos dang / /'gro ba sna tshogs ngo mtshar ba/ /rnam rtog las las ma skyes so/ /las ci gang
50a2(mdo sde): las ma yin zhes/ /rtog can bden la myos pa ni/ /bden pa'i dngos por mi shes pa/ /'di ni rnam rtog las min du/ /'o ma'i nang na yod pa'i dus/ /rjes su mi bde
50a3(mdo sde): rnam par 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa'ang thams cad du/ /de bzhin dngos po rnams la 'jug /dngos po skye ba ma yin te/ /dngos po rnam par 'jig pa'ang med/ /rnam
50a4(mdo sde): rtog sna tshogs de dag ni/ /rtog pa can gyis mi rig go/ /'gro ba'i ris kyi dngos po dag /rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par gzhig /sbyar zhing rnal 'byor de la zhugs/ /las
50a5(mdo sde): dang las min ma sems par/ /ris su 'gro ba'i dngos po yis/ /zla ba nyi ma rnam mdzes pa/ /rlung gis shin tu bskyod nas kyang / /mkha' la brten pa med par 'gro/ /shin
50a6(mdo sde): tu phra zhing shes dka'i las/ /stug por gnas par rab tu mthong / /las de ci zhig yod par 'gyur/ /zhugs brtson rnal 'byor can dag la/ /ji ltar me ni shing gi
50a7(mdo sde): ri| |thar par byed pa skad cig tu/ /rnal 'byor can gyi thams cad las/ /ye shes mes tshig skad cig tu/ /las dang bag chags lhan cig tu/ /mang po'i dus nas
50b1(mdo sde): bsags pa dag / rnal 'byor ye shes bag chags kyis/ /thams cad zhig byed skad cig tu/ /ji ltar sgron mas mun pa'i tshogs/ /skad cig tu ni bsal byed pa/ /ye shes sgron
50b2(mdo sde): mas thub pa de/ /mi shes rnam par sel bar bya/ /rgyan stug po theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ bdag gi las kyi bya ba spyad pa zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// //'phags
50b3(mdo sde): pa rgyan stug po/ bam po gsum pa/ 'jim pa rtsa mig thag pa las/ /ji ltar gnas pa'i khyim gyi rnams/ /phan tshun kun nas 'dus 'byor cing / /sa yi dbus na snang ba
50b4(mdo sde): ni| |re re la yang khyim med de/ /rdzas dang dngos la rnam brtags na/ /rdzas kyi rnam pa 'dus pa la/ /khyim zhes gdags shing brjod pa ste/ /sor mo phan tshun kun 'dus na/ /ji
50b5(mdo sde): ltar lag pa'i phu dung du/ /lag pa gnyis ni bsdus las 'gyur/ /tha dad pa las mi 'byung ngo / /g.yul dang shing rta bsnyems bral khang / /grong khyer nags tshal de bzhin te/ /ri
50b6(mdo sde): dang sbrin dang dpa' rlabs kyang / /brag ca glog dang 'dra ba'o/ /smig rgyu chu zla sgyu 'dra ba/ /snam bu rdza sogs grags pa ste/ /mkhas la dngos po thams cad kyang / /rmi lam 'dra
50b7(mdo sde): bar kun tu snang / /de bzhin lus khyim sna tshogs pa/ /bus pa'i lam rgyud dog pa na/ /khams kyis ri bzhin gyur pa ste/ /khyim ltar rtag tu mi brtan la/ /'byung ba med cing
51a1(mdo sde): 'jig pa med/ /bdag las ma yin gzhan las min/ /rtag dang chad las rnam par grol/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa yongs su spangs/ /ji ltar dri za'i grong
51a2(mdo sde): khyer ni/ /mdog tu zad kyang grong ltar snang / /de bzhin rang rtog rnam brtags pa'i/ /dngos po rnams kyang rab tu 'byung / /chos rnams smig rgyu lta bu ste/ /yod med rnam bral dge ba
51a3(mdo sde): yin/ /rmi lam sprin ltar snang ba ste/ /rtsig ngos ri mo'i phug lta bu'o/ /zha bo long ba 'dra ba ni/ /dngos kun gcig gis gcig rgyu ba/ /rang bzhin rtogs par mi rung ste/ /rnal 'byor can
51a4(mdo sde): gyis yang dag mthong / /rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang / /rdul gyi dngos po mi gnas te/ /rang bzhin kun gyi mchog yin pas/ /rdul phran mchog ces de phyir brjod/ /de phyir
51a5(mdo sde): blo ni phyir ldog ste/ /sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan spangs/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /de tshe ngal bso'i yid du 'gyur/ /ngal bso'i yid ldan rnal 'byor can/ /bcings
51a6(mdo sde): pa kun las grol bas na/ /'di dang pha bir mi skye ste/ /bsam gtan tshul la mos pa rnams/ /sna tshogs rin chen snying po yi/ /gnas na dbang can de dag rtse/ /yon tan dbang byung
51a7(mdo sde): nyes pa med/ /rig 'dzin bud med mang po dang / /thub pa rnams kyis rab mchod cing / /rmi lam bzhin du gnas pa yin/ /'di na gnas kyang tshangs pa dang / /thub dang thub pa'i bu rnams
51b1(mdo sde): dang | |rig 'dzin tshogs kyis de bzhin te/ spyi gtsug blta bar mi nus so/ /'di yi thub pa'i rnal 'byor yul/ /de bas bsam gtan brtson par gyis/ /'di ni kun gyi yul ma yin/ /de phyir
51b2(mdo sde): grogs po bstan par gyis/ /brtan pa sa rnams sna tshogs dang / /'od can rnams kyi gnas su yang / /'dod chags phyogs dang bcas pa dang / /gti mug zhe sdang de bzhin du/ /bcom
51b3(mdo sde): ste stug po rab yangs pa/ /yid bzhin zhi ba'i gnas su 'gro/ /de ni 'chi bdag yul ma yin/ /rnam shes spyod yul de bzhin min/ /mtshan ma med pa'i gnas yin te/ /rtog pas de
51b4(mdo sde): bsgrub ma yin no/ /'di ni lha rdzas gnas yin te/ /thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /de bas zhing mchog de 'dod na/ /thub pas bsam gtan de la gyis/ /'dod chags zhe sdang rnam bcom
51b5(mdo sde): ste| |nga med nga yi 'gro med du/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mi bsam par/ /bsam gtan mchog la bsgom par gyis/ /phan tshun yul la 'dzin pa'i phyir/ /gnyis kyi blo ni rab tu 'byung / /yod
51b6(mdo sde): med rtog pas de bzhin du/ /rnam shes rnams la kun gzhi'o/ /bud med ro smad shas rgyas shing / /skra bzang mig kyang mdzes pa dang / /sna legs dpral ba'i dbyibs sdug la/ /smin
51b7(mdo sde): ma stug cing blta mdzes pa/ /ji ltar la la der chags pa'i/ /yid kyis rnam par myos pa'i sems/ /lta zhing rnam par rtog pa'i tshe/ /mkhas min de la shin tu myos/ /'gro 'dug
52a1(mdo sde): 'greng yang de bzhin te/ /snom za gnyid kyis log na'ang / /'dod can gzhan du mi sems te/ /'dod pa can mo yid la byed/ /de bzhin khyod blo rnyog pa can//
52a2(mdo sde): rnam pa kun tu yid la gnas/ /rdzab yul rnyog dang ldan pa yi/ /bcings pa'i dbang du ma 'gro zhig /ji ltar la la rtog pa can/ /blo yi spyod yul rnam 'khrul pa/ /ma he dag dang
52a3(mdo sde): bal glang dang / /glang po dag dang bse rnams dang / /rang ga kr-isna sa ra dang / /sha ra b+ha dang su ra dang / /gnyan dang g.yag kyang de bzhin te/ /mgo dkar rna dang khyu mchog gi/ /ru chen
52a4(mdo sde): rnam par mthong ba dang / /'di bden gzhan du mi 'gyur zhes/ /seng stag bong bu sogs pa yi/ /rwa rnams la ni med ces te/ /yod dang med pa'i lta ba yang / /mi mkhas rnams
52a5(mdo sde): la rab tu 'byung / /de ltar gzhan gyi rwa mthong zhing / /bong bu'i med ces rnam rtog 'byung / /ci ste gzhan gyi ma mthong na/ /bong rwa med snyam de mi 'byung / /log par dmigs pa'i rgyu yi
52a6(mdo sde): phyir/ /'di na med ces rtog pa 'byung / /de la dmigs pa med pas kyang / /gdon mi za bar med la brten/ /rnyog can nga rgyal rtog yul la/ /blo gros spyod yul ma rton cig /ba lang
52a7(mdo sde): ba men ma he rnams/ /rtog pas brtags pa ji bzhin te/ /de ltar khyod kyis sems spyod dang / /phung po skye mched spyod yul dag/ /mngon sum tshad ma dag gis sam/ /shes rab kyis
52b1(mdo sde): kyang rnam par ltos/ /rnam grol mtho ris 'gro ba'am/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du'ang 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su tshangs par ram/ /mtshe ma rab dang gnas dben dang / /rin chen
52b2(mdo sde): sna tshogs gnas su yang / /dbang sgyur rnam par mdzes par 'gyur/ /'od chung rgyas pa dag tu'am/ /'dod khams bdag po dbang can nam/ /nyi zla bdag bdag gnas su'am/ /
52b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang 'od 'bar gzer yang rung / /sum cu rtsa gsum rgyal chen dang / /'phrul la dga' ba'i gnas su yang / /tshangs gnas bcu dang ldan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor can ni rnam par
52b4(mdo sde): mdzes/ /gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong / /'dod med mi dros de bzhin te/ /'og min gnas kyi lha rdzas na/ /'og min shin tu rnam par mdzes/ /cung zad med mkha' rnam shes dang //
52b5(mdo sde): 'du shes yod med ma yin dang / /de bzhin 'phrul gyi bde can dang / /zhing bzang gzhan du de bzhin te/ /mkha' la 'gro dang spobs pa bzhin/ /'khor lo 'khor ba'i rigs su gnas/ /
52b6(mdo sde): grol ba rnams kyi grol yul la/ /su gnas de dag rnal 'byor can/ /'dod chags stobs las sngon rgyal ba/ /de dag bzang po'i sa la gnas/ /'di lta'i rnal 'byor ldan pas
52b7(mdo sde): na| |rnal 'byor la ni thub par rtse/ /rdza ma 'jig pa'i gyo mo yi/ /ji ltar rgyur yang 'gyur ba dang / /skad cig 'jig la skad cig ste/ /mi rtag nyid kyang rtag pa yi/ /sa bon ji bzhin myu gu
53a1(mdo sde): la| |rgyu rnams de dag 'dra ba yin/ /myu gu gzhan min sa bon las/ /sa bon nyid kyang myu gu min/ /sa snar rnams las rdza snar 'byung / /tshos
53a2(mdo sde): dam dmar rur mngon par 'byung / /gnag dang snar dang 'dres pa dang / /gro bo dmar po dag kyang ste/ /'dam bu las ni sgog par 'gyur/ /rwa las lan tshar de bzhin te/ /mi
53a3(mdo sde): gtsang sbrang bu dag las kyang / /srin bur 'gyur gzhan mi 'dra mang / /rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /sa rnams gang na'ang yod pa min/ /gyur pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung / /rdul
53a4(mdo sde): phran gang dag rgyur 'gyur ni/ /dngos po 'jig pa med par te/ /rnam par rtog la mi rtog cing / /rgyu yi bdag dang nang gi bdag/ bdag gi mchog kyang med pa ste/ /bdag dang
53a5(mdo sde): dbang po yid dang don/ /'dus pa'i rgyu ni ma yin te/ /phrad las 'byung dang rnam shes dang / /rkyen rnams yod pa ma yin no/ /shes can shes pas yul rnams la/ /mkhas pa'i
53a6(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pas ni/ /sde dpung stobs dang bzhon bcas pa'i/ /nyon mongs bdud rnams gdul bar bya/ /sred pa 'jig rten dma' bar byed/ /sbrang rtsis bad kan mang
53a7(mdo sde): po bzhin/ /sred pa bcom zhing thub pa'i rnams/ /rnam pa mang las rnam par grol/ /sred pas rnam par dkrugs pa na/ /'khor las rnam par mi 'grol te/ /sred dang rnam bral
53b1(mdo sde): 'thar par 'gyur/ /de bas rnal 'byor sbyar bar gyis/ /yun ring yod pa'i bag chags ni/ /sprul gdug khros pa ji bzhin yang / /'di dang pha bir 'drid pa ni/ /'khor ba'i lam rgyud dog pa
53b2(mdo sde): par ro/ /'phags pa rgyan stug po las/ /rnal 'byor rnam par phye ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rnam phye dang / /bdag ldan de yi
53b3(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs/ /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /bye ba'i zhing na bzhugs pa dang / /khams gsum gnas pa thams cad dang / /sa gnas rnal 'byor ldan pa dang / /bde yod zhing dang
53b4(mdo sde): stug po ste/ /rnal 'byor can gyi zhing mchog dang / /sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dbus bzhugs pa/ /rdul phran bzhin bzhugs bdag gis mthong / /rnal 'byor de las bdag langs nas/ /sa
53b5(mdo sde): la rgyal ba de dag ni/ /stug po'i zhing na bdag bzhugs shing / /rgyal sras thabs gcig bzhugs pa dag /me tog a ta si 'dra ba'i/ /mkha' la zla 'dra bzhin bzhugs mthong / /
53b6(mdo sde): mthe bo'i tshogs dang rab 'dra ba/ /sa rnams dge la rab sbyor ba'i/ /rnam grol snying po bdag gis mthong / /'di na bu khyod su zhig ces/ /snying po de ltar sems gyur te/ /thub pa'i
53b7(mdo sde): 'di ni gcig cig snyam/ /de tshe sku ru zhugs par gyur/ /'gro ba rnams kyang skur zhugs nas/ /thub pa pad+mo'i snying po yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi longs spyod dang / /khams gsum kun
54a1(mdo sde): na gnas par yang / /gang tshe mthong ba de dus na/ /kye ma mtshar ces bsam pa dang / /de tshe thub pa lha yi lhas/ /rnal 'byor yul ni rab bsdus te/ /thub pas
54a2(mdo sde): sngon bzhin bzhag par gyur/ /kye ma bsam yas lha rdzas 'di/ /rnal 'byor can gyi sna tshogs gzugs/ /sangs rgyas lha yi yul yin te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bdag gis mthong //
54a3(mdo sde): chos kyi sprin gyi ting 'dzin dang / /dga' dang mi g.yo de bzhin te/ /ring song mngon du gyur pa dang / /'od byed pa yi ma lus par/ /sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro la sogs/ /gzi brjid can
54a4(mdo sde): yang ma lus par/ /gzugs rnams kyi yang yul yin te/ /'og min thabs las byung ba'o/ /de ni yid bzhin 'gyur sku yin/ /dbang gi yon tan brgyad po rnams/ /phra tshogs che
54a5(mdo sde): ba'i yon tan dang / /'thob dang 'dod 'byor bsgrags pa dang / /bdag po dbang dang ldan pa dang / /ji ltar 'dod par rung ba'i rnams/ /thob nas stug po'i dbus yul na/ /rnam
54a6(mdo sde): par gnas shing rab tu rtse/ /sprul pa'i lha rdzas stug po nas/ /phyin pa dge ba de dag kyang / /lhun gyis grub pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /'phrul pa rnams ni rab tu 'gyed/ /rgyal ba
54a7(mdo sde): rnams dang rgyal sras su/ /thabs gcig bzhugs par kun na snang / /de ltar sa 'di sna tshogs pa/ ngang gi gzugs ldan rnams kyang 'dres/ /cha las phyir ldog de yi tshe/ /bya
54b1(mdo sde): ba byas pas stug po'i gzhi/ /shes pas bcad cing mkhas pa'i rnams/ /thub pa dag gis stug po mthong / /gzhal med pad+mo 'dra ba na/ /me ltar rab tu 'bar ba yin/ /thub pa rnal
54b2(mdo sde): 'byor bde mos pa/ /rnal 'byor can dang lhan cig gnas/ /dpal be'u mtshan dang thams cad ldan/ /phra ba'i lus can rang gi 'od/ /de dag dbus su thub pa'i dbang / /khyod ni gnas
54b3(mdo sde): par rab tu 'gyur/ /ltos shig lha yi cod pan dang / /dru ma 'am ci yi bdag /gzhal med dbye ba mang po yis/ /zla ba bzhin du rab tu 'bar/ /thub pa rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /
54b4(mdo sde): dga' ldan la sogs lha yi mchog /a ta si yi me tog 'dra/ /shes rab bzang zhing mtshan mang ba/ /phreng ba cod pan thogs pa'i rnams/ /gzhal med mang pos gnas pa ste/ /lus
54b5(mdo sde): ni rab tu 'bar ba dang / /kun mkhyen thams cad mngon gyur pa/ /thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / /kun tu bzang po stobs chen te/ /zla ba 'dra ba'i gzhal med kyis/ /stug po'i gangs
54b6(mdo sde): chen mtsho la gnas/ /rnam pa du mar thams cad nas/ /thub pa rnams kyis bstod pa ste/ /chags med tshangs pa'i khyu mchog dang / /grub dang dri za tshogs rnams dang / /mkhas dang nges
54b7(mdo sde): par ldan pa yi/ /skyes bu'i tshogs kyi bdag po dang / /rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun du byas/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas khyad par du/ /gzims pa lta bur mthong ba ni/ /de dag le lo bral bas
55a1(mdo sde): te| |gnyid dang snyoms sogs bsrabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas lha yi rjes su 'brang / /mur 'dug kun gyis mthong gyur cing / /de bzhin lha dang tshangs
55a2(mdo sde): la sogs/ /'dzam gling pa dang 'og min dang / /'phrul gyis sprul pas thub mthong ba/ /'gro bas sna tshogs kun gzugs su/ /sa la kun nas bzhugs par te/ /cho 'phrul
55a3(mdo sde): rnam pa mang po yis/ /mgon po shin tu rnam par mdzes/ /la la nyal zhing rab tu 'bar/ /de bzhin gzhan dag phan tshun 'chag /la la g.yen spyo brel zhing sgom/ /de
55a4(mdo sde): bzhin gzhan yang mya ngan 'da'/ /la la mngal du 'jug pa dang / /skye dang 'byung dang dka' spyod dang / /byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
55a5(mdo sde): bar ro/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang sangs rgyas yul/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /rgyal ba'i sras po 'jigs med pa/ /de dag kun gyis 'thob 'gyur te/ /thub pa
55a6(mdo sde): shAkya'i seng ge yis/ /ji ltar brnyes bzhin grogs po rnams/ /rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa yis/ /'di dag kun la yid ches kyis/ /yid ches gyur na sangs
55a7(mdo sde): rgyas sam/ /thar par 'gyur pa the tshom med/ /'khor lo 'khor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /spobs can khams kyi bdag po dang / /tshangs la sogs pa'i gnas su yang //
55b1(mdo sde): gnas 'gyur 'khor gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /dri med zhing gi pad+mo la/ /thub pa'i dbus su skye bar 'gyur/ /pad+mo'i dbus su skye ba yang / /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i sras kyis 'thob/ /
55b2(mdo sde): brtson pas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bag chags 'dod pa'i rgyu las kyang / /'dod bdag bdag po pham byas shing / /theg pa gcig la rab tu 'jug /brtson 'grus ldan zhing zhi med
55b3(mdo sde): pa'i/ /rigs kyang thub pa rab tu ston/ /sras po yangs pa'i rigs gyur cing / /zhing dang zhing du bdag por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyid du smon sems na/ /sangs rgyas rigs ni rnam par
55b4(mdo sde): dag / rnam dag rigs can sras de ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan te/ /myur du sangs rgyas ci 'dra ba/ /de bzhin thub pa 'tshang rgya'o/ /rnam sangs rgyas nas nyer 'tsho
55b5(mdo sde): ba| |tshangs la sogs dang rnal 'byor can/ /sa ltar rtag pa'i dus su yang / /lus can rnams la nye bar gnas/ /thams cad sman gyi rnal 'byor can/ /ji ltar grong dang grong
55b6(mdo sde): gnas pa/ /nad rnams rab tu sel ba ltar/ /rab tu mkhas pa de byed pa/ /rnam rtog med pa'i yid kyis te/ /bcad kyang g.yo zhing 'gul ba med/ /'di ni rnam par rig pa tsam//
55b7(mdo sde): yid ni nang dang phyi yang spyod/ /bdag dang bdag gi med pa ste/ /nor ba mthong zhing mi g.yo'o/ /yid kyi rnam shes yul can gyi/ /kun gzhi kun nas gnas pa ste/ /bcad dang
56a1(mdo sde): gcod par byed pa dang / /de nyid gcad bya gcod pa'ang yin/ /lus can kun gyi kun gzhi ni/ /las kyi bag chags rnams kyis yog /khar ba nor bu nyi ma
56a2(mdo sde): dag / ldan las me 'byung ji bzhin te/ /gtsub ma gtsub stan 'dus las min/ /mis kyang byas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin sems yid rnam shes dang / /dbang po don dang
56a3(mdo sde): yid dang las/ /sems rnams rab tu skyer gyur pa/ /rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs ji bzhin no/ /smig rgyu nam mkha' sgyu ma dang / /rmi lam ma yin nor pa'ang min/ /sbal pa rus
56a4(mdo sde): sbal spu dag dang / /ri bong rwa dang mnyam pa'ang min/ /me ni shing las skye bar 'gyur/ /glog ni de bzhin sprin las so/ /me la skyed pa su yang med/ /rdza sogs rdza mkhan lta
56a5(mdo sde): bu'o/ /ji ltar rtswa dang shing dag la/ /brten cing lhan cig sgyu 'byung ba/ /de bzhin mos la sogs pa kun/ /sems dang sems byung lhan cig gnas/ /sems kyi yul
56a6(mdo sde): ni bsam du med/ /stug na gnas pas legs par mthong / /lha rdzas sngon med lhan cig skyes/ /mya ngan 'das dang nam mkha' bzhin/ /so sor ma brtags 'gog pa ltar/ /
56a7(mdo sde): dus gsum rnam par spangs pa ste/ /'od can rtag tu dag pa ni/ /lus can kun gyi kun gzhi'o/ /dang po tshes pa'i zla mdog ltar/ /bye ba'i zhing du snang ba ste/ /ri rab gnas shing
56b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba yang / /dngos po 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin yid sems rnam par shes/ /sems can khams na 'khor mod kyi/ /de la 'phel zhing 'bri med de/ /rtag tu rang bzhin
56b2(mdo sde): 'od snang ba'o/ /ji ltar zla ba skye 'bri bar/ /mi shes 'gro ba rnam rtog pa/ /skye 'bri zla la yod pa min/ /gling dang gling du'ang rab tu snang / /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes la/ /byis pa
56b3(mdo sde): mi shes 'gro rnams kyang / /rtag tu skye brir rnam rtog ste/ /de ni zag med sangs rgyas so/ /kun gzhi 'di la ji ltar yang / /'byung bas tha dad mi 'gyur te/ /'jug pa'i rnam shes song
56b4(mdo sde): gnas pa/ /bag chags kyis ni zla ba bzhin/ /chu klung dbus kyi shing lta bur/ /chu bo'i klung dang 'grogs mod kyi/ /tha dad mtshan du'ang rab tu grub/ /rgya mtsho chen por de bzhin 'gro/
56b5(mdo sde): de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rtag tu bag chags ldan 'gyur ba/ /rnam par shes pa bdun po dang / /'grogs kyang 'dre ba med pa ste/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang dang / /
56b6(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i rgyu yang de/ /chos mthong 'phags pa rnams kyi yang / /de ni rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag pa/ /byol song mi dang lhar skyes dang / /sha za lto 'phye yi dwags dang / /lha
56b7(mdo sde): min dri za 'bar ba yi/ /lam rgyud kun kyang de yi dbang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing mdzes la'ang / /de nyid rgyur ni gyur pa ste/ /de rtogs nas ni sangs rgyas dang / /rigs dang theg pa
57a1(mdo sde): gzhan min 'gyur/ /thams cad lus la rtag tu gnas/ /spyod 'os yod la rnam par 'dug /dpal dang ldan la khyad par du/ /thams cad kun kyang rab tu gnas/ /
57a2(mdo sde): rab dang 'bring dang tha ma la'ang / /'gro ba dog pa thams cad na/ /de ni kun tu gnas pa ste/ /lus can rnams kyi lus la rten/ /'bras bu'i bdag dang rgyu yi bdag /nang gi bdag kyang
57a3(mdo sde): de nyid la/ /byis pa rnams kyis khor zug brtag /de yi dbyings la thog ma med/ /gnas ngan len dang las kyis bskyed/ /bag chags thog ma med pas bsags/ /'tsho zhing
57a4(mdo sde): gso bar byed pa ni/ /rnam par shes pa bdun po ste/ /yid ni rtag tu rlung dang mnyam/ /g.yo zhing myur bar rab tu 'jug /lus can rnams kyi lus gnas shing / /khams kyi
57a5(mdo sde): gong la gnas pa'o/ /las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa ni/ /dbang po rnams la khyab par gnas/ /rnam shes bdun dang lhan cig tu/ /dba' rlabs bzhin du rgyu ba ste/ /rdul phran dus dang
57a6(mdo sde): gtso bo dang / /de bzhin skyes bu dbang bcas su/ /kun gzhi gcig pu dge ba de/ /rtog pa can gyis ther zug brtag /rtag tu sna tshogs rnam pa'i gzugs/ /g.yo zhing myur
57a7(mdo sde): 'byung byed pa ste/ /kun gzhi sa rnams thams cad du/ /phyi nang bcas par gnas pa yin/ /de ni sa yi rgyu yin par/ /rgyu can rnams kyis brtag pa ste/ /de yi 'gro ba shin tu
57b1(mdo sde): phra| |rtog pa can rnams myos par byed/ /bdag don dbang po yid mos pa'i/ /yang dag ma mthong myos par 'gyur/ /sngon gyi las kyis bskyod pa yi/ /rnam par shes pa sred pa'i
57b2(mdo sde): rgyu| |sna tshogs gzugs can 'gro ba dang / /mi rnams kyi yang rgyu yin no/ /'jigs med rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/ /rdo rje'i snying pos yang smras pa/ /kun gzhi ngang lugs dge ba
57b3(mdo sde): ni| |rgyal sras rnams kyis mthong thos te/ /kun gzhi'i mchog tu dge ba ni/ /thams cad lus la zhen pa ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing / /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs
57b4(mdo sde): mnga' ba'i/ /rgyal ba 'khor lo 'khor bar yang / /sa rnams la lar 'gro bas mthong / /ji ltar zla ba skar tshogs dang / /lhan cig mkha' la gnas pa ltar/ /rnam shes rnams
57b5(mdo sde): dang kun gzhi yang / /de bzhin lhan cig lus la gnas/ /ji ltar dbang gis sgyur ba'i lha/ /lha yi bu mos bdun bdar cing / /rin chen dbus na rnam mdzes pa/ /de bzhin kun
57b6(mdo sde): gzhi sa rnams la/ /ji ltar chu dbang chu yi lha/ /chu klung rgya mtsho mching rnams la/ /ji bzhin skye ldan sa yang ste/ /de bzhin sems ni rnam par mdzes/ /ji ltar gzhal med gnas
57b7(mdo sde): pa'i nyi/ /ri rab logs na rnam par mdzes/ /lha rnams kyis ni phyag kyang bya/ /de bzhin kun gzhi sangs rgyas sar/ /sa bcu dag la lhan cig tu/ /spyad pa spyod pa rgyal ba'i
58a1(mdo sde): sras/ /theg pa chen pos phyung ba ste/ /lus la gnas pa rnam par mdzes/ /brjod pa'i zhal gyis rtag par yang / /rgyal ba rnams ni kun nas bstod/ /
58a2(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams dang rang rgyal dang / /rgyal ba'i sras rnams khyad par du/ /sa dang sa la rnam dag pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras zhes mngon bsgrags dang / /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras//
58a3(mdo sde): de dag kun gzhi 'di la brjod/ /lung ston lung bstan 'gyur ba yi/ /rgyal sras rgyal ba de bzhin te/ /kun gzhi dri med bsod nams kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur
58a4(mdo sde): ba yin/ /'di lta bu yi kun gzhi'i yul/ /stug na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /thub brtson rnal 'byor spyod pa yis/ /rab tu mthong zhing rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas dag
58a5(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas/ /nyan thos rnams dang mur 'dug gzhan/ /de nyid rtogs nas mthong ba ni/ /rnal 'byor 'jigs med rnal 'byor ro/ /rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul
58a6(mdo sde): gang / /'di ltar snang ba ci yang rung / /rnam par shes par gyur pa ste/ /rdza la sogs pa sa ma yin/ /'di ltar nor pa gang snang ba/ /sna tshogs rdza grags ci yang rung / /de ni kun
58a7(mdo sde): gzhi gyur pa ste/ /snang ba nor ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /kun gzhi chu klung de bzhin du/ /sna tshogs snang mngon 'gro bas mthong / /bag chags rnams kyis bsgos pa'i sems/ /
58b1(mdo sde): gzung dang 'dzin pa rab tu 'khor/ /dngos po sgyu 'dra ma yin te/ /skra yi tshogs dang smig rgyu min/ /skyes dang ma skyes ma yin te/ /stong dang mi stong rnam par spangs/ /dngos su
58b2(mdo sde): gcig med mi 'gyur te/ /ring dang thung la sogs pa bzhin/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin skyes pa ni/ /gang na ci yang yod pa min/ /de ni rig sngags sgyu ma ste/ /skyes bu rnams la rab tu
58b3(mdo sde): snang / /smig rgyu skra la sogs pa'i tshogs/ /gnyis las nye bar mngon pa ste/ /gcig med par ni gnyis po yang / /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /sgyu la sogs pa rnam brtags
58b4(mdo sde): pa| |'di ni rnam shes gyur pa'o/ /sgyu med sgyu zhes bya ba yi/ /dngos po gang dang gang yang med/ /ci yang rung ste/ gang yod pa/ /sgyu mas byas pa'ang yod pa yin/ /myos par byed par
58b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten na/ /sems la dbang med rnams la yod/ /sgyu ma dag gam gyo mo dag /sna tshogs sgyu mas ma byas te/ /g.yo ba gang dag ci yang rung / /de ni snang min sus mi mthong //
58b6(mdo sde): 'di la rnam rtog g.yo ba ni/ /khab len dag la lcags bzhin te/ /sems can med la mi rtog pa'i/ /shel sgong nor bu ji bzhin no/ /kun gzhi kun nas sna tshogs pa/ /byed pa
58b7(mdo sde): bzhin du snang ba ste/ /skye zhing 'chi bar 'gyur mod kyi/ /'khor ba po ni gang yang med/ /rmi lam 'dra bar skye shi dag/ /rab tu mthong na rnam par 'grol/ /thub pa gang tshe gyur pa
59a1(mdo sde): na| |grol ba zhes ni brjod pa ste/ /rigs dang gzhung gis brtan pa ni/ /sangs rgyas khyu mchog de yin no/ /thams cad chos la me long bzhin/ /
59a2(mdo sde): srang yin de bzhin tshad ma ste/ /dngos po kun la sgron ma bzhin/ /khab blang ba yi rdo ltar gnas/ /rnal 'byor lam gyi mtshan nyid de/ /'jig pa rnams kyang rnam par
59a3(mdo sde): bzlog / bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan mchog /rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/ /kun nas nyon mongs zad par byed/ /lam yang rnam par sbyong ba'o/ /dam pa'i
59a4(mdo sde): don gyi spyod yul te/ /'gyur ba rab tu ston pa'o/ /'phags pa rgyan stug po las le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
59a5(mdo sde): po rdo rje'i snying pos phyogs bcur bltas te/ gtsug gi rin po che'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / dbang byed kyi gnas dang / nor bu rin po che'i
59a6(mdo sde): snying po'i pho brang na gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams la'ang snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god
59a7(mdo sde): pa ston pa la smras pa/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa/ kha ba yod pa'i ngos la ri dwags thams cad gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ri dwags kyi rigs shig
59b1(mdo sde): yod de/ /de ni gcom sgyu brgya stong gis ri dwags mang po nye bar brid cing thabs la bab pa'i ri dwags rnams bsad cing za'o/ /ri dwags drus ma phru gu dang bcas pa mthong
59b2(mdo sde): na'ang phru gu'i skad du 'bod do/ /ri dwags rwa can mthong na'ang rwa de dang 'dra bar bsgyur te gan du 'gro'o/ /de nas de dag de la bag rton pa dang / des de dag bag rton par rig
59b3(mdo sde): nas bsad cing bsad cing za'o/ /rwa mthong na'ang rwa'i gzugs su bstan te/ de dag bag phab nas ji ltar 'dod par bsad cing bsad cing za ste/ ji ltar ri dwags zhe
59b4(mdo sde): g tum pa'i ngang tshul can de rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ri dwags gsod pa de bzhin du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'ang phas kyi rgol ba mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba la mngon par
59b5(mdo sde): zhen pa/ bdag gi chos nyid kyi rnam par gnas pa/ 'dzin pa de dang de dag gis bcings pa de dang de dag la de lta de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyis bdag tu smra
59b6(mdo sde): b a yongs su rtog cing rdul phra mo yan chad du rab tu shes par byed pa de dag la de'i bdag tu 'dzin pa nyid du gnas pa ni gzhan du rnam par shes pa tsam du mi gnas pa'i
59b7(mdo sde): bar du ste/ bdag yongs su rtags par byed pa rnams kyis ni yid dang dbang po dang don du ldan pa las shes pa skye ba mthong gi/ bdag dang / yid dang / dbang po dang /
60a1(mdo sde): don 'dus pa'i rgyu las ni ma yin no/ /dper na/ me tog dang gos su phrad na bsung gi khyad par du 'gyur gyi/ ma phrad par ni bsung dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /
60a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du sems dang / sems las byung ba dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa rnams ma gtogs par don de ma yin par gyur pa snod dang ba dar lta bu'am/ me mar dang rdza lta bu'am/
60a3(mdo sde): smig lo dang i shi ka lta bu gzhan ni gang yang med de/ rgyu dang rkyen las sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs rab tu 'byung zhing bdag med la phra ba dang / bskyed du mi rung ba dang /
60a4(mdo sde): cha med pa dang / dag cing thog ma nas 'od snang ba dang / yul rnam par rig pa'i rnal 'byor can rnams kyi 'phags pa so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul ma gtogs par rtogs
60a5(mdo sde): par byed pa rnams kyis mi dmigs so/ /'di nyid ni ri dwags kyi gcan gzan zhe gtum po lta bur 'jig rten rnams la yod pa dang / med pa dang / gcig pa dang / mang po dang
60a6(mdo sde): thams cad dang / thams cad ma yin pa'i lta ba skyed par byed pa ste/ lus can rnam par rig pa tsam du khong du ma chud pa'i rnams bdag dang bdag gir smra ba la mngon par
60a7(mdo sde): zhen par yang ltung bar byed do/ /mi shes pa'i phyir chos khong du chud par 'dod pa'i blos 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi 'khor lo la zhon zhing 'di dang pha bi nas rab tu rgyug ste/ dge ba'i
60b1(mdo sde): bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bral ba/ rang gi phyogs las ring ba bas kyang ches ring bar nyams pa'i blo can/ 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad thob
60b2(mdo sde): par mi nus pa/ theg pa gsum las 'ga' tsam la'ang mi 'jug pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa las rnam par phyir ldog pa ma skyes kyi bar du 'phags pa'i bden pa mi mthong bas/ stug po'i
60b3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gyi skal ba can rnams kyang stug po'am stug po'i sgra'ang mi thos so/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god pa ston pa/ /'di ni rnal 'byor can rnams kyi lta ba yongs
60b4(mdo sde): su sbyang ba ste/ 'di la khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang brtson par gyis shig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug por 'jug pa'i gtam gyi tshul yang rnal 'byor can rnams
60b5(mdo sde): la ston cig / rang gi rnam par rig pa'i yul zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //khab long rdo la ji ltar lcags/ /yongs kyis kun tu rab 'khor ba/ /de bzhin phung po'i
60b6(mdo sde): shing rta ste/ /stong zhing bag chags byung ba 'khor/ /rtswa dang 'jim pa shing smig dang / /theg pa rnams su 'dus tshogs las/ /khyim du ji ltar snang gyur pa/ /de bzhin phung po'i gzugs
60b7(mdo sde): 'di'o/ /lcags dang khab long ro langs la/ /sems can nye bar dmigs med kyang / /thams cad sems can lta bur g.yo/ /de bzhin phung po bdag med pa'o/ /rgyal sras phyag na
61a1(mdo sde): rin chen gyis/ /gzugs mang rgyal mchog la smras pa/ /mnyam gzhag rdo rje'i snying po la/ /rgyal po khyod kyis dri bar byas/ /rgyal sras 'jigs med
61a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i rnams/ /kun gyis thos par 'gyur ba ni/ /brtag bral brtag par mi nus pa/ /brjod pas rnam par spangs pa ste/ /ming dang ming can rnam bral ba/ /'on kyang 'du ba de
61a3(mdo sde): bzhin te/ /sna tshogs gyur pa'i sa 'di yi/ /rang bzhin ci dang cir gnas pa/ /de nas gzugs mang rgyal po yis/ /rdo rje snying po 'jigs med la/ /rjes su 'brel pa'i skabs dris pa/ /
61a4(mdo sde): dngos po don gzhan brtag pa ste/ /rdo rje'i dbang po'i dngos po gang / /la la rab tu brtag bya ba/ /ming dang 'du shes sogs pa'i yul/ /yod dam rdo rje snying pos smros/ /ming rnams sus byas
61a5(mdo sde): ji lta bu/ /ming ni ci la rab tu gnas/ /mi mgon tshig ni thos pa dang / /rdo rje'i snying pos de la smras/ /'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/ /'du shes tsam la rab tu gnas/ /brjod las tha
61a6(mdo sde): dad gyur pa yi/ /brjod par bya ba yod pa min/ /phung po bzhi po ming yin te/ /gzugs kyang tsam zhes rnam par brtag/ /tsam la ming du btags pa ni/ /skyes bu 'di zhes bya ba ste/ /tsam
61a7(mdo sde): la mtshan ma zhes bya bar/ /rgyal ba rgyal sras dag gis gsungs/ /mtshan ma med par ming du mi/ /de dag rnam par rtog mi nus/ /da bas mtshan ma rten byas shing / /ming du kun
61b1(mdo sde): nas brtag pa yin/ /ji ltar lding dang lnga byid dang / /bar pa de yang yod pa min/ /mtshan ma med par ci yang rung / /byis pas de la rnam mi brtag /de bzhin sa 'di thams cad kyang //
61b2(mdo sde): mtshan ma med par yod pa min/ /ci yang mtshan mar mi rtog pa/ /mtshan ma yod na rnam par brtag /rdza dang snam bu shing rta dag /gzugs yod pa la rnam par brjod/ /'jig
61b3(mdo sde): rten 'di ni 'di tsam ste/ /gzugs tsam rnam pa gzhan mi 'gyur/ /tsam la ming du btags pa ste/ /'di la yang dag ming yod min/ /ming med rnam par bral bar yang / /sa
61b4(mdo sde): rnams thub pas mthong ba na/ /rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug /rnam rtog med pa mi skye'o/ /tshor skye med pa gzhan gyur pa/ /mi zad de la skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyu med phyir na ming med
61b5(mdo sde): de| |'du shes tsam la rnam par rtog / de bas rgyal pos rtag par yang / /'du shes ma yin 'du shes sgoms/ /'di dag thams cad 'di tsam ste/ /thams cad las ni gzhan
61b6(mdo sde): med do/ /tsam ni gzugs su shes par bya/ /de bzhin lus dang gzugs dang dbyibs/ /cha lugs ring dang sku yangs te/ /mtshan ma dang ni rnam grangs gcig /'du shes
61b7(mdo sde): ming dang rnam rtog dang / /brjod dang khyad par lhan cig ste/ /tsam dang mtshan ma 'du shes su/ /spyod par rab tu gdags pa ste/ /tsam la gnas de ming rnams kyang / /kun
62a1(mdo sde): rdzob don du rnam par brtags/ /brjod pa med par dngos po ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /rnam shes rnams kyi 'byung ba yang / /rtogs
62a2(mdo sde): bya med par yod pa min/ /rtogs bya ming dang tsam po ni/ /sa rnams thams cad de nyid de/ /dngos po gang la gang ming gis/ /brtag par bya ba de bzhin med/ /'di ni chos
62a3(mdo sde): rnams chos nyid de/ /brtags na gnas pa med pa'o/ /'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/ /'du shes can gyi dngos po med/ /de med pas na ming med de/ /ming med pas
62a4(mdo sde): na rnam mi brtag / rnam par mi rtog zhing 'gyur ba/ /bsreg pa tshig pa'i me bzhin te/ /khur tsas ji ltar khur bkur ba/ /de dang tha dad mtshan can te/ /de bzhin tsam ni
62a5(mdo sde): ming gi khur/ /de dang tha dad mtshan nyid khyer/ /sems la tsam zhes rnam par brtags/ /ming gis tsam du sems tsam gyis/ /'di ni skyes bu sdong po zhes/ /ci yang rung
62a6(mdo sde): ste ming tsam brtag / 'byung ba rnams dang 'dus pa dang / /tsam yang gzugs la rnam par brtag /tsam po med par 'byung ba yi/ /tsam zhes bya ba mi dmigs te/ /bum
62a7(mdo sde): pa'i ngos la yon tan ltar/ /tsam la ming ni rnam par gnas/ /bum pa bum pa'i dngos po yis/ /rnam par dben zhing ming dang bral/ /bum pa bum pa'i dngos por ram//
62b1(mdo sde): ming yang ming du gnas pa med/ /rnal 'byor can gyis gang gi tshe/ /ming tsam g.yo ba med pa dang / /rnam rtog gnyis dang 'brel ba yi/ /ming tsam yod med mthong ba na/ /ji ltar
62b2(mdo sde): me ldan lcags rnams dang / /spra tshil dag kyang rgya skyegs kyang / /chu dang mnyam par khu bar 'gyur/ /'on kyang chu yi yon tan med/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /
62b3(mdo sde): rnam shes bdun dang lhan cig tu/ /rtag tu lus su 'jug par byed/ /rnam par shes pas yun du spangs/ /khab long rdo las rten byas shing / /lcags ni sems can bzhin
62b4(mdo sde): 'khor yang / /de dag gnyis ka byed pa med/ /sems can gson po bzhin du g.yo/ /sems ni bdun zhes bgrang ba yin/ /kun gzhi brgyad po de bzhin no/ /bag chags
62b5(mdo sde): srad bus brgyus pas na/ /sems can bzhin g.yo sems can med/ /lus ni kun tu rgyas par 'dug /'gro ba dog par 'khor ba ste/ /gcig las gcig gis mi shes
62b6(mdo sde): pa| |byed med lcags dang khab long bzhin/ /mgo bo du ma lce mang po/ /kha mang lag pa du ma dang / /lus kyang du mar rab bsgyur cing / /de bzhin gshegs la mchod byed pa//
62b7(mdo sde): shin tu mang ba'i zhing gi rnams/ /tshad med stong du 'gro byas shing / /de dang der yang mgon po'i rnams/ /de dag kun la rtag mchod byed/ /ri rab ri dang mnyam pa yi/ /me tog
63a1(mdo sde): na bza' char mang po/ /sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas/ /de dag mchod pa rab tu byed/ /phreng ba phreng byed cod pan dang / /rin chen brgyan pa sna tshogs
63a2(mdo sde): kyis/ /thams cad mkhyen dang rgyal sras la/ /rtag par mchod pa rab tu byed/ /sprin lta bu yi gzhal med khang / /sna tshogs mang po'i gzugs 'gyur pa/ /mtha' ma nam
63a3(mdo sde): mkha'i mu dang mnyam/ /gzhan yang rdul phran rdul snyed kyi/ /sprul mang lha yi bu mo yis/ /rol mo sil snyan rab bsgrags te/ /gzhal med dag la mngon gnas nas/ /de
63a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs la mchod par byed/ /stobs dang mngon shes dbang thob cing / /dog pa'i sa nas ma nyams pa/ /chos kyi sprin las 'thon gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas sa
63a5(mdo sde): la zhugs pa'i rnams/ /sgyu ma dpa' bar 'gro la sogs/ /ting nge 'dzin la mnyam bzhag ste/ /gzungs la mkhas par gyur pa'i rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs la
63a6(mdo sde): mchod pa byed/ /sangs rgyas yang dag brjod mos rnams/ /mtha' yas zhing du 'gro byas shing / /yang dag yon tan ldan pa dag /sangs rgyas yon tan rab tu brjod/ /dpung
63a7(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i bdud bcom ste/ /rgyal ba dag dang thabs gcig tu/ /rgyal sras so so rang rig pa'i/ /rtogs par bya ba'i ting 'dzin sgom/ /gnas gzhan gyur pa'i yon
63b1(mdo sde): tan can/ /chos la bdag med ston pa'i rnams/ /spros pa thams cad rgyun bcad cing / /dam pa'i don la rnam sgom pa/ /chos lnga rnams kyi rang bzhin dang / /rnam shes brgyad
63b2(mdo sde): la'ang de bzhin te/ /mkhas pa byas par rtag gyur cing / /mnyam par bzhag rnams mchod par byed/ /shin tu phra ba'i rdul 'dra dang / /de bzhin chen po'i lus kyis kyang / /sna
63b3(mdo sde): tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa byed/ /sa rnams kun ko bdag lus dang / /yungs kar 'brur yang rab 'dzud byed/ /rgya mtsho ba lang rjes su
63b4(mdo sde): byed/ /ba lang rjes kyang gangs chen mtshor/ /spu gcig rtse mor brtan g.yo ba'i/ /'gro ba rab tu 'dzud byed kyang / /gnod par byed pa ma yin te/ /'gro ba dag na rnam par spyod/ /
63b5(mdo sde): longs spyod can gyi skyid longs yul/ /nyi zla sa dang mnyam pa ste/ /'tshig med sa dang 'dra bar yang / /rnam pa kun gyis phan 'dogs shing / /me dang rlung dag 'dra ba ste/ /rtag
63b6(mdo sde): tu chu dang sman 'dra ba/ /rin chen khams kyi 'byung khungs ltar/ /sems can kun kyang nye bar 'tsho/ /skyes pa med cing 'gags pa med/ /ma chad rtag pa'ang med pa ste/ /tha dad
63b7(mdo sde): don min don gcig min/ /'gro med 'ong ba med pa'i rnams/ /rnam par brtags pa'i ming dag dang / /kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed pa/ /
64a1(mdo sde): ming dang ming med rnam spangs dag /sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam 'dra/ /dri za'i grong khyer dpe bzhin te/ /smig rgyu chu yi zla ba 'dra/ /rang bzhin kun tu brtags pa dag/
64a2(mdo sde): glog dang sprin dang du ba dang / /mgal pa'i 'khor lo smig rgyu 'dra/ /'di tshul brtags pa'i chos rnams ni/ /rang bzhin kun tu brtags pa ste/ /gang dang gang gi ming rnams kyis
64a3(mdo sde): chos rnams gang dang gang brjod pa/ /de ni de na yod pa min/ /kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no/ /'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/ /'gro ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /brjod pa
64a4(mdo sde): dang ni tha dad pa/ /brjod par bya ba gang yang med/ /'di ni sa yi rang bzhin te/ /kun tu brtags pa rab tu bstan/ /mig dang gzugs las brten byas shing / /gsum las
64a5(mdo sde): yid de 'byung ba yin/ /rnga sgra me ni 'du 'phrod las/ /myu gu sa bon sa las rim/ /khang pa la sogs sna tshogs dang / /snam bu rdza la sogs pa dang / /lus can rnams dang chos
64a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi/ /'di ni rang bzhin gzhan dbang ngo / /don rnams dor ba med pa dang / /gang yang zag pa med pa'i chos/ /so so rang rig rgyud rnams dang / /chos la bdag med
64a7(mdo sde): nyid dang ni/ /thams cad chos kyi grub pa ste/ /rang bzhin du ni de brtags so/ /rang bzhin gyis ni chos kyi rnams/ /tha dad mtshan du bsgrags pa ste/ /chos rnams thams
64b1(mdo sde): cad 'dres par ni/ /rang bzhin med na rab tu 'gyur/ /gcig min rdzas rnams 'dus pa las/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos gcig min gzugs/ /rtogs par sla ba ma yin pa'i/ /sgyu
64b2(mdo sde): ma'i ri dwags byas pa bzhin/ /de ltar dngos po thams cad kyang / /rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags/ /rtogs par mi rung mi gcig gzugs/ /kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin
64b3(mdo sde): no| |sna tshogs nor bu 'dra ba yi/ /ri dwags rdzas kyi rgyu tshogs nas/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan pos rnam byas dang / /sems can kun gyi gzugs bzhin te/ /de ltar dngos po 'di dag
64b4(mdo sde): kun/ /rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags/ /rang bzhin rtogs par dka' ba ste/ /kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar nor bu sna sogs gzugs/ /tshon dang phrad na
64b5(mdo sde): rnam par mdzes/ /de bzhin sa rnams kun ko ste/ /rtog pas rnam par brtags byas na/ /yon tan dngos su mi gnas te/ /sgyu ma rmi lam sprin dang 'dra/ /smig rgyu chu zla lta bu ste//
64b6(mdo sde): kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar dri za'i khang pa dag /khang pa ma yin khang par snang / /rgyu med par yang mi snang ste/ /de bzhin sa rnams sna tshogs nyid/ /nyi zla gzhal
64b7(mdo sde): yas khang rnams dang / /tha mal ri dang rin chen ri/ /du ba sprin gyi gnod pas ni/ /nam yang nyes par mi 'gyur te/ /bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka las/ /rtog pas rnam
65a1(mdo sde): par brtags byas na/ /dngos nyid mi 'grub dngos rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin kun tu brtag pa'o/ /rgyu las dngos po mi 'byung ste/ /rgyu med las
65a2(mdo sde): kyang ma yin no/ /rang bzhin zhes bya rnam rtog ste/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par brtags/ /mtshan ma la ni ming rten te/ /gnyis la rnam par rtog pa gnas/ /yang dag
65a3(mdo sde): shes dang de bzhin nyid/ /rnam par rtog pa zlog pa'o/ /sems ni mtshan ma 'dra ba ste/ /mtshan ma yid la gnas pa yin/ /yid la sems rnams lnga po ni/ /dpa' rlabs
65a4(mdo sde): bzhin du rab tu 'byung / /sems ni bag chags rgyu ba ste/ /bag chags rnams la thog ma med/ /thog ma med pa'i blo yi yul/ /yul ni sems kyi nor ba'o/ /sems ni yul
65a5(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba ste/ /sa rnams yul zhes bya ba yin/ /thams cad sa bon kun gzhi la/ /rnam par shes pa kun kyang gnas/ /rnam shes bdun po kun gzhi las/ /rab tu 'byung ngo
65a6(mdo sde): phan tshun dang / /sems kyi rnams dang kun gzhi la/ /rtag med chad pa'ang med pa ste/ /sa rnams thams cad kun gzhi yin/ /bar snang rnam par gnas pa ste/ /gsum
65a7(mdo sde): po 'dus pa'i rkyen byung ba/ /bdag dang dbang po dag las byung / /lus can rnams kyi rnam shes ni/ /yul rnams rnyed nas 'byung ba ste/ /'di ni rtog pa can gyi tshul/ /rgyu
65b1(mdo sde): dang las kyi rgyus byung ba/ /dbang po sa rnams thams cad dang / /tshangs la sogs pa phyi rol dang / /de dag lha min las kyang min/ /rdul phran gyis kyang sa ma byas/ /sa rnams lta bur kun gzhi
65b2(mdo sde): nyid/ /lta ba'i yul du g.yo ba yin/ /rkyen rnams kun gzhis ma byas te/ /rkyen gyis kun gzhi byas pa min/ /'di dag la ni gsum 'dus med/ /rnam shes 'on kyang 'khor ba ste/ /shel
65b3(mdo sde): 'dra zla ba bzhin du yang / /rnam shes rnams dang lhan cig rgyu/ /bag chags byung ba'i rnam shes dang / /kun gzhi rtag tu 'grogs pa ni/ /zla ba spyad kis zin pa bzhin/ /rnam shes
65b4(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig rgyu/ /bag chags de las langs pa yis/ /rgyas par byed do yang dag yang / /rgyas pa gzhan yang rgyas byed de/ /de la'ang gzhan gyis yang dang yang / /de ltar
65b5(mdo sde): rab tu 'jug pa'i sems/ /mthong nas sems de rnam par ldog/ /mi brtan yul la kun nas 'brel/ /khab long rdo la lcags bzhin te/ /kun gyi gzhi la sems yod pa/ /zag bcas
65b6(mdo sde): zag pa med pa dag / bag chags dag gis bsgos pa'i rnams/ /'jug dang phyir ldog byed pa yin/ /ji ltar bsreg las me bus shing / /gzhan du me yang rab tu bud/ /de dang gzhan du de
65b7(mdo sde): bzhin bud/ /de dag nas kyang spo bzhin dang / /de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes dang / /gzhan yang de las byung ba rnams/ /chos la rab tu rgyu ba ni/ /gtogs dang zag pa med pa dag /mthong ba'i
66a1(mdo sde): chos la gnas pa yi/ /yul dang yul can de yin te/ /'phags pa mthong ba'i chos can gyi/ /ting nge 'dzin kyang 'di dag yin/ /'phags pa de dag de ldan
66a2(mdo sde): zhing / /sgom dang mthong ba ldan pas na/ /chos kun de bzhin nyid shes pa/ /zhing nas zhing du rab tu 'dong / /ji ltar shin tu bzang ba'i gser/ /gser gyi dbyings na mi snang ste/ /brtsal
66a3(mdo sde): bas shin tu zhib btags nas/ /yongs su sbyangs na snang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /rnam par shes pa bdun dang bcas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs
66a4(mdo sde): sbyangs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong / /ji ltar ma bsrubs zho la yang / /de na mar yod mi snang ste/ /bsrub pa'i tshul gyis mthong bas na/ /mkhas pa rnams
