66a5(mdo sde): kyis de phyir bsrub/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /rnam shes bdun dang ldan pa yang / /rnam par bsrubs shing stug spyod pa'i/ /thub pa rnams kyis mthong ba yin
66a6(mdo sde): ma rig pa ni sdug ces bya/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes rnam grangs te/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la bslabs pa yi/ /rnal 'byor can rnams stug por 'dong / /gzugs med gzugs
66a7(mdo sde): yod nam mkha' dang / /rnam shes 'du shes ma yod dag /rnal 'byor can gyis yul bsgoms sam/ /de dag stug po'i zhing du 'dong / /nyi ma zla ba'i 'od bzhin du/ /'jigs pa
66b1(mdo sde): med pa'i rgyal ba'i sras/ /rnal 'byor can gyi thub ston cing / /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur bas/ /de ni dbang bskur stug por song / /
66b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnal 'byor rjes su mthong / /gzhan du gyur nas stug por song / /stug na gnas shing sprul pa dang / /sprul pa'i sprul pa de dag gis/ /gang na gang chos su 'dod pa/ /de ni
66b3(mdo sde): mkha' la 'dug cing ston/ /sngon med dus kyi gnas ngan len/ /bag chags rgyu yis bsags pa yi/ /kun gzhi rnam rtog byas pa yis/ /bcings pa kun tu rab tu 'byung / /
66b4(mdo sde): ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs rnams/ /rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung / /rnam shes de bzhin kun gzhi la/ /rnam shes de ni nges byas pa'i/ /bag
66b5(mdo sde): chags rnams kyis rgyas par 'gyur/ /'byung zhing la la phyir ldog ste/ /chad med rtag pa med pa'o/ /rang sems khong du ma chud pas/ /yul la gzhol ba'i rnam shes rnams//
66b6(mdo sde): rab tu zhugs kyang phyir ldog pa/ /'gro ba rang sems mthong ba'i tshe/ /de bzhin gzhan du gyur pa'i sems/ /me dang bsreg pa ji bzhin te/ /kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba yang /
66b7(mdo sde): gzhan du gyur nas zag pa med/ /zag med 'gros su song ba dang / /'phags pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur/ /kun gzhi yul ltar snang ba ni/ /sa rnams khyab par
67a1(mdo sde): byas shing gnas/ /yid ni bdag la bdag ces te/ /ngar sems rab tu 'jug pa yin/ /rnam shes kha dog khyad par dang / /kun tu gcod pa
67a2(mdo sde): rab tu byed/ /sems ni las rnams gsog pa ste/ /yid ni khong du chud par byed/ /rnam par shes pas rnam par rig /lnga pos snang ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /rab rib ldan
67a3(mdo sde): pa myos pa yis/ /ji ltar skra tshogs mthong ba bzhin/ /gzugs la sogs pa gzugs med de/ /sems ni gzugs ltar gnas pa yin/ /nyi ma zla ba'i nor bu dag /yongs
67a4(mdo sde): su dag pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /nyi zla'i zer gyis phog pa dang / /de dag rang gi yon tan 'byin/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge snying po/ /
67a5(mdo sde): zag med legs dang ldan gyur te/ /gzhan du 'gyur na rab tu 'byin/ /'di ltar snang ba gang yang rung / /mtshan ma gzugs su snang ba'i rnams/ /bag chags yog pa'i
67a6(mdo sde): kun gzhi ste/ /sa rnams kun na gzugs ltar gnas/ /ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa dang / /yon tan zho dang dar bar snang / /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rnam par gyur nas
67a7(mdo sde): gzugs ltar gnas/ /ji ltar rab rib ldan pas skra/ /mig gi nyes pas rnam mthong ba/ /de bzhin bag chags nyes ldan pa'i/ /kun gzhi lus can rnams kyi ste/ /rtag tu mig
67b1(mdo sde): gi nang song ba'i/ /gzugs kyis snang bar rab tu 'jug /'di dag snang ba ci yang rung / /smig rgyu chu yi dpe bzhin te/ /gzugs ni yod dang med kyis spangs/ /kun gzhi rjes su mthong ba'o/ /
67b2(mdo sde): mig dang gzugs las rten byas shing / /de ni sgyu ma bzhin du 'byung / /rtag tu mig gi nang song ba/ /smig rgyu bzhin du rab tu g.yo/ /gzugs kyi yon tan ldan pa'i gzugs/ /kun gzhi
67b3(mdo sde): gzugs ltar gnas pa ste/ /byis pa ji ltar brtags pa bzhin/ /gzugs ni gud na yod pa min/ /byed med sems pa'ang med pa ste/ /dbu ba'i phung po bzhin du gnas/ /gnyid log ra
67b4(mdo sde): ro dregs pa dang / /'gro 'dug rnam par rgyug pa yi/ /bya ba gcig car byed pa ni/ /lus can rnams kyi kun gzhi'o/ /ji ltar gdung bas bas ras las/ /gyen du ldang ba'i smig rgyu rnams/ /dbyid
67b5(mdo sde): ka'i chu ltar rab tu g.yo/ /ri dwags rnams la slu bar byed/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /gzugs min lta ba'i spyod yul du/ /gzugs snang ji ltar rtog can gyis/ /brtags bzhin
67b6(mdo sde): gzugs 'dra ma yin no/ /ji ltar khab long mthong ba dang / /lcags ni myur bar kun tu 'khor/ /'on kyang de la sems pa med/ /sems ldan bzhin du'ang rab tu snang / /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam
67b7(mdo sde): shes kyang / /sems med sems can ji bzhin du/ /'gro dang 'ong bar g.yo ba ste/ /sa rnams 'bri bar rab tu byed/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dza ru ni/ /srog med par yang g.yo 'gul te/ /de bzhin
68a1(mdo sde): kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /lus la gnas shing g.yo bar gyur/ /glang po glang po'i gzugs brnyan dang / /ji ltar 'thab cing choms nas min/ /de bzhin kun
68a2(mdo sde): gzhi rnam shes pa/ /'jug pa choms nas mi rgyu'o/ /ji ltar pad+ma'o dri med pa/ /'dam gyi nang nas byung ba ni/ /mi dang lha dang btsun la 'os/ /lha yul gnas pa kun kyang 'dod/ /de
68a3(mdo sde): bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /bag chags 'dam nas byung ba ni/ /rnam dag gzhan du gnas gyur pa/ /bdag nyid che rnams 'dod pa yin/ /ji ltar rin chen rnam par dag /ri brag
68a4(mdo sde): mi yis bcags brdungs kyang / /rgyal po'i cod pan du'ang 'os/ /cod pan la yang gdags pa yin/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /bag chags rnams kyis bcags
68a5(mdo sde): brdungs pa/ /rnam dag sangs rgyas rigs yin te/ /sangs rgyas nyid du de gzung ngo / /ji ltar chu gting rdo ba dag /nya lcibs dag gis yongs dkris pa/ /de bzhin kun gzhi
68a6(mdo sde): rnam shes kyang / /bag chags dri ma can du byas/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs su yang / /dngos po gnyis kyis rab tu 'jug /ji ltar kha gnyis yod pa'i sbrul/ /
68a7(mdo sde): gang du 'dod pa der 'gro ste/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /rim dang cig car rgyu ba yin/ /rtag tu sna tshogs gzugs lta bu/ /de la rtog pas rnam par brtag/
68b1(mdo sde): rtog can rnam par myos 'gyur ba/ /bdag dang bdag gir rnam rtog cing / /yod dang med kyi rgyu sdod pa'i/ /sa rnams la yang rnam rtog ste/ /'gyur ba'i yongs su gyur pa dang / /kun
68b2(mdo sde): gzhi zab pa nyid dag kyang / /blo chung rnams kyis mi rigs pas/ /sgyu ma'i ri dwags bzhin du 'khor/ /rang bzhin gcig min shes par dka'/ /lus can kun la 'dra ba ste/ /de bzhin kun
68b3(mdo sde): gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rtag tu sgyu ma'i ri dwags 'dra/ /sems can gcig min shes par dka'/ /yod dang med par rnam par brtag /rdul dang gtso po skyes bu dang / /mi gsal tshangs
68b4(mdo sde): pa'ang de yin te/ /rtog pas 'khrul pa'i rtog can rnams/ /kun gzhin la ni rtag tu rtog /sa rnams lta bur gnas pa la/ /sna tshogs sar yang de bzhin rtog /sa la gang gis rtogs
68b5(mdo sde): gyur pa'i/ /yid ni kun nas rtog ces bya/ /ji ltar ri mo mtho dman dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sprin gyi gzugs/ /'ja' dang ri dwags sred byed dang / /sprin sgra 'brug kyang ji bzhin
68b6(mdo sde): te/ /rab rib can gyi phreng ba dang / /bzang mo'i gdong yang de bzhin du/ /rmi lam dag na rnam sna tshogs/ /dri za'i khang ba gnas rten dang / /ro langs chu yi shing rnams dang / /brag ca sprin
68b7(mdo sde): dang du ba dang / /me long mig la gzugs brnyan dang / /chu la chu yi zla ba dang / /rnam rtog 'di dang mang por yang / 'gro ba rnams ni kun gzhi rtog/ gang tshe kun gzhi 'di 'dra bar/ /rnam pa sna
69a1(mdo sde): tshogs kun mthong ste/ /'gro ba rang sems mthong ba dang / /de'i tshe sems ni phyir ldog go/ /chos rnams thams cad kun gyi gzhi/ /bag chags
69a2(mdo sde): snyoms la sogs pa dang / /rtog pas rnyog pa can du byas/ /gzhan du gyur nas zag pa med/ /zag med rang lugs rab thob nas/ /de dag rtag cing brtan par 'gyur/ /
69a3(mdo sde): nam mkha' mya ngan 'das dang mnyam/ /'gog dang 'dra ba de bzhin te/ /mnyam gzhag sems dang ldan pa la/ /mi zag chos rnams skye bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul bsam
69a4(mdo sde): gtan rnam thar dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang stobs rnams dang / /thabs dang stobs dang mngon shes dag/ 'bri med mi zad de bzhin te/ /nam mkha' zad kyi mthar snyegs
69a5(mdo sde): shing / /dbyings blo rnam shes rtag pa dang / /mthar phyin bcu yi gnas ldan zhing / /yid bzhin shin tu brtan pa'i lus/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /
69a6(mdo sde): gzhan du gyur nas rab tu 'thob/ /'jig pa mya ngan 'da' ma yin/ /sems can yod min skye ba med/ /'bri med gang ba med par yang / /rgyal ba rnams kyis 'go
69a7(mdo sde): bar bshad/ /zhing gzhan rnams dang zhing 'di yi/ /chos nyid gcig tu zad pa ste/ /skyes par gyur tam ma skyes kyang / /chos rnams chos nyid de bzhin gnas/ /rnal
69b1(mdo sde): 'byor ldan pa grol ba la/ /rtag med chad pa med pa ste/ /sems can khams rnams zhig gyur na/ /thams cad mkhyen pa mi snang ngo / /ma byon pa yi rgyal ba dang / /'das dang da ltar
69b2(mdo sde): byung ba dag / mnyam pa ma yin mthun pa min/ /shes bya zad nas de dag 'byung / /bdud rnams tshar bcad log pa ste/ /brjod dang bcas dang brjod med kyang / /de ste sems can
69b3(mdo sde): 'jig na ni/ /sdug bsngal sbubs las mi 'grol lo/ /lcags kyi gar bu bsregs pa las/ /me las byung ste bsil gyur cing / /lcags ni rtag par 'dug pa bzhin/ /de ltar
69b4(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can dag 'khod/ /phung po'i khyim dang nges byung ba'i/ /bag chags rnams kyang 'gag pa dang / /thub pa rnal 'byor brtson pa'i rnams/ /de dag rtag cing grol ba
69b5(mdo sde): yin/ /rnam shes rnams ni dba' rlabs bzhin/ /kun gzhi mtsho las 'byung ba ste/ /chos lnga'i rang bzhin rnam shes kyis/ /rab tu bskyod cing shin tu rgyu/ /gnas ngan len
69b6(mdo sde): gyi spros pa yis/ /bcom pa gnas med don gyi gzugs/ /lta ba'i yul du rnam par g.yo/ /de ltar shes nas phyir log ste/ /gzhan gyur mi bzad rtag pa'i rnams/ /mgon
69b7(mdo sde): po dag ni stug por 'dod/ /stug na gnas pa zla ba bzhin/ /rtag tu gzugs brnyan rnam par mdzes/ /phung po stug pa kun gzhi ste/ /yid ni de la nye phan no/ /rnam par shes
70a1(mdo sde): pa rtogs par byed/ /gzugs dang las la sogs pa'i rgyu/ /rnam shes lnga yi tshogs rnams ni/ /dbang por bcas shing yul gzhol bas/ /sna
70a2(mdo sde): tshogs yid la 'dzin par byed/ /kun gzhi yul can ma yin no/ /tshe ni kun gzhi rnam shes te/ /yid ni drod du rab tu gnas/ /yid kyi rnam shes de na ste/ /lhag ma dbang
70a3(mdo sde): po lngar yang gnas/ /sems dang yid dang rnam par shes/ /phung po'i dpus na rnam par gnas/ /bag chags las dang 'brel pa'i rnams/ /sngon chad byas pa rnams
70a4(mdo sde): kyis 'byung / /'dod chags sred las byung ba yi/ /las kyis bya ba byed pa ste/ /sngon chad de dag las byas pas/ /rgyun du las rnams 'byung ba yin/ /lus las lus
70a5(mdo sde): ni gzhan la 'gro/ /'pho ba srin bu pad pa bzhin/ /sems dang sems byung bcas pa'i rnams/ /rgyun chags par ni shin tu 'dong / /yang zhing phung po'i tshogs rnams
70a6(mdo sde): dang / /rnam shes srid pa dog par yang / /tshogs shing rab tu 'byung ba ni/ /las rnams shin tu 'byung ba'i phyir/ /tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis/ /gang tshe lus
70a7(mdo sde): ni bor gyur pa/ /de tshe lus ni dor ba ste/ /shing bzhin tshor ba med pa'o/ /sems ni kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /ngar sems bdag nyid yid yin no/ /gang zhig yul
70b1(mdo sde): la 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni rnam par shes zhes bya/ /sems ni las rnams gsog pa ste/ /yid ni khong du chud par byed/ /rnam par shes pas rnam par rig/ /lnga pos snang ba rtogs
70b2(mdo sde): par byed/ / //'phags pa rgyan stug po/ /bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ lus ni sems kyis bzung ba yin/ /yid ni lam rgyud 'dod pa ste/ /rnam par shes pas
70b3(mdo sde): rnam par rig/ snang ba gcod pa lnga pa'o/ /rgyu la dmigs shing rnam shes rnams/ /skye ste gzhan ni de rjes 'brang / /yid la dmigs shing gzhan dag kyang / /mthar
70b4(mdo sde): chags su ni rab tu 'byung / /yid rnyed nas kyang gzhan dag ni/ /dbang gi yon tan rnams kyis byas/ /dbang ni lnga dang lhan cig tu/ /rnam par shes pa rab tu byed/ /'du byed
70b5(mdo sde): rgyu dang lhan cig tu/ /ro langs 'gro dang 'dra ba ste/ /smig rgyu dag gis gzugs dang mnyam/ /log pa ma yin bden pa yin/ /'di ni bdag med stong pa ste/ /srid pas
70b6(mdo sde): kun tu 'dra ba yin/ /'byung rnams lhan cig 'byung ba dag/ thams cad dus yid lha cig ste/ /sems byung yid ces bya dang / /khan cig rnam par shes pa 'byung //
70b7(mdo sde): rnam shes lnga po de dang / /yid kyi rnam shes ldan pa ni/ /gnas ngan len dang sred bsgos pa/ /rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung / /lus can kun gyi kun gzhi yang //
71a1(mdo sde): sems dang sems byung ldan pa 'byung / /kun gzhi rnyed nas de dag rgyu/ /rgyu nas rgyas par byed pa ste/ /sems rnams lam rgyud thams cad du/ /rtag par
71a2(mdo sde): gcig las gcig rgyas 'gyur/ /sa 'di rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /rnam par shes pa rnams las 'byung / /kun gzhi sna tshogs gzugs can ni/ /rnam shes rnams kyi gnas
71a3(mdo sde): yin no/ /phan tshun rgyu yi stobs ldan pa/ /rnam shes 'khor lo 'khor ba ste/ /kun gzhi mtsho la dba' rlabs bzhin/ /sa bon dag dang myu gu'i rgyud/ /chu bo'i
71a4(mdo sde): rgyun kyang mtshams med cing / /rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung mod kyi/ /tha dad bye brag dag kyang snang / /de bzhin rnam shes spyod pa ste/ /mtshams med pa yi rgyun du yang / /
71a5(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'byung / /gsum dang ldan zhing gsum las yang / /sems dang yid dang rnam shes rnams/ /bag chags bde bas bskyed pa dang / /rang sems
71a6(mdo sde): rnam par 'khrul pa yis/ /dba' rlabs bzhin du rtag tu 'byung / /chos rnams kun gyi 'byung ba dag /phyi dang nang yang rnam bsgoms te/ /thub pa'i gnas kyang rnam
71a7(mdo sde): bsgoms nas/ /mnyam par bzhag par stug por 'gro/ rdo rje'i snying po khyod dang yang / /rgyal sras 'jigs med gzhan dag kyang / /stug por 'jug pa byed pa'i chos//
71b1(mdo sde): thams cad chos kyang rab ston pa/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras rnams/ /thabs gcig rab tu rnam dgongs te/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid dpe med pa/ /rmad du byung ba 'di bstan
71b2(mdo sde): to| |rdo rje snying po 'jigs med pa/ /rin chen sna tshogs zla snying gi/ /seng ge'i khri la rab 'dug ste/ /shes rab chen pos rnam bsgoms kyi/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdun bdar
71b3(mdo sde): ba| |stug po'i rgyan la rnam par bsgoms/ /rnam par bsgoms nas rtag par 'di/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor ston/ /zla dbang rgyal ba des bstan la/ /bag med par
71b4(mdo sde): ni ma byed cig / zla ba'i dpal gyi bcom ldan 'das/ /sprul par bye ba mang sprul cing / /'dod pa'i khams kyi bsnyengs bral dang / /gzugs can rnams kyi gnas su yang / /
71b5(mdo sde): rgyal sras rnams kyis kun nas bskor/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mdun bdar cing / /tshul gyis dam pa ston pa ni/ /'jigs med stug po'i rgyan yin no/ /rnal 'byor can gyis spyod
71b6(mdo sde): pa'i mchog/ tshul bzang rnal 'byor spyod pa ste/ /so so rang rig shes pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin dang bde ba'i rnams/ /yang dag mtha' la mi rig par/ /rjes su myong bar byas
71b7(mdo sde): nas kyang / /rnal 'byor bde las mngon langs shing / /gcig la gcig ni phan tshun lta/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul dge 'di/ /gang gis shin tu mthong bar gyur/ /rnam
72a1(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs 'os pa yi/ /stan gyi mchog la 'khod pa'i rnams/ /kun kyang ngo mtshar rab tu rnyed/ /bsam byed bsam gtan bsam pa dang / /bsam
72a2(mdo sde): gtan rnams kyi dgos pa dag / rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/ /kun kyang sems shing rab tu gnas/ /stug po'i rgyan dang rgyal po la/ /lta ba mnyam par bzhag
72a3(mdo sde): pa'i rnams/ /mgo la cod pan thogs pa dag/ mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /yan lag bris pa de dag kun/ /bye ba'i zhing nas 'ongs pa ste/ /g.yo ba rnams dang shin
72a4(mdo sde): tu bral/ /thams cad gos bzang cha lugs mdzes/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa stobs chen te/ /lta'o rdo rje snying po la/ /rnam par rtog dang rnam dpyod la/ /chos la mos pa yang
72a5(mdo sde): dag tu/ /mthong ste de nas de kun dang / /phyogs rnams bzhi por blta byas te/ /'dzum pa sngon du rab btang nas/ /'jam zhing snyan pa'i dbyangs su smras/ /rgyal sras
72a6(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnams/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor yul/ /gang la rtog can myos 'gyur ba/ /de dag bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /gang bsam gang gis
72a7(mdo sde): ji lta bur/ /bsam gtan bsam byed dgos pa dag/ 'dod dang sdig pa rnams kyis dben/ /rnam par rtog bcas rnam dpyod bcas/ /dga' bde dben las skyes
72b1(mdo sde): par yang / /bsam gtan dang po skye ba yin/ /de lta bu yi rim tshul du/ /bzhi dang brgyad dang de bzhin bcu/ /mur 'dug bdag tu smra ba dang / /bsam gtan can rnams bsam
72b2(mdo sde): gtan byed/ /nyan thos theg pa can rnams dang / /rang rgyal theg ldan de bzhin te/ /kun kyang rtag tu bsam gtan byed/ /chos rnams dang ni sa dag gi/ /rang gi mtshan nyid
72b3(mdo sde): rtogs pa dang / /phung po skye mched tshogs kyi rnams/ /'di dag thams cad bdag med de/ /byed pa med cing g.yo ba med/ /gsum po 'dus las rab tu byung / /'khrul 'khor ro
72b4(mdo sde): langs 'dra ba ste/ /byed pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs/ /thub pa phyi rol bsam gtan byed/ /stong par lta ba'i lta ba can/ /chos kyi mtshan la mos pa rnams/ /chud gson
72b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /phung po bdag med mkhas pa'i rnams/ /bsam gtan 'di 'drar bsam gtan byed/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bsam gtan dag/ lha rdzas
72b6(mdo sde): bsod nams lta sbyong ba/ /rnal 'byor can dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /mnyam gzhag rtag par bsam gtan byed/ /'di dag thams cad sems tsam ste/ /mtshan can mtshan
72b7(mdo sde): nyid yod pa min/ /phung po rnams med khams yod min/ /thams cad chos la mtshan nyid med/ /rdul phran rnam par gzhigs pa dang / /de dag de ltar mi gnas so/ /
73a1(mdo sde): rtog pa bskyed pas brtags pa ni/ /dngos po sa dang chu la sogs/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin mi shes pa/ /mtshan nyid du yang rnam par rtog /kha dog
73a2(mdo sde): sdug dang mi sdug dang / /kha dog snang bzhin de bzhin te/ /'ja' dang in+d+ra go ba ltar/ /kha dog sna mang sprin lta bu'i/ /sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra ba yis/ /thams cad 'gro ba
73a3(mdo sde): kun bkang ste/ /rgyas pa'i skye mched ces bya bas/ /'byung ba rnams kyang rnam gzhigs te/ /rnal 'byor shes pa gzugs can gyis/ /lus la rtag tu gzugs kyang
73a4(mdo sde): mthong / /gang la dmigs te mnyam gzhag pa/ /de la dmigs shing rnam par ldang / /gang dang gang la rnam rtog pa/ /de dang de ni dmigs pa yin/ /rnal 'byor can
73a5(mdo sde): med rnal 'byor med/ /de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyi rnal 'byor nyid/ /kun gzhis rnams thams cad dang / /thub pa'i rnal 'byor bde la gnas/ /
73a6(mdo sde): chos dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang / /rtag tu rab tu rtogs byas shing / /mnyam par bzhag pa'i khyad par dag/ mnyam gzhag ldan pa rab tu ston/ /chos kyi rang
73a7(mdo sde): bzhin rnam phye bas/ /rnal 'byor can gyi blo 'khrug pa/ /blo gros zhan pas rab tu skye/ /chos dang bdag la 'dzin par 'gyur/ /yid ches lung dang mi ldan par/ /chos
73b1(mdo sde): rnams ston par byed pa ni/ /mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis/ /bdag kyang chud zos gzhan chud gson/ /mtshan nyid can med mtshan nyid med/ /'dres pa'i phyir na rnam par
73b2(mdo sde): snang / /mngar ba'i rnams ni mkhris pa sel/ /bad kan tsha skyur lan tshwa ste/ /ma zhu tsha ba'i rnam pa dang / /lan tshwa la sogs rnam pas sel/ /mkhris pa bad kan 'khrugs pa
73b3(mdo sde): las/ /rims rnams skye bar 'gyur ba dang / /lus can rnams kyi lus yul du/ /'dus pa rlung las byung ba dang / /rims dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /thub pas bsdu
73b4(mdo sde): ba byas pa ni/ /kha ra la sogs yan lag drug/ sha dang skol ma khu ba dag/ tha dad mtshan gyis 'jig 'gyur ba/ /lus can rnams kyi rims kun to/ /rnam shes rnams
73b5(mdo sde): ni kun gzhi la/ /phan tshun tha dad mi gnas te/ /gal te chos kyi rang bzhin nam/ /mtshan nyid gcig ni yod gyur na/ /de tshe chos dang mtshan nyid la/ /mtshan nyid
73b6(mdo sde): mi 'dra med par 'gyur/ /rdzas rnams bsdus pas sel mi nus/ /mi yang sos par mi 'gyur ro/ /sos dang rnam par bsal ba 'di/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis mthong ba
73b7(mdo sde): ste/ /gzhan du kun gzhi rnam shes pa/ /rnam pa mang por gnas pa ste/ /sgyu ma'i ri dwags bzhin 'khor ba/ /rnal 'byor brtson pas brtags pa yin/ /mtshan
74a1(mdo sde): med mtshan can med pa ste/ /phung po rnams las phung po can/ /gzhan med yan lag nyid lag las/ /yan lag can med yan lag la/ /
74a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten rgyu yis ma byas te/ /'bras bu rnams la rgyu yang med/ /'jig rten rdul phran bsags pa min/ /phyogs dang gnas su mi 'gro'o/ /de dag sor gnyis sor
74a3(mdo sde): gsum du/ /ci yang rtsom par mi byed de/ /dngos po yod pa phrad pa'i phyir/ /rdul phran thams cad 'du bar 'dod/ /de tshe yon tan khyad yod pa/ /yon tan rnams kyis yon
74a4(mdo sde): tan du/ /'jig rten ma byas rang bzhin gyis/ /'jig rten rkyen las ma byung ste/ /'dod rgyal dngos kyis de bzhin min/ /chos gsum pas kyang ma byas te/ /bag chags
74a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis dkrugs pa'i sems/ /rnam par rtog pa mang po'i gnas/ /snying gi phyogs na gnas pa yi/ /lus can kun gyi kun gzhi dang / /sems dang yid
74a6(mdo sde): dang rnam shes rnams/ /'gro ba dag gis sna tshogs brtags/ /'gro ba ma lus rab mnan te/ /sgyu ma'i ri dwags bzhin du gnas/ /sems tsam du ni 'jug pa las/ /
74a7(mdo sde): gzhan du yongs su gnas 'pho ste/ /sa la stong zhes brjod par bya/ /sems ni dngos po'i tshul du gnas/ /rdza la sogs pa'i yul med de/ /sems 'di rdza ma lta bu'o/ /
74b1(mdo sde): sa la gzugs rnams yod pa dang / /lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba/ /de dag kun gzhi snang ba yin/ /kun gzhi kun tu lag pa ste/ kun
74b2(mdo sde): tu kha mig mgo bo yang / /cig car ba dang rim gyis kyang / /sa rnams yog par rab tu gnas/ /bus pa rnam par myos byed de/ /gang gi snying la gang gnas pa/ /de ni de la gnyis
74b3(mdo sde): tshul du/ /lus kun bkang ste rab tu gnas/ /stong min dngos po gang yang med/ /tho bas ji ltar rdza bzhin du/ /dngos po gang la gzhom bya ba'i/ /dngos po dngos su yod pa min/ /
74b4(mdo sde): de ste stong pa'i dngos yod na/ /'jig med ma yin gzhig par 'gyur/ /gzhig bya gzhig par byed pa gang / /de ni rnam par rtog pas brtags/ /ri rab ri bo tsam 'gyur
74b5(mdo sde): ba'i/ /bdag tu lta ba mi gnod kyi/ /stong nyid lta ba gnod pa ni/ /nga rgyal mi bden brtags pa'o/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid/ /gnas ma yin par sbyar
74b6(mdo sde): mi bya/ /gnas min gal te sbyar gyur na/ /bdud rtsi dug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung / /lus can rnams la yod pa yi/ /lta ba rnam par spang ba'i phyir/ /
74b7(mdo sde): stong pa nyid kyi tshul bstan to/ /stong pa nyid kyi lta bros kyang / /la la'i lta ba ma zhig na/ /gsor mi rung ba'i lta can te/ /sman pas gtang ba'i nad pa bzhin/ /ji ltar bsreg
75a1(mdo sde): pa tshig pa'i me/ /bsreg pa med pas mi gnas so/ /de bzhin bsreg bya lta tshig na/ /stong nyid me yang 'gag par 'gyur/ /lta bas 'gog pa'i
75a2(mdo sde): dus su yang / /ye shes yang dag me 'byung ste/ /nyon mongs thams cad sreg par byed/ /nyon mongs pa sregs nas rnam par mdzes/ /thub pa rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnams//
75a3(mdo sde): ye shes 'di ldan thub spyod dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas kyi mchog /stug po der ni rab tu 'dong / /ri bong rwa yis ri bo rnams/ /mngon par gzhig bya ma
75a4(mdo sde): mthong ste/ /'di la mo gsham bu yis kyang / /srog chags gang yang bsad pa med/ /ri bong rwa yi gzhu yis kyang / /su yang 'thab mo mi byed de/ /mo gsham bu la su
75a5(mdo sde): yang rung / /khyim gyi las su mi sko'o/ /stong pa nyid dang mi rtag nyid/ /rtag tu dngos dang gcig gyur te/ /yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin yang / /de bzhin gcig pa nyid du gyur/ /
75a6(mdo sde): mngal na gnas dus tshun chad kyang / /gzugs rnams gzhig par brtson pa ste/ /gang na'ang de med gzugs yod min/ /gzugs med par yang de med de/ /khyad
75a7(mdo sde): par med par 'byung ba ni/ /ma bsgribs zla dang 'od zer bzhin/ /de bzhin dngos rnams stong nyid dang / /lhan cig gcig tu 'byung ba ste/ /phan tshun rnam pa tha dad du/ /
75b1(mdo sde): de dag dgos pa mi sgrub bo/ /rgyu dang rkyen rnams tshegs pa las/ /rnal 'byor can gyi las sgrub bo/ /lus 'di bdag yod ma yin te/ /ro langs 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'dra/ /sred
75b2(mdo sde): ba'i srad bus bcings byas shing / /yul gyi rnams kyis drang ba yin/ /lha rdzas stong pa nyid bshad pa/ /lta ba thams cad sbyong ba ste/ /mtha' rgal stong pa nyid lta ba/ /rgyal ba rnams
75b3(mdo sde): kyis lta med bshad/ /stong nyid lta ba sbyong ba ni/ /yod dang med pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ /blo ldan mnyam par bzhag pa yi/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsgom/ /rtswa dang shing dang
75b4(mdo sde): gyo mo dag / sgyu ma'i mkhan pos rgyur byas te/ /sngags kyis ci dang cir 'dod par/ /gzugs kyi dngos su rab tu byed/ /gzugs dang snang ba yid byed dang / /sred dang mig rnams
75b5(mdo sde): rgyur byas shing / /mig gi rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin/ /smig rgyu bzhin du de g.yo'o/ /gang gi yul du'ang pa med/ /yul gzhan dag tu'ang 'gro ba min/ /'di lta'i rnam shes
75b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba la/ /yod dang med par brtag mi bya/ /skra yi tshogs dang bong bu'i rwa/ /mo gsham bu dang smig rgyu dang / /dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dag /ming du grag gi yod pa min/ /stag
75b7(mdo sde): dang gzig dang dom dag dang / /rnga rta bong bu khyi rnams dang / /g.yi dang gsal dang rus sbal la/ /rwa ni yod pa ma yin na/ /thub pa rtsod par brtson pa yis/ /de dag ci phyir mi
76a1(mdo sde): brtag cing / /bong bu'i rwa la brtag par bya/ /ci go de dag bsgrub nus sam/ /shes rab can gyis sar bstan pa/ /de dag nyi tshe brtag par bya/ /rtog
76a2(mdo sde): pa can rnams 'khor ba ni/ /blun po long ba 'on pa 'dra/ /sgrol ba'i ye shes de la med/ /so so rang rig yul yang med/ /gzhan gyis byas pa'i tshul dag la/ /rnam par rtog
76a3(mdo sde): pas ci zhig nus/ /stug por gnas par rnam par rtogs/ /de la brtags shing dge ba 'thob/ /rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor can/ /de na gnas pa bzhin du snang / /
76a4(mdo sde): lha yul gnas pa'i bsnyems bral dang / /zla ba gza' la sogs pa yang / /rlung gis rab tu bskyod pa'i rnams/ /ri rab rten cing rgyu ba yin/ /de bzhin rnam par shes pa
76a5(mdo sde): bdun/ /bag chags rnams dang ldan pa yi/ /kun gzhi kun gyi sa bon can/ /de la brtag cing rab tu rgyu/ /ji ltar sa las kun brten cing / /sa skye kun kyang 'byung ba bzhin//
76a6(mdo sde): sems can kun gyi gnas yin te/ /'byung khungs kun gyi khyad par du/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rnam shes rnams kyi gnas yin te/ /sems dang sems
76a7(mdo sde): las byung bar ldan/ /dba' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'byung / /ji ltar rma bya'i 'dab sgro rnams/ /'od dang kha dog rnam mang ste/ /gtsug phud can rnams 'dab sgro yis/ /
76b1(mdo sde): rma bya mo dang longs rtse ba/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /sa bon mang can mtsho ltar gnas/ /thams cad chos kyi gzhi yin te/ rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong / /ji ltar
76b2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chu bo yis/ /nyin gcig bzhin du gang bya yang / /chu bo rnams ni rgyun mi 'chad/ /rgya mtsho rtog par yod mi byed/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /zab cing mtsho ltar
76b3(mdo sde): gnas pa ste/ /rnam shes rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin/ /bag chags chu bos rab tu dgang / /ji ltar rin chen ldan pa'i sa/ /sna tshogs kun tu phan 'dogs te/ /sems
76b4(mdo sde): can rnams kyang nye bar 'tsho/ /yon tan dngos su ston pa yin/ /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes kyang / /rnam rtog rnams dang lhan cig 'byung / /de ni 'khor ba 'phel byed de/ /
76b5(mdo sde): gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu can/ /spyod pa legs spyad gtsang ba ste/ /sa bcu pa las mngon byung ste/ bde bar gshegs pa'i
76b6(mdo sde): sar zhugs nas/ /yang dag mtha' la rab gnas pa/ /sna tshogs sems can rnam sprul par/ /'jigs pa med par 'byung ba ni/ /rnam par rtog med sa bzhin no/ /
76b7(mdo sde): sos ka me tog mang po'i gzugs/ /mi dang bya yi yid du 'ong / /de bzhin sna tshogs len pa'i sems/ /thub shes yid 'ong myos par byed/ /ji ltar don mkhas rgyal
77a1(mdo sde): ba'i sras/ /'byung las byung ba ma yin pa/ /med pa'i blo can de bzhin te/ /log par smra la brtson pa dag /chos dang mi mthun phra ma can/ /lce gnyis
77a2(mdo sde): log par lta ba dag / rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i dngos/ /rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed/ /ji ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu zhig/ /'bras bu sna tshogs ston byed pa/ /'bras bu me
77a3(mdo sde): tog de na med/ /sngags dang khong bzos zo mdog bde/ /'jig rten rnam pa gzhan gnas pa/ /rnam pa gzhan du ston par byed/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /kun
77a4(mdo sde): kyang thabs kyi dmigs la mkhas/ /bstan pa gzhan la ji snyed du/ /bstan pa byas pa de dag kun/ /bde gshegs rnal 'byor mkhas pa yis/ /bstan pa stug po'i
77a5(mdo sde): rgyan la bstan/ /khams rnams drug dang bco brgyad bstan/ /skye mched bcu dang gnyis kyi mi/ /yid kyi srad bus btags pa dag/ /sems can kun tu rab tu 'khor/ /
77a6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi tshogs/ /khams dang skye mched phung po ste/ /yid kyi srad bus bcing byas shing / /lus dang lus la rab tu rgyu/ /'di ni 'gro ba'i skyes bu ste/ /
77a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba rnams kyi don du bstan/ /lus can kun gyi skyes bu ni/ /'gro yang byung ba ma yin te/ /khams rnams drug po skyes bu yin/ /skye mched bcu gnyis de bzhin te/ /bco
77b1(mdo sde): brgyad rnams la yid rgyu ba/ /dbang sgyur zhes ni bya ba ste/ /dbang sgyur pho brang sna tshogs pa/ /nor bu rin chen grong rdal dang / /dga' ldan la sogs bsnyems bral dang / /mtshe ma'i gnas
77b2(mdo sde): su'ang de bzhin bshad/ /rdo rje snying po dbang can la/ /rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/ /dge'o dge zhes dga' 'bod cing / /thams cad mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub ldan rnal
77b3(mdo sde): 'byor spyod pa dang / /rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /zhing dang zhing na bzhugs pa dang / /lha yul gnas pa'i rgyal sras dang / /rnal 'byor bdag po rnal 'byor can/ /ye shes dbang po
77b4(mdo sde): 'phrul chen dang / /dbang sgyur lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang / /thal mo sbyar te gnas par gyur/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig lta zhing / /rgyal ba'i sras la smra ba ni/ /'gro ba'i lha rdzas
77b5(mdo sde): skyes bu yang / /mur 'dug bdag smra spangs pa ste/ /thub can kun gyi skyes bu ni/ /thub pa'i khyu mchog khyod kyis bstan/ /'das dang da ltar byung ba yis/ /sngon byas ma byas thos pa
77b6(mdo sde): ni| |sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /khams drug skyes bu dge ba'o/ /ji ltar mkha' la bya rjes rnams/ /rnam par bzhag pa de bzhin du/ /sems tshogs ldan pa'i khams
77b7(mdo sde): kyi rnams/ /gtan tshigs bcas pa rab tu bstan/ /ji ltar shing las me dag gi /me lce gnam du gnas par 'gyur/ /bsregs pa gzhan ni ma rnyed cing / /rlung gis babs
78a1(mdo sde): na gtan mi 'bar/ /bya rjes rnam par bzhag pa ni/ /mkha' la gnas pa mi snang ste/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khor ba yi/ /'gro ba'i skyes bu snang ba yin/ /
78a2(mdo sde): bya rnams rkang pas mi 'dod ste/ /de dag sgro yi shugs kyis 'dod/ /bya yi rjes dang 'dra ba ni/ /skyes bu'i sgo nas rab tu bstan/ /las kyi skyes bu bstan pa ni/ /'khor rnams rtag
78a3(mdo sde): tu 'khor ba ste/ /bde dang sdug bsngal myong byed pa/ /byas pa'i las ni chud mi za/ /ji ltar zhing pa rnams kyi las/ /'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te/ /don dang ldan pa de dag
78a4(mdo sde): ni| |gzhan yang 'ong zhes rmo ba med/ /lha rdzas 'gro ba'i skyes bu ni/ /rnal 'byor can la rnal 'byor ston/ /lus can lus kyi nang nas zhing / /de ni dge ba'i las byed do/ /
78a5(mdo sde): 'di dang phyi ma'i bde ba dang / /lha yul gnas pa'i gnas mthong zhing / /'khor los sangs rgyas rgyur 'gyur ba'i/ /bsod nams rnams ni rtag tu byed/ /thar dang pha rol phyin
78a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / /sangs rgyas bsam gtan spyod yul kun/ /'gro ba'i skyes bu med na ni/ /kun kyang 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /lha yi bde ba thams cad dang / /dbang sgyur
78a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / /de bzhin nyid mthong thub pa yi/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyang med par 'gyur/ /las dang las kyi 'bras bu mthong / /las rnams don med ma yin
78b1(mdo sde): te| |'o dod 'bod la sogs pa dang / /mnar med mtha' dang lha rnams kyi/ /lam gyi rgyud kyang yod pa yin/ /'gro ba'i skyes bu de yod na/ /sred pa'i 'khor lo 'khor bar 'gyur/ /
78b2(mdo sde): 'khor dang bral na thar pa ste/ /blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'jug pa'i skyes bu med na ni/ /mo gsham bu yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bong bu'i rwa yang rno 'gyur te/ /bye ma las kyang ti la
78b3(mdo sde): mar 'byung / /phyi dang nang gis rnams ni/ /phan tshun stobs kyis byung ba ste/ /gang dang gang du 'gro ba dag /de dang de dag 'grogs pa yin/ /lha dang lha yi bu mo'i tshogs/ /dbang sgyur
78b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang / /dri za grub pa'i rgyal po dang / /sngags 'chad chung ma'i tshogs rnams kyang / /thub la mchod par 'os pa yi/ /rdo rje snying po sras bcas la/ /mchod
78b5(mdo sde): de gsol ba 'debs par byed/ /thams cad dge'o dge zhes smra/ /nyams pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul/ /rgyu dang dpe yis brgyan pa ni/ /gzhan gyis rgol ba 'joms pa ste/ /dpa'
78b6(mdo sde): po chen po khyod kyis bstan/ /bgab zungs ltag chod tshar gcod pa/ /bdag gi phyogs kyi yon tan ston/ /shes rab can gyis bstan du gsol/ /'gro ba 'di dag nyan par
78b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /ji snyed rgyal ba'i sras rnams dang / /lha yi rgyal po kun kyang nyon/ /shin tu dka' ba'i bsam yas rgyu/ /brtags 'das rtog dang bral ba yi/ /rgyu dang dpe yi me tog
79a1(mdo sde): ste| |rnal 'byor rnams kyi thub dge ba/ /stag po'i rgyan ni bshad par bya/ /de ni thub la rnal 'byor ston/ /stug po'i rgyan de sna tshogs te/ /stug na
79a2(mdo sde): spyod pa'i thub pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas kyi mchog/ thub pa kun gyi dam pa'o/ /sa steng thub pa'i dru ma la/ /rdo rje snying pos yang smras pa/ /rtag par dru mar khyod kyis kyang //
79a3(mdo sde): chos kyi dngos nyid shes par gyis/ /dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /dngos su stong dam rtag pa zhes/ /'di 'dra'i lta dang ldan pa yi/ /thub pa rnal 'byor mi 'khrul lo/ /chos pa
79a4(mdo sde): gcig bu rtogs pa yis/ /chos par mngon du shes pa ste/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin yang / /dngos po gcig gis shes par 'gyur/ /ji ltar ji bzhin bsrubs pa'i zho/ /sor
79a5(mdo sde): mo'i rtse mos mngon shes pa/ /de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin dngos pos shes par 'gyur/ /dngos po ji med stong pa nyid/ /dngos po dngos por yod pa'ang med//
79a6(mdo sde): 'di dag kun gzhi rnam pa ste/ /stong nyid kun gzhi rnam pa'o/ /rgyal sras dru ma 'jigs med pas/ /rdo rje'i snying po de la smras/ /lus can rnams kyi khams kyi mi/ /ji lta bu
79a7(mdo sde): na sems tsam 'gyur/ /'byung ba chen po rgyur byas shing / /'byung las 'byung ba'i ji lta bu/ /g.yo gsher tsha dang sra ba yi/ /khams rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
79b1(mdo sde): rgyal sras rdo rje snying po yis/ /dru ma'i bdag po'i tshig thos nas/ /mi 'am ci bdag khyod dge ste/ /khyod ni dge'o yang dge'o/ /rnal 'byor can gyi snying po'i mchog /yid 'ong byed pa
79b2(mdo sde): gang dris pa/ /sems kyi skye bu'i lus can/ /khams rnams skye 'gyur ji lta zhes/ /de phyir dbang sgyur rgyal sras la/ /de ni dge ba bshad par bya/ /de bas mi 'am ci yi bdag /pi
79b3(mdo sde): wang slob dpon bdag las nyon/ /ji ltar mi 'am ci yi bdag /khyod dang mi ci mang bcas pa/ /snyems bral mang po sna tshogs kyis/ /nam mkha' las ni rab 'dong zhing / /rgyal ba
79b4(mdo sde): nyan thos tshogs 'khor du/ /pi wang sgra dbyangs snyan blangs pas/ /thub pa dru ma ltos shig ces/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang gsung / /snyems bral mang po sna tshogs na//
79b5(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang 'grogs rtse zhing / /pi wang bai DUR+yas spra pa/ /len cing mkha' la 'gro ba'i ste/ /pi wang yid 'ong shin tu snyan/ /dbyangs kyis yongs su sbyang ba de/ /mi'ang ci yi
79b6(mdo sde): bdag po yis/ /rab tu blangs par byas pa'i tshe/ /nyan thos rnams kyang gar byed de/ /nyan thos de dag gyur ba de/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi mthong ba dang / /'od srung rnal 'byor bzang
79b7(mdo sde): can dang / /lha yi cod pan la smras pa/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi/ /pi wang sgra ni bsgrags pa yis/ /'dod chags bral ci phyir gar/ /'od srung khyod kyis ded la ston/ /
80a1(mdo sde): rgyal sras stobs chen dmu rlung bzhin/ /ri dwags rnams dang 'dra ba ni/ /nyan thos g.yo ba'i blo can rnams/ /bag chags 'dam gyi dri ma can/ /nyon
80a2(mdo sde): mongs rnam rtog byung bas mnar/ /yang dag sangs rgyas sku rnyed nas/ /bdag chags dri ma yongs bsal te/ /bdag med gnyis kyis yongs dag cing / /shes bya sgrib pa'i dri
80a3(mdo sde): med na/ /sems kyi khams las gzhan gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs par rab tu 'gyur/ /khyod ni dbang chen phra yul ldan/ /shes rgya che zhing gtsug lag mkhas/ /dbang
80a4(mdo sde): po 'jig rten phyol ba yi/ /gtsug lag mtshan la khyod gnas te/ /mi'am ci yi gtsug lag kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor dge/ sa yi mtshan nyid mkhas
80a5(mdo sde): bya la/ /bslab ste/ zla ba bzhin gnas pa/ /mi 'am ci yi dbang po khyod/ /sa dang zhing rnams bye bar mdzes/ /khyod ni de ltar rnam mdzes zhing / /thub can dbang sgyur tshogs
80a6(mdo sde): dbus su/ /khams kyi sems las skyes pa'i mi/ /kho bo la ni sras kyis dris/ /mnyam sems mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /thams cad lhan cig mnyan par gyis/ /
80a7(mdo sde): khams rnams gang du ci tshul gang / /sems su grags pa'i skyes bu la/ /rgyu rnams gang gis 'byung ba yi/ /de tshul bdag gis bstan par bya/ /chu ni rlan rnams skyed
80b1(mdo sde): par byed/ /drod ni me'o sra ba sa/ /gdeg la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams/ /rlung gi khams kyis kun nas rtsom/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i sa mtshams ni/ /nam mkha' kun nas rtsom
80b2(mdo sde): par byed/ /rnam shes sna tshogs yul can ni/ /bag chags rnams kyis rab tu bskyed/ /srid kyi mtshams dang mig dag gis/ /skye ba'i sgo rnams byed pa ni/ /gzugs la sogs
80b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs kun te/ /rgyal po mtshan ni rnam pa mang / /nor bu rin chen sna tshogs gnas/ /dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na/ /rnal 'byor ldan chen shugs 'dzin pa/ /rgyal sras
80b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis mdun bdar cing / /so so'i stan las kun langs te/ /yang dang yang zhing phyag 'tshal nas/ /rim gror rdo rje'i snying po la/ /mchod pa'i dam pas mchod pa byed/ /rin
80b5(mdo sde): chen dra bas steng bkab cing / /yang dang yang du gsol ba byed/ /dge'o dge'o yang dge ste/ /dge ba ldan pa rab gnas zhing / /chos kyi sprin gyi tshul rnyed nas/ /sangs rgyas
80b6(mdo sde): sa la rab bzhugs te/ /dbang sgyur rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas yul rnams rab tu bstan/ /rgyal po lha mo bcas pa yis/ /de nas yang du mchod byas te/ rnal
80b7(mdo sde): 'byor che can dge'o dge/ /rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med pa/ /lha rdzas de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /chos de bdag la bstan pas na/ /nor bu rin chen sna tshogs nas/ /
81a1(mdo sde): bkra shis gtsang bar rab tu byas/ /thub ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ /blo gros chen po byams pa dang / /blo gros mi zad mthu chen dang / /
81a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul ba dang / /lha yi cod pan rnal 'byor bdag/ shugs 'dzin dru ma blo gros dang / /gzugs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / /rin chen gtsug phud
81a3(mdo sde): 'phrul chen dang / /yang dag ji bzhin mthong ba dang / /mtshe ma'i rab dang 'gro 'dzin dang / /rnal 'byor slob dpon rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor can la sems ston pa/ /thub
81a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad don grub pa/ /thub sras 'jigs pa med pa'i rnams/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang po ste/ /rgyal ba'i sras po 'phrul chen rnams/ /so so'i stan las kun langs
81a5(mdo sde): nas/ /de dag gcig la gcig bltas te/ /rdo rje'i snying po de la smras/ /chos kyi tshul ni bstan par gyis/ /khyod ni rgyal dbang byin gyis brlabs/ /rgyal sras rnams
81a6(mdo sde): kyis rab tu mchod/ /sa yi mtshan la mkhas pa yang / /khyod la thams cad shin tu gnas/ /khyod la gsol ba 'debs pa ni/ /rgyal sras stobs chen thams cad dang / /rnal
81a7(mdo sde): 'byor can dang rnal 'byor bdag/ /sngags 'chang bud med thams cad do/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras dang / /'jig rten rnams kyi ngo mtshar gzhi/ /mdo sde kun gyis
81b1(mdo sde): dri med cing / /bstan dang bklag pa rnams spangs pa/ /stug po'i rgyan 'di bstan pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor bdag khyod spobs par gyis/ /sprul pas bshad pa spangs pa ste/ /de bzhin gtam
81b2(mdo sde): dang sprul pas kyang / /zag pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings/ /so so rang rig spyod pa'i yul/ /lha rdzas mthong ba'i chos la bde/ /'phags pa rnams la de ston cig/ phung po lhag ma ma lus
81b3(mdo sde): par/ /gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston cig/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi rnams/ /rnam par thar dang dbang rnams dang / /yid bzhin rnam pa bcu po yi/ /lus kyi tshogs kyang
81b4(mdo sde): bstan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsam yas dang / /mgon po rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan/ /rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal sras kyi/ /rdul phran bzhin gyi sku phra dang / /skra rtse brgya char phra ba
81b5(mdo sde): dag / rgyal sras khyod kyis bshad par gyis/ /bstan dang bklag dang rnam bral zhing / /brjod pas rnam par spangs pa yi/ /stug po zhing gi dam pa der/ /ci nas thub pa 'dong ba'i
81b6(mdo sde): phyir/ /rnal 'byor mkhas pas seng ge ltar/ /thub pas de dag kun bltas te/ 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad la/ /brtags par mi nus brtag bral ba'i/ /chos tshul
81b7(mdo sde): rab tu bstan par bya/ /blo yi mthu yang kun brtags na/ /rnal 'byor can dag chos kyi tshul/ /sngon gyi gzhung lugs nyan nus pas/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dang dbyangs su ste/ /ka la ping+ka'i
82a1(mdo sde): sgra skad du/ /rgya chen lce yis rab snyan par/ /rdo rje'i snying pos shin tu bshad/ /seng ge ro stod lus 'chang ba/ /mtshan rab sum chu rtsa gnyis dang / /
82a2(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/ /rdo rje'i snying p+sa shin tu bstan/ /ki ma ka'i sgra la mkhas pas na/ /sgra yi mtshan nyid grags pa yis/ /mdor na de yi nyis gyur tu/ /
82a3(mdo sde): rgyal sras de ni shin tu ston/ /sang sang dag pa dbyangs la sogs/ /mthong zhing ring pa'i sgra skad dang / /gan da ra dang ran ldan par/ /rgyal ba'i sras pos rab tu bstan/ /
82a4(mdo sde): r-i Sha b+ha dang d+he ba ta/ /ShaD+dza ke shi lnga po yi/ /sgra skad mtshan nyid ldan pa yin/ /dbyangs kyis thub pa rnam par gsungs/ /ring dang dal ba med pa'i tshig /zab cing snyan
82a5(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dbyangs te/ /mtshan nyid mkhas dang dri za la/ /de bzhin sim par byed pa yi/ /tshig gi yon tan ldan pa'i tshig/ rdo rje snying pos brjod pa ni/ /lhun gyis
82a6(mdo sde): grub par byas pa ste/ /sprul pa'i bzhin du 'byung ba yin/ /thub sras rdo rje'i snying po ni/ /ci yang brjod par mi byed par/ /thams cad yan lag mtshan gyi sgra/ /
82a7(mdo sde): yan lag rnams la mngon par 'gyur/ /smin ma dpral ba spyi bo dang / /phrag pa sna rtse phyin pa las/ /chos kyi tshul rnams rab ste na cing / /dge ba'i sgra rnams byung par
82b1(mdo sde): gyur/ /rdo rje snying po thub pa yi/ /smon lam legs las 'byung ba ste/ /bre mo'i ngang ba'i rgyal po bzhin/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun nas 'dus/ /dbang sgyur pho brang bzang po na/ /
82b2(mdo sde): thams cad gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin/ /dpa' chen rdo rje'i snying po de/ /rnam par mdzes la kun lta'o/ /skar ma'i dbang po skar ma de/ /gza' yi dbus na mdzes pa
82b3(mdo sde): bzhin/ /rdo rje'i snying po rnal 'byor can/ /dam pa'i stan la rnam par mdzes/ /ji ltar skar ma'i dbang po dang / /zla ba'i 'od du bye brag med/ /de bzhin rdo rje'i snying po dang / /
82b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba rnams su khyad par med/ /yang dag ji bzhin don mthong ba'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras po stobs po che/ /rnal 'byor can dang thub pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam
82b5(mdo sde): gnas pa/ /stan las legs par ldang byas shing / /rgyal sras rnams la mngon bltas nas/ /tshig dge rnam par smras pa ni/ /kye ma theg chen theg pa ni/ /sangs rgyas spyod
82b6(mdo sde): yul bsam mi khyab/ /de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang / /rgyal ba bsam gyis mi khyab ston/ /bye ba'i zhing bzhugs rgyal ba dang / /rgyal sras de dag thams cad kyang / /
82b7(mdo sde): dri med bsam gyis mi khyab chos/ /dgongs pas phyag bya 'os pa yin/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul dge ni/ /mchog tu phra zhing dkon pa ste/ /gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul gyi
83a1(mdo sde): mchog / rtog pa can gyi yul ma yin/ /rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi yul/ /rang bzhin rnams la khyad par byed/ /bdag med nyid ni lnga po yi/ /
83a2(mdo sde): de bzhin khyad par byed pas na/ /bag chags spros pas 'phangs pa de/ /yun ring gnas ngan len pa dang / /sems dang sems las byung ldan zhing / /rnam shes rnams
83a3(mdo sde): las rab tu byung / /lha rdzas tshul 'di mthong ba dang / /gser bzhin rnam par byang bar 'gyur/ /rnam dag rigs la gnas pa dag/ /sangs rgyas rigs su de dag
83a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas rigs/ /mur 'dug nyan thos rnams spangs pa/ /thob nas sangs rgyas zhing gi mchog/ stug por de bzhin 'dong bar
83a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin 'di yi yul ni gang / /ting 'dzin 'di yi ming yang ci/ /rdo rje'i snying pos gang thob phyir/ /tshul dge 'di ni ston par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i
83a6(mdo sde): rkang gnyis la/ /thub pa rnams kyis phyag byas nas/ /rdo rje'i snying po 'jigs med kyi/ /rdo rje'i blo la bshad par mdzod/ /ting 'dzin yul ni gang zhig yin/ /ting 'dzin 'di yi ming
83a7(mdo sde): yang ci/ /gang la gnas shing tshul 'di yang / /rgyal sras khyod ni bshad pa mdzad/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams nyan par 'dod/ /dbang sgyur bdag kyang de bzhin no/ /rdo rje'i snying
83b1(mdo sde): po 'jigs med kyis/ /'khor du 'dus pa thams cad dang / /tshul 'di bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /rgyal ba'i sras kyi mthu stobs dang / /blo la 'dzin pa'i mthu kun dang / /nus sam mi
83b2(mdo sde): nus zhes bltas nas/ /blo 'dzin mthu ldan mthong ba dang / /rgyal sras thams cad mthu ldan gyis/ /thams cad ma 'gyur mnyan par byos/ /gzhan du gyur pa'i tshul dge ba/ /
83b3(mdo sde): dbang sgyur lha yul gnas pa dang / /thub pa rnams la bshad par bya/ /theg pa chen po 'od can gyi/ /ting 'dzin yul ni 'di yin te/ /de la gnas shing rgyal sras rnams/ /
83b4(mdo sde): tshul dge rab tu ston par byed/ /byed ba'i zhing rnams rab tu mthong / /de dag mgon po de bzhin no/ /rdul gyi mtha' mar thug pa rnams/ /de dag rang gi zhal ston to/ /
83b5(mdo sde): dge'o dge zhes rab tu gsung / /'di la rnal 'byor bzang ldan lam/ /lam 'dis nged rnams thams cad kyang / /ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba/ /thob nas sangs rgyas
83b6(mdo sde): dri med gyur/ /gang yang sangs rgyas ting 'dzin skyes/ /theg pa chen po snang ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi phra sems pa/ /de la gnas shing rgyal sras dang / /rgyal ba bsam
83b7(mdo sde): yas spyod yul can/ /sprul pa bye ba mang po yis/ /so so rang rig spyod yul gyis/ /ting 'dzin sangs rgyas mthong ba ni/ /shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed do/ /so so rang gis
84a1(mdo sde): rig tshul ni/ /gang la sangs rgyas gnas pa yin/ /chos 'di mtshan ma med pa ste/ /sgra dang gzugs kyis rnam par spangs/ /ming ni mtshan mas
84a2(mdo sde): bskyed pa yin/ /mtshan ma rkyen las byung ba ste/ /rnam par rtog pa gnyis las skyes/ /chos rnams kyi ni de bzhin nyid/ /de ni yang dag sus mthong ba/ /de yi ye shes yang
84a3(mdo sde): dag mtshon/ /rang bzhin brtags pa ming yin te/ /mtshan ma gzhan gyi dbang las byung / /ming dang mtshan ma med pa na/ /rang bzhin don gyi dam pa ni/ /thams
84a4(mdo sde): cad lus la kun nas gnas/ /kun gzhi de phyir 'byung ba ste/ bag chags rnams kyi ri khrod gnas/ /yid kyi gnas ngan len gyis g.yogs/ /yid kyi rnam shes
84a5(mdo sde): spyod pa yis/ /yid ni phyin phyogs rgyas par byas/ /rnam shes lnga po yul can dag/ 'byung zhing phyir yang ldog pa yin/ /rnam shes lnga yi yul rnams ni/ /sems
84a6(mdo sde): can bzhin gnas lus can la/ /kun gzhir grags pa'i chu klung las/ /dpa' rlabs bzhin du rab tu 'gyur/ /rnam shes kun gzhi mtshor gnas pa/ /bag chags
84a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis brnyogs pa'i rnams/ /yul gyi rlung gis bskyod pa dag /rnam par rgyun chad med par rgyu/ /chos la bdag med mkhas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs
84b1(mdo sde): rgyas sras/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas 'thob ste/ /mngon sangs rgyas shing chos ston to/ /phung po gang zag bdag med par/ /rab tu rnam phye mthong gyur cing / /chos kyi dngos yod
84b2(mdo sde): ma bshig par/ /nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur/ /bdag med gnyis la mkhas pa nyid/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgom par byed/ /rnam par bsgoms shing spong pa ni/ /tshul
84b3(mdo sde): bzhin bzhin du yang dag mtha'/ /yang dag mtha' yi bde myong zhing / /snying rje med pa'i sras rnams ni/ /sems can dgongs pa'i rgyun bcad pas/ /de dag sangs rgyas mi
84b4(mdo sde): 'thob bo/ /bsam yas kye ma ye shes 'di/ /sems can rnams kyi bde ba skyed/ /mkhyen cing rgyal ba rgyal sras rnams/ /blo chung rnams la tshul ston to/ /ji ltar 'dam las 'byung
84b5(mdo sde): ba yi| |dge ba'i mtshan ldan pad+mo dag / thub pa rnams dang lha dag gi/ nye ba'i longs spyod rgyu yin no/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i 'dam mtsho las/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'byung
84b6(mdo sde): ba ni| |sangs rgyas dri med rab rnyed cing / /lha la yid du 'ong ba yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams dang / /lha yi khrod du khyad par du/ /rgyal po'i khyu mchog 'gyur ba ste/ /
84b7(mdo sde): 'khor lo can du khyad par du'o/ /lha yul gnas pa'i bdag po dang / /dri za rnams kyi de bzhin te/ theg chen yon tan ldan pa yi/ /lus can rnams kyis rtag tu 'thob/ /de
85a1(mdo sde): phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/ /theg pa che la brtson par gyis/ /mthar gyis bde gshegs gnas rab dang / /rgyal po dag tu'ang 'gyur bar
85a2(mdo sde): 'ong / /kun nas nyon mongs chos rnams dang / /rnam par byang ba'i yod pa kun/ /rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi/ /sa la kun gzhi 'byung ba yin/ /spyi dang rgyu rnams lhan
85a3(mdo sde): cig gam/ /'on tam spyi dang dbang pos kyang / /gtso bo rkyen dang rgyu rnams kyis/ /'jig rten rab tu bsgrub pa byas/ /khyad par can gyi rgyu brjod pa/ /ci nas 'byung bar
85a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ste/ /rgyu med rang yang med par 'gyur/ /bya med byed pa'ang med par 'gyur/ /rnam par byang dang tha mi dad/ /kun gzhi tha dad 'gyur ba min/ /de ste rnam
85a5(mdo sde): byang tha dad na/ /kun gzhi rtag pa ma yin 'gyur/ /sngon med 'jig med rtag pa ste/ /mtha' gzhi rnam par spangs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
85a6(mdo sde): dag / sprul pa ye shes sgrar yang grag /phan tshun snying po tha mi dad/ /de ni sor gdub bzhin du gnas/ /sa rnams sna tshogs kun gzhi ste/ /bde gshegs snying po
85a7(mdo sde): dge ba'ang de/ /snying po de la kun gzhi sgras/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad/ /snying po kun gzhir bsgrags par yang / /blo zhan rnams kyis mi shes so/ /
85b1(mdo sde): gser mgar mkhas pas rnam dag gi /gser las sor gdub byas pa ni/ /sor mo rnams la rnam par mdzes/ /phan tshun tha dad mtshan yin te/ /sor gdub ces kyang brjod
85b2(mdo sde): mod kyi / las kyi mkhan pos yongs bsgyur pas/ /gser ni gzugs bzhin rab tu gnas/ /chos mthong rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /sems dang rnam par shes pa'i yul/ /bdun
85b3(mdo sde): pa'i sa ni rnyed pa dang / /'byung ba las kyang rnam par ldog/ /'phags pa mthong ba'i chos ldan gyi/ /so so rang gis mthong ba dang / spyi dang bdag gi legs 'phags pa/ /thams
85b4(mdo sde): cad brjod par mi nus so/ /ji snyed yul yod ci yang rung / /sems dang rnam shes spyod yul du/ /sna tshogs snang ba de dag kyang / /rnam shes yin te yul med do/ /sems ni
85b5(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis dngos su/ /gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste/ /rdza phru snam bu sogs pa yi/ /yul ni gang yang yod pa min/ /ji ltar ri rab rten byas shing / /nyi zla gza' yi tshogs
85b6(mdo sde): kyi rnams/ /bral ba med par rtag tu 'khor/ /de bzhin rnam shes kun gzhi la/ /rnam dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul ni/ /rtag par gser bzhin rab tu 'bar/ /kun gzhi snying
85b7(mdo sde): por bsgrags pa ni/ /rtog pa'i sems kyi yul ma yin/ /rang bzhin rnam par brtags pa dag /rtog par nus pa ma yin dang / /yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin yang / /
86a1(mdo sde): rnal 'byor thub can rtag tu mthong / /yid kyi rnam shes yul can ni/ /bus pa rnams la 'ching ba'i dngos/ /smig rgyu skra tshogs byung ba ste/ /'phags
86a2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis dri med gzigs/ /stong phrag bcu gnyis pa'i rgyan stug po las/ ji snyed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mahA ka ru NA
86a3(mdo sde): puN+Da rI ka nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa snying rje chen po'i pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
86a4(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa shing sA la'i tshal
86a5(mdo sde): na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /de bzhin gshegs
86a6(mdo sde): pa do nub kyi nam gyi thun tha ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ khyod kyis shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal
86a7(mdo sde): ba'i gzims mal chos shig / kun dga' bo/ 'dus byas su brtags pa thams cad legs par bcom pa'i shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas nga yongs
86b1(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ ngas gnas med pa'i chos zhi ba/ rab tu zhi ba/ mchog gya nom pa zab pa/ mthong bar dka'
86b2(mdo sde): ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ rtag mi nus pa/ ma brtags pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa/ phul du phyin par 'phags pa'i
86b3(mdo sde): bdud rtsi ni bstan/ kun dga' bo/ ngas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am bdud dam lha'am tshangs pa'am/ gzhan gang gis kyang chos dang mthun
86b4(mdo sde): par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba ni bskor/ ngas chos kyi rnga bo che ni brdungs/ ngas chos kyi dung chen po ni bus/ ngas
86b5(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po ni bsgrengs/ ngas chos kyi mar me chen po ni bus/ ngas mun pa chen po ni bsal/ ngas stong gsum ni snang bar byas/ ngas gru chen po ni
86b6(mdo sde): bcas/ ngas stegs chen po ni btsugs/ ngas zam pa chen po ni btags/ ngas pha rol tu 'dong ba mang po ni bton/ ngas thar pa'i lam ni yang dag par bstan/
86b7(mdo sde): ngas chos kyi char chen po ni phab/ ngas lha dang mi rnams ni tshim par byas/ ngas gdul ba rnams ni btul/ ngas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni skrag par byas/
87a1(mdo sde): ngas mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad ni tshar bcad/ ngas bdud kyi stobs ni bcom/ ngas bdud kyi gnas ni g.yo bar byas/ ngas seng ge'i
87a2(mdo sde): sgra ni bsgrags/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ ngas skyes bu dam pa'i las ni mthar phyung / ngas sngon gyi yi dam ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ ngas chos kyi tshul ni byin
87a3(mdo sde): gyis brlabs/ ngas nyan thos chen po rnams las byed du ni btsud/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems
87a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams lung ni bstan zin te/ kun dga' bo/ mya ngan las 'da' ba ma gtogs par phyis bya ba nga la med do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom
87a5(mdo sde): l dan 'das kyi gsung rnam pa de lta bu de thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste mi dga' zhing mya ngan chen po'i zug rngus zug par gyur nas rab tu ngus te mchi ma zag bzhin
87a6(mdo sde): du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rab tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' zhing bde bar gshegs pa rab tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' ste/
87a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi mig rab tu myur bar mi snang bar 'gyur/ rab tu myur bar 'jig rten mgon ma mchis pa dang skyabs ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis par
87b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ chog gi/ mya ngan ma byed cig /smre sngags ma 'don cig /gang gnas pa
87b2(mdo sde): dang / byung ba dang / 'dus byas pa dang / bsags pa ni rab tu 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas mi 'jig par ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas thog ma
87b3(mdo sde): nyid du khyed la dga' ba dang / sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba rnams dang tha dad du 'gyur zhing 'gyes par 'gyur/ bral bar 'gyur/ bye bar 'gyur ro zhes ma bstan tam/ kun
87b4(mdo sde): dga' bo khyod kyis nga la byams pa'i lus kyi las phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gnyis su med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / mi mthun pa med pas bsnyen bkur byas so/ /kun dga'
87b5(mdo sde): po| gang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'khor du bcas pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa la bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par bsnyen bkur byas pa
87b6(mdo sde): pas gang de bzhin gshegs pa la yud tsam zhig bsnyen bkur byas pa de de bas 'bras bu shin tu che'i/ kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig /smre sngags ma 'don cig/
87b7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa ni don che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / rgya che ba dang / bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba dang /
88a1(mdo sde): bdud rtsi la 'bab pa dang / bdud rtsi'i mthar 'gyur ba nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mchi
88a2(mdo sde): ma phyis nas smre sngags 'don cing shing sA la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ba'i gzims mal bcas so/ /de nas bcom ldan
88a3(mdo sde): 'das shing sA la zung ga la ba der gshegs nas shing sA la zung gi bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal lo/ /gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shing sA la zung gi
88a4(mdo sde): bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang /
88a5(mdo sde): nags tshal tha na sor bzhi tsam po yan chad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad gang du de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba de logs su gzhol 'dud/ rab tu 'dud
88a6(mdo sde): cing mngon par 'dud par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na klung ngam/ 'bab chu'am/ chu mig gam/ mtsho'am/ lteng ka'am/ khron
88a7(mdo sde): pa'am/ rdzing ngam/ pad+ma dkar po 'bab pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pas mi 'bab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong
88b1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bya mang po dang / ri dwags mang po sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sgra mi 'byin par 'khod cing mi za mi rgyu
88b2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od dam/ skar ma'i gzugs sam/ nor bu'am me'am srin bu me khyer gyi 'od ji snyed
88b3(mdo sde): yod pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi mngon mi snang ste/ lham mer ma yin/ lhan mer ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
88b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i me ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhi bar gyur/ mi 'bar bar gyur/ mi tsha bar gyur/ mi tshig par
88b5(mdo sde): gyur| yongs su mi gdung bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang sems can dmyal ba chen po'i me de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi zhing
88b6(mdo sde): bsil bar gyur to/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig de dang yud tsam de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba thob par gyur to/ /dud
88b7(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ gcig la gcig gnod sems med/ rnam par 'tshe
89a1(mdo sde): ba med/ rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med cing gnod pa byed pa med par gyur to/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyang bkres
89a2(mdo sde): pa dang / skom pa med par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba dang / lus dang sems tshim pa dang / sdug
89a3(mdo sde): bsngal rgyun chad pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong
89a4(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / btang zung dang / btang zung chen po dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang /
89a5(mdo sde): gangs ri ji snyed yod pa dang / gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po khor yug gi 'obs kyi mthas gtugs
89a6(mdo sde): pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang de'i
89a7(mdo sde): tshe mi ldang bar gyur to/ de'i tshe skad cig de dang yud tsam de na sems can thams cad kyang las byed pa rnams btang bar gyur te gnyid med/ chod pa med/ sgrib
89b1(mdo sde): pa med/ tshom pa med cing mi 'dzer bar gyur te/ sgra chung / ca co chung zhing yid mi g.yeng bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong
89b2(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
89b3(mdo sde): dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur te 'od med gzi brjid med
89b4(mdo sde): par gyur par shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang
89b5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldang dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa
89b6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad rang rang gi stan dang skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor dang bcas
89b7(mdo sde): par skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po gang dag zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis
90a1(mdo sde): mi non pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba 'di snyam du sems shing bdag cag gis sems can 'di dag byas/ bdag cag gis sems
90a2(mdo sde): can 'di dag sprul/ bdag cag gis 'jig rten byas/ bdag cag gis 'jig rten sprul lo snyam du de ltar shes pa'i tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po stong gsum gyi
90a3(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa de dag kyang rang rang gi stan la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to/ /rang rang gi gnas thams cad dang ldan pa'ang sangs
90a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus mog mog por gyur pa shes so/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa gzhan thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur par
90a5(mdo sde): shes te/ rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to/ /'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas rnams
90a6(mdo sde): la mi dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de 'di snyam du gang gis bdag rang gi gnas la mi dga' bar gyur pa de su'i snga
90a7(mdo sde): ltas yin snyam du sems so/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan pa la bltas so//
90b1(mdo sde): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de la bltas nas 'di snyam du gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byed pa po dbang phyug bdag
90b2(mdo sde): po dbang sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de do mod mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ gang gis bdag rang gi stan la 'dug
90b3(mdo sde): par mi dga' ba dang / gang gis cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag snang bar gyur pa 'di ni de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i snga ltas yin/ 'di
90b4(mdo sde): ni de'i mthu yin no snyam du sems te/ de mi dga' zhing yid dung zhes byed de/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas tshangs pa'i 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar
90b5(mdo sde): te myur ba myur bar rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po na tshangs pa lhag ma lus par gyur pa dang / ma 'dus pa dang /
90b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa de las gzhan pa ji snyed yod pa de dag 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par dul bar gyur/ 'phags pa'i chos la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong
90b7(mdo sde): chen po'i tshangs pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
91a1(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa
91a2(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa khyod nga ni tshangs pa tshangs pa chen po zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi non
91a3(mdo sde): pa kun shes pa dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba yin te/ bdag gis sems can rnams byas/ bdag gis sems can rnams sprul/ bdag gis 'jig rten
91a4(mdo sde): byas/ bdag gis 'jig rten sprul to zhes de snyam du sems shing de skad zer zhen/ bden nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mad do/ /bde bar gshegs pa/
91a5(mdo sde): mad do/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa khyod sus byas/ /sus sprul/ de nas tshangs pa chen po cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /tshangs pa chen po de cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang bcom
91a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa/ gang gi tshe bskal pas bsregs pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
91a7(mdo sde): 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ba'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de tshangs pa khyod nyid kyis
91b1(mdo sde): byas sam/ khyod kyis sprul tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang sa chen po 'di ni chu'i phung po la brten/ chu'ang rlung la brten/
91b2(mdo sde): rlung yang nam mkha' la brten te 'phang du dpag tshad drug khri brgyad stong yod cing mi 'jig pa de la ji snyam du sems/ 'di khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul tam/ gsol
91b3(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang na lha'i bu dag lam
91b4(mdo sde): me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin zhing gzhal med khang rnams stong par 'khod pa'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing
91b5(mdo sde): khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gang sos ka dang / dbyar dang / ston
91b6(mdo sde): dang / dgun dang / dgun smad dang / dpyid kyi dus tshigs de dag la khyod ji snyam du sems/ de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis
91b7(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang chu'am/ me long gi dkyil 'khor ram/ 'bru mar dang /
92a1(mdo sde): mar gyi snod dam/ nor bu dang / shel rnams kyi nang ngam/ de las gzhan pa'i snod dag pa rnams la gzugs brnyan rnams pa sna tshogs snang ba
92a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste shing ljon pa dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang snang ba'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong brdal snang
92a3(mdo sde): ba'am/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / lug dang / ri dwags dang / bya rnams snang ba'am/ zla ba dang nyi ma dang skar ma'i tshogs rnams
92a4(mdo sde): snang ba'am/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku snang ba'am/ sa dang ri dang klung snang ba'am/ brgya byin dang
92a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de las gzhan pa'i sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa snang ba de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod
92a6(mdo sde): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ g.yang sa dang / ri dang / ri'i 'bab chu dang / rdzing
92a7(mdo sde): rnams na dung dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / glu gar dang / ri dwags dang / bya dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra'i brag ca dang / gang de dang mthun pa'i sgra brnyan
92b1(mdo sde): 'byung ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal
92b2(mdo sde): pa/ tshangs pa/ gang sems can rnams kyi rmi lam na gzugs sna tshogs mthong ba dang / sgra sna tshogs thos pa dang / dri sna tshogs snom pa dang / ro sna tshogs myong ba dang / reg
92b3(mdo sde): bya sna tshogs reg pa dang / chos sna tshogs shes pa dang / dga' ba dang rtse ba sna tshogs myong ba dang / mchi ma byung ba dang / ngu ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / sdug
92b4(mdo sde): bsngal ba mthong ba'am/ myong ba'am shes pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
92b5(mdo sde): 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang sems can rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang mi dga' ba dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / grang ba dang tsha ba
92b6(mdo sde): dang / bkres pa dang skom pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma
92b7(mdo sde): lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi mdzes pa'am mi sdug pa'am/ longs spyod che ba'am longs spyod chung ba'am/ dbul ba'am bsod
93a1(mdo sde): nams che ba'am/ tshul khrims bzang ba'am tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/ shes rab bzang ba'am shes rab 'chal ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis
93a2(mdo sde): byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang sems can rnams kyis
93a3(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'am/ skrag pa'am/ gnod pa'am/ rnam par 'tshe ba'am/ rnam par mtho 'tshams pa 'di ste/ mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung dmar dang / dug dang /
93a4(mdo sde): gcan gzan khro bo dang / dgra dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ gzhan gnod pa byed pa'i 'jigs pa sna tshogs de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing
93a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ sems can rnams kyi
93a6(mdo sde): nad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / dus dang / khams mi mthun pa las gyur pa'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas
93a7(mdo sde): pa dang / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa las gyur pa 'di lta ste/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus na ba dang / sems can rnams kyi yid la gdung ba'i sdug bsngal
93b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs
93b2(mdo sde): pa/ gang mu ge dang / chu dang / 'brog dang / sprul dang / chom rkun dang / dgon pa dang / mtshon cha dang / nad dang / bar gyi bskal pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod
93b3(mdo sde): kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang sems can rnams kyi 'bral
93b4(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / grogs dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / bu pho dang / chung ma dang / bu mo dag dang bral
93b5(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal
93b6(mdo sde): pa| gang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs yang ba'i las la sbyor ba/ skra dang / phabs dang / rgya skyegs dang / 'khor lo 'tshong ba'am/ rgya mtsho chen por 'gro
93b7(mdo sde): ba dang / 'brog dgon par 'jug pa'am/ phyogs sna tshogs su skyes 'degs pa'am/ zhing gi las rgya cher byed pa'am/ de las gzhan pa'i bya ba sna tshogs de dag
94a1(mdo sde): kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags
94a2(mdo sde): so| |bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par len pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
94a3(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang mi'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / gang sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad
94a4(mdo sde): pa dang / legs par spyad pa rnams sam/ gang 'jig rten na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sems can rnams la mi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / gnod pa
94a5(mdo sde): dang / ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra
94a6(mdo sde): ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba de rnams kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod
94a7(mdo sde): kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang sems can rnams
94b1(mdo sde): kyi gnod byed kyi sdug bsngal 'di lta ste/ mgo bcad pa dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna bcad pa'am/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad bcad pa'am/ /mer
94b2(mdo sde): bsregs pa dang / 'bru mar gyis gtor ba dang / srog dang dbral ba dang / ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pas gdab pa dang / bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang /
94b3(mdo sde): go ra ra gzhug pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/
94b4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis ma la log par spyod pa dang / sring
94b5(mdo sde): mo la log par spyod pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la log par spyod pa dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad la lhag par spyod pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing
94b6(mdo sde): khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang sems can rnams
94b7(mdo sde): kyi gnod par byed pa sna tshogs byad dang / ro langs dang / rig sngags dang / sngags dang / sman dang / 'byung po dang / gnon 'bebs pa dang / gang de las gzhan pa dug
95a1(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / gang sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba dang / srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / srog 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag kyang
95a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gang
95a3(mdo sde): rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spang du mi rung ba'i 'jig rten gyi chos 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang /
95a4(mdo sde): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / mi rtag pa'i chos nyid dang / zad pa'i chos nyid dang / 'gyur ba'i chos nyid
95a5(mdo sde): dang / mdza' ba dang dga' ba thams cad dang tha dad du 'gyur ba dang / med par 'gyur ba dang / bral bar 'gyur ba dang / bye bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod
95a6(mdo sde): kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/
95a7(mdo sde): gang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / bag la nyal dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / kun tu sbyor
95b1(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / de las gzhan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'jug pa gang gis sems can rnams chags par 'gyur ba dang / sdang bar 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par
95b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / las mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis
95b3(mdo sde): brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa/ gang 'di sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
95b4(mdo sde): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum po gang na sems can rnams gnod byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang
95b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs
95b6(mdo sde): pa/ gang 'di 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sa bon gyi tshogs dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal chu na gnas pa dang / thang la gnas pa'am/ me tog
95b7(mdo sde): gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos shing rnam pa sna tshogs sam/ mngar ba dang / kha ba dang / lan tshwa dang / skyur ba dang / tshwa ba dang / bska ba'i ro'i khyad par rnam pa
96a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i mngon par grub pa gang sems can rnams la phan pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba de la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa/
96a2(mdo sde): de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ tshangs
96a3(mdo sde): pa| gang 'gro ba lnga po dag na yongs su 'khor ba skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'thon pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa 'di dag dang / /tshangs pa/ gang sems can ma rig
96a4(mdo sde): pa'i sgrib pa dang / /sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba de dag gi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa dang / tshangs pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor ba'i lam rgyun
96a5(mdo sde): ma chad pa gang na lha dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thags 'khrugs pa lta bu/ dru gu 'dzings
96a6(mdo sde): pa lta bu 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar gyur pa 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang / 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'khor ba las
96a7(mdo sde): 'byung ba mi shes pa de dag la ji snyam du sems/ /tshangs pa/ de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / /khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/
96b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ /ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'o na tshangs pa khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar ngas sems can 'di dag byas/ ngas sprul/
96b2(mdo sde): ngas byin gyis brlabs/ ngas 'jig rten byas/ /ngas sprul/ ngas byin gyis brlabs snyam du sems/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni ma 'tshal ba/ rtag tu lta bar
96b3(mdo sde): gyur pa ma spangs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rtag tu ma thos pas sems can
96b4(mdo sde): rnams bdag gis bgyis/ bdag gis sprul/ 'jig rten bdag gis bgyis/ 'jig rten bdag gis sprul zhes bgyi ba sdig pa can gyi lta bar gyur pa 'di lta bur gyur
96b5(mdo sde): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid bdag zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten 'di sus bgyis/ 'jig rten 'di sus sprul/ sems can
96b6(mdo sde): rnams sus bgyis/ /sus sprul/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di su'i mthu lags/ sus byin gyi brlabs/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa de
96b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa/ 'jig rten ni las kyis byas/ las kyis sprul lo/ /sems can rnams ni las kyis byas/ las kyi rgyu las byung / las kyis rab
97a1(mdo sde): tu phye ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis
97a2(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen
97a3(mdo sde): gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
97a4(mdo sde): dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / tshangs pa/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag
97a5(mdo sde): pa nas sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'gag pa'i bar du 'gyur te/ tshangs pa/ las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams yod na sems can rnams 'byung bar snang
97a6(mdo sde): ba dang / las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor ba dang bral bas 'byung ba med par snang ba ma gtogs par 'di la byed pa po'am/ byed du 'jug pa'am/ nye bar 'jog pa po gang
97a7(mdo sde): yang med do/ /tshangs pa/ de ltar 'jig rten 'di las zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa dang / sdug bsngal zad pa dang / sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang / nges
97b1(mdo sde): par byung ba dang / rnam par zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /tshangs pa/ de la las gang yin pa de zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dang bral ba dang /
97b2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gang yin pa de rnam par zhi ba dang / nub pa ma gtogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ci zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas
97b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos nyid de lta bu dag 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med na chos de lta bu rab tu ston pa
97b4(mdo sde): mi 'byung gi/ tshangs pa/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe zhi bar bya ba'i phyir khong du chud par dka' ba/ zab pa zab par snang
97b5(mdo sde): ba| chos rnam pa de lta bu dag yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ de thos pas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni skye ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sems can
