195b6(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la khyim bdag des bshos gsol na'ang bsod nams mang du skyed de/ dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis na de
195b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs de snyed cig bskal ba de snyed du bzhugs pa la bsti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid/ mchod par bgyid pa dang / yongs su
196a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi mchod rten la de lta bu'i bsti stang bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
196a2(mdo sde): tshogs de lta bu la de lta bu'i bsti stang bgyis pa khyim bdag de bzhi de las bsod nams 'di snyed cig bskyed do zhes bsod nams kyi phung po de dpe bstan du mi nus so/ /
196a3(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod la bsgo'o/ /kun dga' bo khyod
196a4(mdo sde): kyi khong du chud par bya'o/ /khyim bdag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed cig bskal pa de snyed du bzhugs pa la bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas/
196a5(mdo sde): mchod par byas pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi mchod rten la de lta bu'i bsti stang byas pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa bas/ kun dga' bo/ rigs kyi
196a6(mdo sde): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rab tu mang ba/ lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub la mi rtog par mngon par dad cing yid
196a7(mdo sde): chos la/ mos pa gang gis chos thams cad mi rtag pa'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ stong pa'am/ bdag med pa'o zhes legs par gsungs pa'i chos la yang dag
196b1(mdo sde): par zhugs shing tshig tu smra na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do/ /kun dga' bo/ gang bla na med pa'i chos dkon mchog 'di lta bu bsti stang
196b2(mdo sde): du bya te gzhan la 'chad dam/ rab tu ston na bsod nams ji tsam du rgya cher skyed pa dang / ji tsam du tshad med pa dang / ji tsam du grangs med pa dang / ji tsam du bsam gyis
196b3(mdo sde): mi khyab pa dang / ji tsam du mtshungs pa med pa dang / ji tsam du dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ /'di ltar de las gzhan
196b4(mdo sde): pa'i sbyin pa rnams ni zag pa dang bcas shing nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'khor bar rgyu ba yin la/ kun dga' bo/ bskal pa grangs med pa bye bar bsgrubs pa'i chos
196b5(mdo sde): dkon mchog gi mdzod zang zing med pa bla na med pa 'di ni 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo/ chos dkon mchog bla na med pa 'di thos na
196b6(mdo sde): sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ sems can na ba'i chos can dang / 'chi ba'i chos can dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa
196b7(mdo sde): dang | sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams 'khrug pa'i bar las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ /don gyi gzhi 'di mthong
197a1(mdo sde): nas gang chos gus par 'chad pa dang / gang chos gus par nyan pa gnyis ni bsod nams mang du bskyed do zhes nga smra'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal
197a2(mdo sde): nas| bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs shing yang dag par bsgrub par
197a3(mdo sde): 'dod pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mi rtog par mngon par dad cing mos nas chos legs par gsungs pa yin pa dang / dge 'dun legs par
197a4(mdo sde): zhugs pa yin pa dang / 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ zhi ba'am/ stong pa'am/ bdag med pa yin par yid par yid ches na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di
197a5(mdo sde): ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ tshig tsam ma yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ gang la la zhig gis ru shing bzhin du byas/ yid la byas/ sems thams cad
197a6(mdo sde): kyis bsams nas rna blags te chos nyan pa dang / mnyan nas kyang tha nas se gol gtogs pa tsam yang mi rtag pa'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ stong pa'am/ bdag med
197a7(mdo sde): par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/ kun dga' bo/ de 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag nas sems can gyi khams yod pa'i sems can ji
197b1(mdo sde): snyed pa thams cad ni ches mang gi/ sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams ma yin/ me'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams ma yin no zhes de skad bya ba de dag thams cad yongs su
197b2(mdo sde): brtag pa gzung ste/ skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam cig la snga phyi med par mir gyur la/ skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam cig la bla na med pa yang dag par
197b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ khyim bdag gcig cig kyang byung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji tsam du 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi
197b4(mdo sde): mngon pa de srid du yun ring du bzhugs te/ khyim bdag de'ang bskal pa de srid du gnas bar gyur la/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de snyed la na bza' dang / bshos dang /
197b5(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed pa dang / yongs su mya
197b6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
197b7(mdo sde): byug pa thams cad dang / bdog pa thams cad kyis bsti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed na/ kun dga' bo/ de ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag
198a1(mdo sde): de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ khyim bdag des de bzhin gshegs pa gcig mnyes par bgyis/
198a2(mdo sde): bsti stang bgyis/ bla mar bgyis/ rim gror bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na'ang gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed de/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/
198a3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa bskyed par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs de lta bu la bskal pa de snyed du bsti stang
198a4(mdo sde): bgyis/ bla mar bgyis/ rim gror bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
198a5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin te/ de bsod nams tshad med pa skyed do/ /kun dga' bo/ de bas na khyod la
198a6(mdo sde): bsgo'o/ /khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/ /gang khyim bdag des de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed cig la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bskal pa de snyed du bsti stang
198a7(mdo sde): byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas bas bsod nams bskyed pa bas/ gang gis ru shing bzhin du byas/ yid la byas/ sems thams cad kyis bsams te rna blags/
198b1(mdo sde): sems rtse gcig tu byas nas chos nyan cing se gol gtogs pa tsam yang 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ zhi ba'am/ stong pa'am/ bdag med pa'o
198b2(mdo sde): zhes yid la byed na 'di de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ kun dga' bo/ gang chos gus par 'chad pa dang / gang chos gus par nyan pa ni bsod nams ches mang
198b3(mdo sde): du skyed do/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas 'di la dgongs nas 'di skad du/ rnam pa gnyis kyi don gyi phyir/ /sangs rgyas bshad pa mnyan par bya/ /zag pa rnams kyang zad par 'gyur//
198b4(mdo sde): byang chub nye bar gyur par 'dod/ gang zhig chos rnams 'chad pa dang / /drang srong rgyal mtshan gang 'dzin pa/ /gnyis ka bsod nams ldan par 'gyur/ /chos ni drang srong
198b5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan yin/ /zhes bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ gang chos gus par 'chad pa
198b6(mdo sde): dang / gang chos gus par nyan pa 'di gnyis ni bdud dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'dre ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyid dang /
198b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i grogs su gyur pa nyid dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan pa 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs bar byed pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/
199a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba nas sems can 'khrug pa'i
199a2(mdo sde): chos can rnams 'khrug pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ ngas nyan thos rnams la yang dag pa'i lta ba 'byung ba'i rgyu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis ni/
199a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o zhes gsungs pa'ang de yin te/ kun dga' bo/ de dag las gzhan gyi sgra ni sangs rgyas bcom
199a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams las byung bar rig par bya'o/ /gang so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid las byung bar rig par bya'o/ /
199a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas
199a6(mdo sde): rnams ma byung na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci zhig yid la bya ba mi shes kyi/ chos 'di dag yid la bya'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /kun
199a7(mdo sde): dga' bo/ ngas don gyi gzhi 'di mthong nas so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de'ang sangs rgyas bcon ldan 'das rnams las byung bar rig par bya'o zhes de
199b1(mdo sde): skad bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams ni mthong na legs/ /the tshom rnams ni gcod cing sel
199b2(mdo sde): bar byed/ /byis pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhas par byed/ /de bas mkhas pa rnams ni mthong na legs/ /'phags pa rnams ni mthong na bde/ /dam pa rnams dang 'grogs pa'ang
199b3(mdo sde): bde/ byis pa rnams ni ma mthong na/ /dam pa rnams la rtag tu bde/ kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs su gyur pa dang / dge ba'i
199b4(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gya gyu med pa nyid ni tshangs par spyod pa 'di rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'ang ngas 'di la dgongs te tshig de skad smras so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo
199b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas sems dge bar 'gyur ro/ /sems dge bas bsam pa dge bar 'gyur/ sbyor ba dge bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos la sems dang bar
199b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos la nye bar gnas par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shes nas dad bar 'gyur/ chos la shes nas dad par 'gyur/ dge 'dun la
199b7(mdo sde): shes nas dad par 'gyur/ 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims rang dbang can mkhas pas bsngags pa/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /
200a1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ char rab tu bab na shang shong rnams yongs su gang bar byed do/ /shang shong rnams yongs su gang nas chu dran rnams
200a2(mdo sde): brug par byed do/ /chu bran rnams brug nas klung chen po rnams brug par byed do/ /klung chen po brug pa rnams kyis mtsho chen po rgya mtsho yongs su gang bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga'
200a3(mdo sde): bo/ de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i grogs su gyur ba dang / dge ba dang rab tu ldan pa dang / dge ba gtso bor gyur pa dang / dge ba'i sems nyid la
200a4(mdo sde): brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa thob pa rnams ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bar du bsgrubs pas rab tu mthar thug pa dang / rab tu dri ma med pa dang / rab
200a5(mdo sde): tu tshangs par spyod pa dang / rab tu mthar phyin par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ phyi rol gyi dngos por gyur pa 'di dag kyang dus la bab na skye bar 'gyur ba dang / me tog
200a6(mdo sde): dang / yal ga dang / 'bras bu 'byin pa la ltos/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po 'di dag kyang slu bar mi byed na khyed kyi legs par spyad pa mi slu ba lta ci
200a7(mdo sde): smos te/ de ni gnas med do/ /kun dga' bo/ legs par spyad pa ni su la'ang mi slu'o/ /legs par spyad pa spyod cig /kun dga' bo/ nga'ang legs par spyad bas
200b1(mdo sde): ma bslus so/ /kun dga' bo/ nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ legs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag spyod de/ legs par spyad pa des nga ma bslus sa/ kun
200b2(mdo sde): dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa lam gang nas gshegs pa de na gangs mthon dman dang / ngam grog dang / g.yang sa dang / stor khung dang / shod khud dang / sdong
200b3(mdo sde): du ma dang / tsher ma stug po de dag thams cad 'dud cing med par 'gyur pa dang / sa dma' ba mthong por 'gyur ba dang / mthon po dma' bar 'gyur pa dang / shing rnams
200b4(mdo sde): rab tu 'dud pa dang / shing gi lha rnams phyag 'tshal ba dang / tshong dus dang / srang dag na skye bo gang dag 'khod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa'i rjes su 'brang
200b5(mdo sde): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas de dag slar rang gi gnas na 'khod pa la ltos/ kun dga' bo/ sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs
200b6(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba rnams dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze rgan pa
200b7(mdo sde): rnams la rtag tu gus pa dang / 'dud pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i legs par spyad ba'i rgyu mthun pa la ltos/ kun dga' bo/ phyi rol gyi dngos po sems med pa'ang de
201a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / mtho bar 'gyur ba dang / dngos po gang dag dma' bar 'os pa'am/ mtho bar 'os pa
201a2(mdo sde): de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thag tu dma' ba dang mtho bar 'gyur ba legs par spyad pa'i khyad par la ltos/ 'di la mi blun po kha cig ni nga rgyal gyi zil
201a3(mdo sde): gyis non/ /nga rgyal gyis bslad/ nga rgyal gyis sems yongs su gdungs nas su la'ang mi 'dud do/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dra bar 'brel ba
201a4(mdo sde): dang / zhabs dra bar 'brel ba de dag thams cad kyang legs par spyad pa las gyur pa la ltos/ kun dga' bo/ gang ngas sngon sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don
201a5(mdo sde): spyad pa dang / don mthun pas sems can rnams bsdus pa sngon gyi legs par spyad pa de dag la ltos/ kun dga' bo/ nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
201a6(mdo sde): 'di ni nga'i ma yin/ 'di ni nga'i pha yin/ 'di ni phu nu bo/ 'di ni sring mo/ 'di ni nye du/ 'di ni mdza' bo/ 'di ni mi mdza' ba yin no snyam pa de lta bur ma gyur gyi/
201a7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ nga ni sems can thams cad la sems ro gcig pa dang / sems mnyam zhing sems mi mnyam pa med pa dang / bdag gi sems su gyur to/ /kun
201b1(mdo sde): dga' bo/ yun ring po 'di na gang ngas sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pas ma bzung ba'i sems can de ni rnyed par sla ba ma yin na byis pa so so'i skye bo
201b2(mdo sde): rnams ni de ltar bzung bar mi shes so/ /ji ltar 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis bde ba myong ste/ kun dga' bo/ byis pa so so'i
201b3(mdo sde): s kye bo thams cad kyis rang gis bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pas bde ba myong bar gyur pa de bas ni gang ngas sems can gcig la bde bar sbyar zhing bsgrubs pa 'di
201b4(mdo sde): ches mang ste/ ngas sems can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba bsgrubs pa tsam ni sems can de dag gis rang gis bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pas bde ba ma myong ngo / /
201b5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ /'on kyang bde bar sbyor ba de dag thams cad ni mi rtag ba ste/ 'gyur ba'i chos can no/ /gang nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na byis pa so so'i skye
201b6(mdo sde): bo rnams la bde bar sbyor ba thams cad nye bar sbyar ba de dag thams cad ni lam 'di la dgod pa'i phyir yongs su smin par 'gyur ba sha stag go/ /de ltar bde ba gang gis
201b7(mdo sde): ngas khyed bde bar byas pa 'dus ma byas pa'i bde ba/ 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i bde ba/ de dag ni nam yang phyis yongs su mi 'gyur zhing chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
202a1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo/ de bas na 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis bya ba byos shig /kun dga' bo/ ye shes kyi bya bas bya ba byos shig /ngas ni byas zin
202a2(mdo sde): to| |kun dga' bo/ spyod pa gzhan yang tha na sems dad pa gcig bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa ngas bshad zin to/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can dge
202a3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon bskyed pa dag kyang yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs
202a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rjes su dran nas nga 'di lta bur zad cing yongs su nyams pa thos na dga' ba tsam mam dad pa tsam gyis mchi ma 'byung ba dag kyang yod do/ /kun dga'
202a5(mdo sde): bo| de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran nas shugs ring po 'byin pa'i sems can dag kyang yod/ spu zing zhes byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sems can de dag ni sems
202a6(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi 'gro zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol ba dag go/ kun
202a7(mdo sde): dga' bo/ de bzhin du gang la la nga rjes su dran nas chos kyi shugs kyis mchi ma 'byung ba'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa'am/ shugs ring du 'byin par 'gyur ba'i sems
202b1(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad ni/ kun dga' bo/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi 'gro'o/ /log par ltung ba thams cad du mi 'gro'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de bas
202b2(mdo sde): na bag yod pa la brtson par gyis shig / kun dga' bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni bag yod pas thob cing de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi
202b3(mdo sde): phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang bag yod pas thob bo/ /kun dga' bo/ gang 'doms pa pos bya ba dang / gang don 'dod pa dang / phan pa dang bde ba 'dod pa dang / phan par dga'
202b4(mdo sde): ba dang / snying rje can dang / snying brtse ba can gyis snying brtse ba'i phyir bya ba de dag ngas byas kyi/ da ni khyed kyis ci nas kyang dge ba'i lam rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ba dang / dam
202b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi tshul nub par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig / kun dga' bo/ ci nas kyang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /lha dang mi rnams la yangs
202b6(mdo sde): shing rgya cher 'gyur bar gyis shig / kun dga' bo/ chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'di ci nas kyang rab tu mi 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la gtad do/ /'di ni ngas
202b7(mdo sde): rjes su bstan pa'o/ /'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su gtad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis rdzogs so// //de nas bcom
203a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/
203a2(mdo sde): bdag gis ji ltar bsgrubs na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas pa dang / lha dang mi rnams la yangs shing rgya che bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi tshul
203a3(mdo sde): 'di bdag gis ji ltar yang dag par bsdu bar bgyi/ ji ltar rab tu bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
203a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong gnas brtan dag 'dus nas chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par sdud par byed de/
203a5(mdo sde): de la/ kun dga' bo/ gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dge slong gnas brtan dag khyod la 'di skad 'dri'o/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan
203a6(mdo sde): pa chen po dag gang du gsungs/ gling gzhi chen po'i rnam grangs dag gang du/ mnyam par bzhag pa chen po gang du/ lnga pa dang gsum pa gang du/ lhas zhus pa dag
203a7(mdo sde): gang du/ brgya byin gyis zhus pa dag gang du/ lha yul nas babs pa gang du/ tshangs pa'i dri ba gang du gsungs zhes/ kun dga' bo/ dge slong de dag rnam grangs de dag
203b1(mdo sde): gis khyod la de skad 'dri bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pas mdo'i sde dag gang du gsungs/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang /
203b2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas

203b4(mdo sde): du gsungs/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sde snod gang du gsungs/ theg pa chen po byang chub sems pa'i sde snod gang du gsungs zhes/ kun dga' bo/ de na dge slong de dag gis khyod
203b5(mdo sde): la de skad dris pa dang 'di skad lung ston cig / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yul ma ga
203b6(mdo sde): d+ha na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri ga yA la bzhugs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/

204a1(mdo sde): lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags na bzhugs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri dang

204b1(mdo sde): bcom brlag na bya gag gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyad rnams nye bar gnas pa shing

209b7(mdo sde): //rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kA ru NA pu N+Da rI ka nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa snying rje pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs

210a6(mdo sde): dang / bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa ya phrag brgyad dang yang thabs
210a7(mdo sde): gcig go/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dang yang thabs gcig go/ /lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dang / gzhan 'phrul gyi lha'i
210b1(mdo sde): bu sa ya phrag brgyad dang yang thabs gcig go/ /lha'i bu 'phrul dga' dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu sa ya phrag bdun dang yang thabs gcig go/ /lha'i bu yongs
210b2(mdo sde): su dga' ldan dang / yongs su dga' ldan gyi lha'i bus ya phrag drug dang yang thabs gcig go/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / rab 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu sa ya phrag bdun dang / nyis 'bum dang yang thabs gcig
210b3(mdo sde): go| lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu sa ya phrag brgyad dang yang thabs gcig go/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin 'bum gyis yongs su bskor ba
210b4(mdo sde): dang yang thabs gcig go/ mig mi bzang klu 'bum gyis yongs su bskor ba dang yang thabs gcig go/ 'phags skyes po grul bum 'bum gyis yongs su bskor ba dang yang thabs
210b5(mdo sde): gcig go / yul 'khor srung dri za 'bum gyis yongs su bskor ba dang yang thabs gcig go/ /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo klu'i rgyal po stong gis yongs su bskor ba dang / de dag la
210b6(mdo sde): sogs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/ phyin ci log bzhi'i chos snang zhing gsal bar rtogs par khong du chud pa gang gis byang chub sems
210b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /
211a1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rab tu rtogs
211a2(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir chos ston pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub
211a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' mthong ba don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng+ga'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed blo gros dang / de dag
211a4(mdo sde): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar
211a5(mdo sde): ba btud nas shar lho'i phyogs logs su mngon par phyogs te/ rab tu dga' zhing rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bltas nas tshig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
211a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par cho 'phrul chen po dag bstan nas/ sems can rnams las srog chags bye ba
211a7(mdo sde): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par mdzad cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod pa ni/ ngo mtshar te/
211b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes kyang smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo
211b2(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi slad
211b3(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu lha dang /
211b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed blo gros dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems
211b5(mdo sde): d pa' khris bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa bcad nas lhan cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
211b6(mdo sde): te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas shar lho'i phyogs logs su mngon par phyogs te/ rab tu dga' zhing rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis bltas nas tshig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa
211b7(mdo sde): d gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par cho 'phrul chen po dag bstan nas srog chags bye ba
212a1(mdo sde): khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes mchi/ bcom ldan 'das/
212a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa shul ni ji srid cig na bzhugs/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
212a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ni yun ji srid cig lags/ gang na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pa zhes bgyi ba bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'jig
212a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de'i bkod pa ni ji lta bu zhig gis brgyan pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pas cho 'phrul
212a5(mdo sde): chen po rnam pa de lta bu dag bstan pa mdzad/ rkyen gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa
212a6(mdo sde): gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cho 'phrul gang dag rnam par bstan pa de dag kyang mthong
212a7(mdo sde): la bdag cag gis mi mthong bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed la 'di skad ces bka'
212b1(mdo sde): stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang bo rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du de bzhin
212b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa pad+ma dam pas byang chub thob pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par bstan par bye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dri ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu
212b3(mdo sde): yongs su zhu bar sems dpa' ni khyod kyi spobs pa dge ba yin te/ khyod kyis yongs su zhus pa legs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang
212b4(mdo sde): bshad par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
212b5(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig
212b6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan ba/ me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/
212b7(mdo sde): spos sna tshogs kyis khyab pa/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa dag gis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma dag gis kun tu gang ba zhig yod de/ de na sa gzhi ni sngon po las grub cing / byang chub
213a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' dag gis kun tu gang la chos kyi sgras khyab pa yin no/ /bai DUr+ya las grub pa'i sa gzhi de'ang ka tsa lin+di ka ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam la/ rkang pa
213a2(mdo sde): bzhag na ni sor bzhi tsam nems zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni sor bzhi tsam par ces byed cing / pad+ma sna tshogs dag gis kun tu gang ba yin no/ /de na rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa
213a3(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad bdun gyi srid tsam pa dag yod de/ shing ljon pa de dag la lha'i gos ngur smrig dag rab tu 'phyang zhing / lha'i sil snyan yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang dag par 'byin pa
213a4(mdo sde): dag kyang yod do/ /shing ljon pa de dag la bya sna tshogs dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu sgrogs pa dag kyang yod de/ shing ljon pa de
213a5(mdo sde): dag gi lo ma dag phan tshun phrad pa na lha'i las shin tu 'das pa'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag gi sgra'ang 'byung ngo / /shing ljon pa re re'i dri rgya chen po lha'i las 'das
213a6(mdo sde): pas kyang dpag tshad 'bum du khyab par byed cing shing ljon pa de dag la lha'i rgyan dag kyang mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo / /shing ljon pa de dag gi bar dag na rin po che sna bdun
213a7(mdo sde): gyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga brgya/ rgyar ni dpag tshad brgya pa dag yod de/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kun la'ang phyogs bzhin rta babs dag yod do/ /rta
213b1(mdo sde): babs de dag gi nang rol/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi phyi rol na rdzing bu srid du ni dpag tshad brgyad cu/ rgyur ni dpag tshad lnga bcu pa dag yod do/ /rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi khor khor
213b2(mdo sde): yug na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i them skas dag kyang yod do/ /rdzing bu de dag kyang khor yug tu me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dag gis kun nas yog ste/ me tog re re la'ang rgyar ni
213b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad tsam yod do/ /me tog de dag gi ze ba dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa dag rab tu skyes te/ de dag kyang nam gyi gung thun dang po la pad+ma de dag gi ze ba
213b4(mdo sde): dag las skye zhing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang / bde ba myong bzhin du skyil mo krung gis mtshan mo de 'da' bar byed de/ de na mtshan mo de'i nang par gyi dus kyi tshe phyogs bzhi nas dri
213b5(mdo sde): zhim zhing yid du 'ong la 'jam zhing reg na bde bar byed pa'i rlung dag rab tu ldang ste/ de dag gis me tog kha zums pa rnams mngon par 'byed par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'
213b6(mdo sde): de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba spangs nas pad+ma'i ze ba dag las babs te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu zhugs nas rin po che sna bdun
213b7(mdo sde): gyi stan dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cing chos nyan par byed do/ /shing ljon pa de dag dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi phyogs bzhi khor khor yug dag na rin po che dzam+bu chu bo'i
214a1(mdo sde): gser gyi ri 'phang du ni dpag tshad nyi shu/ rgyar ni dpag tshad gsum pa dag yod de/ ri de dag gi bar bar dag na chu shel dang / me shel dang / an+da rnyil dang / nor bu
214a2(mdo sde): skar mdog 'bum phrag du ma dag snang ngo / /de na sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa'i 'od kyis ri dang nor bu dag la phog pa na sangs rgyas kyi 'od de dang / nor bu'i 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams
214a3(mdo sde): pad+ma de rtag tu snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas te/ de na nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang mi mngon te/ gzhan du na gang gi tshe pad+ma rnams kha zums shing bya dag sgra chung bar gyur pa
214a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe mtshan mo zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gyur la/ de las bzlog pa ni nyin par yin no/ /ri de dag gi steng na sngon po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'phang du ni dpag tshad
214a5(mdo sde): drug cu rgyar ni dpag tshad nyi shu pa dag yod de/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi phyogs bzhi na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rta babs dag kyang yod de/ khang pa brtsegs pa de
214a6(mdo sde): dag na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri dag yod de/ de la skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag 'dug cing chos nyan par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'jig
214a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams pad+ma de na byang chub kyi shing dbang po zhes bya ba 'phang du ni dpag tshad sum stong / rgyar ni dpag tshad lnga brgya/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dag ni dpag tshad stong du
214b1(mdo sde): legs par gnas pa yod do/ /byang chub kyi shing de'i drung na dngul las byas pa'i pad+ma sdong bu'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga brgya yod la/ de'i 'dab ma ni gser las byas pa bye ba phrag 'bum
214b2(mdo sde): yod de/ 'phang du ni dpag tshad lnga yod do/ /ze ba thams cad na rin po che rdo'i snying po las byas pa'i ze 'bru dag yod do/ /ze ba rnams ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ste/ 'phang du ni dpag
214b3(mdo sde): tshad bcu/ rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun yod do/ /der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
214b4(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi gdan pad+ma de'i kho ra khor yug na'ang pad+ma dag yod de/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dag 'khod par de bzhin gshegs
214b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa'i cho 'phrul dag mthong bar gyur to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin
214b6(mdo sde): po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pas cho 'phrul chen po
214b7(mdo sde): ji lta bu dag bstan pa mdzad pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs
215a1(mdo sde): kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa ni mdang gi nam gyi thun tha ma la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
215a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ da nang nang par gyi dus kyi tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/ bdag nyid tshangs pa'i 'jig
215a3(mdo sde): rten gyi bar du mngon par sprul nas dbu'i gtsug tor nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum rab tu bkye'o/ /'od zer de dag gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
215a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas khyab par mdzad do/ /de'i tshe steng gi phyogs na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa dag gis thur du bltas na de dag la ri
215a5(mdo sde): rab dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / ri nag po rnams kyang snang bar ma gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lung bstan pa dag dang
215a6(mdo sde): gang dag ting nge 'dzin thob pa dag dang / gang dag gzungs thob pa dag dang / gang dag bzod pa thob pa dag dang / gang dag sa las shin tu 'das pa dag dang / de na gang dag skye ba gcig
215a7(mdo sde): gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
215b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa de'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa'i sku'ang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor de dang / 'jig rten
215b2(mdo sde): gyi khams pad+ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'ang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mchog tu dga' ba dang / bde ba skyes te/ 'jig rten gyi
215b3(mdo sde): k hams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bor nas de bzhin gshegs
215b4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mar lhags
215b5(mdo sde): so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pa des kyang bzhugs pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / 'chag bzhin du zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling
215b6(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ljags kyi dbang pos yongs su khebs par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag snyoms par zhugs pa de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin las langs nas
215b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la mchod pa bya ba'i las la brtson par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pas ljags kyi
216a1(mdo sde): dbang po'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i phyir bsdus nas/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pas sku thams cad nas spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi
216a2(mdo sde): spu'i khung bu'i sgo re re nas kyang / 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu byung zhing / phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab
216a3(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed dag snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mdzad nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lung bstan pa dag dang / byang chub sems
216a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ting nge 'dzin thob pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang /
216a5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rang rang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mar lhags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
216a6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de phyir bsdus nas/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig
216a7(mdo sde): rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub byang chub sems dpa'i
216b1(mdo sde): 'khor la phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad+ma dkar po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i
216b2(mdo sde): le'u ste dang po'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che rnam par snang byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
216b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma de na mtshan mo dang nyin mor ni ji ltar 'tshal/ de na sgra ni ji lta bu dag grags/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsam pa ni ji lta bu dang ldan/ gnas pa ni gang
216b4(mdo sde): gis gnas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma ni rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa yin te/ de na gang gi tshe me tog
216b5(mdo sde): dag kha zums par gyur cing / bya rnams kyang sgra chung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bsam gtan dag gis rol cing rnam par grol ba'i
216b6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang bde ba myong bar mdzad pa de'i tshe de na mtshan mo yin par shes so/ /gang gi tshe me tog de rlung gis kha bye bar gyur cing bya rnams kyang sgra yid du 'ong ba sgrogs par byed pa dang /
216b7(mdo sde): der me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par 'bab pa dang / phyogs bzhi nas dri mchog tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong la 'jam zhing / reg na bde bar 'gyur ba'i rlung dag ldang ba dang / bcom
217a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyang ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ting nge 'dzin las langs shing bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dam pa byang chub sems
217a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam las shin tu 'das pa dag ston par mdzad pa de'i tshe de na nyin mo
217a3(mdo sde): yin par shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang mi 'bral lo/ /mi 'jigs pa'i
217a4(mdo sde): sgra dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams pa chen
217a5(mdo sde): po'i sgra dang / snying rje chen po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang mi 'bral te/ byang chub
217a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag ni rtag tu sgra de lta bu dag nyan par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes

223b5(mdo sde): po dag kyang mig lam na mi snang ngo / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang la las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par kun tu snang ngo / /byang chub
223b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag na gnas pa de dag dang / gang dag ting nge 'dzin
223b7(mdo sde): dang / gzungs dang bzod pa thob pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus rang rang gi
224a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
224a2(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas de nyid du
224a3(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / grul bum dang / sha za bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i
224a4(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i 'di mnyan pa'i phyir bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo
224a5(mdo sde): bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dir 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad+ma dang /
224a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa byang chub sems pa'i tshogs kyi yongs su bskor ba'ang mthong bar gyur to//
224a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di gsungs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i
224b1(mdo sde): klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyis gzungs 'di thob bo/ /gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgrang ba las yang dag par
224b2(mdo sde): 'das pa de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mthong bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa thams cad kyang mthong bar gyur te/ de dag ngo mtshar du
224b3(mdo sde): 'dzin par gyur nas ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul bas sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas te de nyid du 'khod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag

224b5(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'thob bo/ /gzungs kyi sgo bdun khri nyis stong yang 'thob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo drug khri'ang 'thob bo/ /gzungs kyi sgo 'di 'thob I byang chub sems
224b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems chen po ni byams pa chen po 'thob bo/ /snying rje chen po'ang thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig thob par bya
224b7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtog par byed cing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa yin
225a1(mdo sde): n o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang gzungs 'di'i ngo bo nyid thugs su chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston par mdzad cing shin tu myur bar yongs
225a2(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di'i gzungs kyi mthus sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing
225a3(mdo sde): snang ba byung bar gyur ba dang / snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang / snang ba des kyang byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas
225a4(mdo sde): m u med pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag nas kun nas 'dir lhags pa la

225a6(mdo sde): y as pa mu med pa gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di nyan par byed pa de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la
225a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa 'di thos ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ /yi ger 'dri bar byed na'ang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge
225b1(mdo sde): 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang mi 'bral lo/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di kha ton tu byed
225b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni las dang po rnams ma lus par zad par byed cing tsho brjes nas kyang sa dang po gnon par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
225b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'di sgom par byed na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' de la mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas shing bsags pa zhig yod na'ang de'i
225b4(mdo sde): las de dag yongs su zad cing gang gi phyir tshe brjes na'ang sa dang po gnon par byed do/ /gang la mtshams med pa'i las rnams med pa de ni tshe 'di nyid la las gzhan thams cad ma
225b5(mdo sde): lus par zad cing tshe ba rjes nas kyang sa dang po gnon par byed do/ /gang sgom par mi byed/ /kha ton tu mi byed kyang nyan cing chos smra ba la dar gyis 'ching ba byed na de la 'jig rten gyi

225b7(mdo sde): zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni der yongs su btang bas ring por mig
226a1(mdo sde): thogs par rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gang la
226a2(mdo sde): la chos smra ba la spos kyis mchod pa byed na de'ang ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spos 'thob bo/ /chos smra ba la me tog gis mchod pa byed
226a3(mdo sde): na bla na med pa ye shes kyi me tog dag 'thob bo/ /chos smra ba la 'bras chan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dag byin na de bzhin gshegs pa'i zas bla na med pa 'thob par

226b1(mdo sde): du 'ong ba'i chos bzhi'ang 'thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba dam pas byang chub sems

227a2(mdo sde): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ ngas mngon par shes te/ gang dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni 'gog pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i
227a3(mdo sde): sems kyis bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag 'da' bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag ma rnams kyis ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu po 'di dag la/ byang chub

228a1(mdo sde): 'khor lo/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po rnams phyir mi ldog pa la bkod cing / der bar

228a4(mdo sde): zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te de nyid kyi tshe na gzungs 'di'ang mthar thug pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

228a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs dag yang dag par bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i phyag rgya la ting nge 'dzin sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba bstan te/ lus rdo rje lta bur
228a7(mdo sde): byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba nges par ston cing / der bar gyi bskal pa bcur byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa
228b1(mdo sde): nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa 'dis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa dag

229a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzhan dag ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong ngo / /de na gang dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni 'gog

229a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i

229b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gos ngan ngon tsam gyis dga' zhing chog shes la/ gos ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par byed cing / de gos kyi phyir tshul
229b6(mdo sde): dang mi mthun par mi byed la/ gos ma rnyed na'ang yongs su gdung ba med cing / gos rnyed na'ang chags pa med pa dang / zhen pa med pa dang / 'khren pa med pa dang / mdud pa por ba med pa dang /
229b7(mdo sde): brgyal ba med pa dang / lhag par chags pa med pa dang / lhag par chags par gyur pa med par yongs su spyod par byed cing / nyes dmigs su lta la nges par 'byung bar rab tu shes
230a1(mdo sde): shing yongs su spyod par byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i rigs la legs par gnas pa dang po yin no/ /gos la ji
230a2(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan la'ang de bzhin no/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngan ngon ca

230a4(mdo sde): kyi phyir tshul dang mi mthun pa 'tshol bar mi byed la/ de na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ma rnyed na'ang yongs su gdung ba med cing rnyed na'ang chags pa med pa dang / zhen pa med
230a5(mdo sde): pa dang / 'khren pa med pa dang / mdud pa bor ba med pa dang / brgyal ba med pa dang / lhag par chags pa med pa dang / lhag par chags par gyur pa med par yongs su spyod par
230a6(mdo sde): byed cing / nyes dmigs su lta ba la nges par 'byung ba rab tu shes shing yongs su spyod par byed pa ste/ 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi po de dag la legs par gnas shing /
230a7(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'di thob cing sgom par byed pa yin no/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
230b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos lnga dang ldan na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di 'thob ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
230b2(mdo sde): dag kyang tshul khrims dang ldan par gnas pa dang / so so thar ba'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang / cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam dag la'ang 'jigs par
230b3(mdo sde): lta ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs shing slob par byed la/ gzhan tshul khrims dang bral pa dag mthong na'ang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du
230b4(mdo sde): 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dang po de dag ldan pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
230b5(mdo sde): chen pos sems can lta ba la zhen par gyur pa rnams log par lta ba las rnam par bslang zhing / yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par
230b6(mdo sde): byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis pa de dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can cho ga ma yin pa la
230b7(mdo sde): zhen par gyur pa rnams yang dag pa'i cho ga yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gsum
231a1(mdo sde): pa de dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can bsam pa nyams par gyur pa rnams bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa
231a2(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la/ 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang byang
231a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang
231a4(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan pa ste/ chos lnga po de dag dang
231a5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni gzungs 'di 'thob bo/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos drug dang ldan na gzungs 'di
231a6(mdo sde): 'thob ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang thos pa mang ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa dang / thos pa bsags pa yin pas des chos
231a7(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba gang
231b1(mdo sde): yin pa de mngon par brjod pas mngon par brjod cing / de de lta bu'i chos mang po dag thos nas bzung ste/ kha ton yongs su byang ba dang / yid kyis brtags pa dang / mthong bas shin tu rtogs
231b2(mdo sde): par byas shing / de de ltar mang du thos par gyur pa na thos pa nyung ba'i sems can gzhan dag mang du thos pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/
231b3(mdo sde): chos dang po de dang ldan pa dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' phrag dog dang / ser sna med cing phrag dog dang / ser snas zil gyis non pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang phrag dog med pa
231b4(mdo sde): dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la rab tu 'god par byed pa'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis pa de dang ldan pa dang /
231b5(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed cing mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin par byed la/ gnod pa sna tshogs gnod par gyur pa'i sems
231b6(mdo sde): can rnams gnod pa dag las yongs su thar bar byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med cing kha gsag med pa dang / sgyu med cing g.yo med pa dang / stong pa nyid kyis
231b7(mdo sde): lan mang du gnas par byed pa ste/ chos drug po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i
232a1(mdo sde): gzungs 'di 'thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de lta bu dag dang ldan pas lo bdun du 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag
232a2(mdo sde): thams cad la nyin gcig cing lan gsum gsum yan lag lngas mdo dang rgyas par phyag byas shing / lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ste/ stong pa nyid la gnas
232a3(mdo sde): pas 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di brjod par bgyi'o/ /langs nas kyang phyogs bcu kun nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
232a4(mdo sde): dran par byed pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lo bdun 'das nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i

232a6(mdo sde): s angs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la cho 'phrul chen po rnam par ston par mdzad pa thams
232a7(mdo sde): cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig kyang 'thob cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'dzum pa rnam par bstan pa dag kyang mthong nas/

232b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing sa bcu pa'ang gnon par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' des mtshams med pa'i las dag ma byas na'ang de'i las gzhan thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing / tshe
232b5(mdo sde): brjes nas kyang sa bcu pa gnon par byed de/ ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag kyang 'thob la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang 'thob par
232b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces spras
232b7(mdo sde): byed pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'dzum pa rnam par bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mthong na/ gang gis 'jig
233a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
233a2(mdo sde): chos nyan cing / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid du phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi

233a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa zla ba dam pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang nges par 'gyur
233a6(mdo sde): ro| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho
233a7(mdo sde): zhing gzhes pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag las gzungs 'di thos shing thob lags so/ /kha cig gis ni 'di skad ces bdag cag gis ni gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las so
233b1(mdo sde): zhes gsol to/ /kha cig gis ni gsum snyed las so zhes/ kha cig gis ni bzhi snyed las so zhes/ kha cig gis ni lnga snyed las so zhes/ kha cig gis ni drug snyed las so zhes/ kha cig gis ni

233b3(mdo sde): z hing gzhes pa gang+gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed dag las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di thos shing rnam pa thams cad du thob lags so zhes

233b5(mdo sde): zhig byung ste/ de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bgyi bar gyur pa der sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
233b6(mdo sde): pa| 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mtha' yas pa'i dge
233b7(mdo sde): 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bgrang pa las yang dag par 'das pa zhig gis yongs su bskor ba bzhig byung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa'i
234a1(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i gzungs 'di nyid bshad par gyur pa na/ de las gzungs 'di thos nas bdag gis bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing

234a4(mdo sde): par bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas re re las kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad ma mchis pa dang / grangs ma mchis pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bsrungs shing

234a6(mdo sde): ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur te/ de'i skad du bdag 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas lags te/
234a7(mdo sde): da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur nas/ bdag gi shes rab kyi mgo la rnam par grol ba'i cod pan bcings lags
234b1(mdo sde): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa/ de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa

235a2(mdo sde): ma tha b+hA mi/ smr-i ti b+hU mi/ pradz+nyA b+hU mi/ bai sha rat+t+ya b+hU mi/ pra tis ma bid+b+hU mi/ a nu k+She pa b+hU mi/ sa ma tA pa rI k+She pa u be k+She b+hU mi/ dza te k+She ya b+hU mi/ ma muM dza/ min dza/ bin bu dza/ ma la na

237a3(mdo sde): cu rab tu phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
237a4(mdo sde): mdzad do/ /'od zer de dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang mi rnams la khyab par gyur te/ 'od zer de dag gis sems
237a5(mdo sde): can dmyal ba'i sems can me rab tu 'bar bas lus sreg pa gang yin pa de dag rlung bsil ba dag langs nas de dag la rig pa dang / de dag yud tsam zhig bde ba'i tshor ba skyes
237a6(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sems can re re'i mdun na yang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sa sku legs par brgyan cing / dpe byad
237a7(mdo sde): bzang po brgyad cus gzugs rnam par mdzes par gyur pa dag bzhugs te/ sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag gis de mthong nas bde ba dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas
237b1(mdo sde): mthong ba'i bde bas lus rab tu tshim ste/ sangs rgyas mthong nas 'di snyam du sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis bde ba'i tshor ba thob po snyam du sems te/ de dag bcom ldan
237b2(mdo sde): 'das la dga' zhing dad la gus pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi de dag la bka' stsal pa/ kye sems can dag/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
237b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad brjod cig dang / rtag tu de lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas
237b4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad brjod do/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba
237b5(mdo sde): de dang / sems dang ba des de nas shi 'phos nas/ kha cig ni lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /kha cig ni mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /gang dag grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su
237b6(mdo sde): skyes pa'i sems can de dag la ni rlung dron po dag langs nas snga ma bzhin du mi rnams kyi bar du skyes so/ /de bzhin du yi dwags bkres pa dang skom pas lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa de dag
237b7(mdo sde): kyang 'od zer de dag gis bkres pa dang skom pa'i me zhi bar byed cing bde ba'i tshor ba bskyed de/ yi dwags re re'i mdun na yang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
238a1(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes pa dag bzhugs par gyur te/ yi dwags de dag gis de
238a2(mdo sde): mthong nas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i bde bas lus tshim par gyur nas 'di snyam du sems can 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis bde ba'i tshor ba thob po snyam du sems te/ de dag
238a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la dga' zhing dad la gus pa skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/ sems can dag /tshur shog /khyed cag sangs rgyas la phyag
238a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad brjod cig dang / zhes bya ba nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des de nas shi 'phos nas kha cig ni lha
238a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /kha cig ni mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i bar du gyur to/ /dud 'gro rnams la'ang de bzhin du bskul/ mi rnams la'ang de bzhin du bskul nas/ lha
238a6(mdo sde): d ang mi bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'khod
238a7(mdo sde): do/ /de'i tshe na lha dang / mi'i tshogs bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /byang
238b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag gis ni der ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs thob par gyur to/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad+ma dkar
238b2(mdo sde): po las/ gzungs kyi sgo'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa slar bsdus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/
238b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros zhi bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gi
238b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag cing rnyog pa ma mchis la/ snyigs ma lnga dang bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sna tshogs dag mchis la/ de na byang chub sems
238b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs shing bde ba sna tshogs dang ldan la/ de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang ma
238b6(mdo sde): mchis na/ skye ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing smad par 'khrugs shing / tshe'i
238b7(mdo sde): snyigs ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma byung bar gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
239a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum las brtsams te chos bstan par mdzad lags/ ci'i slad du bcom
239a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su ma bzung lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni smon
239a3(mdo sde): lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /
239a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'o/ /
239a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nga da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing smad pa 'di lta bur skyes pa'ang ngas de ltar smon lam btab pa'i phyir te/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig
239a6(mdo sde): dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros zhi bas/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom
239a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
239b1(mdo sde): bskal pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ bskal ba chen po de la gling bzhi pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gling bzhi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba
239b2(mdo sde): zhig byung ngo / /rtsibs kyi mu khyud de la mdun na 'don bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /de'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po
239b3(mdo sde): brgyad cus lus rnam par mdzes la bsod nams brgya'i mtshan dang ldan zhing 'od 'dom gang ba yod la/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab cing lta bas chog mi shes pa zhig btsas so/ /de
239b4(mdo sde): btsas ma thag tu lha 'bum gyis mchod pa byas nas/ rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya bar ming btags so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na nges par byung nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig
239b5(mdo sde): bgos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bcom
239b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod par gyur to/ /de dus gzhan zhig na
239b7(mdo sde): nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i
240a1(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor rnams su rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis gang na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de gnas pa'i grong khyer gzhan zhig tu gshegs so/ /de
240a2(mdo sde): n a de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po grong khyer gyi phyi rol nas ha cang yang mi ring ba na dzam+bu'i tshal zhes bya ba'i skyed
240a3(mdo sde): mos tshal zhig yod pa na nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
240a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po bdag gi yul du gshegs nas/ dzam+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal na nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs
240a5(mdo sde): gcig tu bzhugs so zhes thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag song la phyin nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la bsti stang du bya/ bla mang bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya gor
240a6(mdo sde): ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud rgyal po'i 'byor ba chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor
240a7(mdo sde): cing mdun du bdar te grong khyer nas byung zhing dzam+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal ga la ba der song nas/ bzhon pas bgrong pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song ste phyin pa dang /
240b1(mdo sde): rkang pas kun dga'i ra bar zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
240b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang de bzhin gshegs
240b3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
240b4(mdo sde): yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ /rnam grangs du mar chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par
240b5(mdo sde): gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// //bam po gsum pa/ de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud stan las langs
240b6(mdo sde): te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la bde logs su thal po sbyar ba btud de zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
240b7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dgung zla gsum po 'di la bcom ldan
241a1(mdo sde): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la na bza' dang / bshos dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams
241a2(mdo sde): kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
241a3(mdo sde): pos rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos cang mi gsung bas
241a4(mdo sde): gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi
241a5(mdo sde): mu khyud kyis khams kyi rgyal po rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams dang / blon po phra mo rnams dang / grong mi rnams dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams dang /
241a6(mdo sde): zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams bos te smras pa/ gtso bo dag /shes bar gyis shig /ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i
241a7(mdo sde): snying po dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum po 'di la yo byad thams cad kyis des par spyan drangs te/ nga la nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / bsnyen
241b1(mdo sde): bkur bya ba dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gang ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ngas bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la gus par byas te phul gyi/
241b2(mdo sde): khyed cag la gang zag gi nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dga' mgur spyad pa dang / chung ma'i 'khor ji yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom
241b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la gus par phul cig ces bsgo nas/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin du phul lo/ /khyim bdag rin po ches kyang skyed mos tshal bzang po thams
241b4(mdo sde): cad dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas shing skyed mos tshal de nyid du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi khang ba brtsegs pa brtsigs te/ de'i phyogs bzhi khor khor
241b5(mdo sde): yug dag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi sgo dag kyang gtod do/ /skyed mos tshal thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dag gis brgyan to/ /shing ljon pa de dag kyang gos
241b6(mdo sde): sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi lnga ldi sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dag gis
241b7(mdo sde): legs par brgyan to/ /shing ljon pa de dag rin po che'i me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad kyis kyang brgyan to/ /skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad nor bu rnam pa du ma dag gis kyang
242a1(mdo sde): brgyan nas me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing dar dang / ras bcos bu dang / be'u ras dang / bgo ba sna tshogs dag gi gdan dag kyang bshams so/ /'khor lo
242a2(mdo sde): rin po che de'ang khang pa brtsegs pa'i phyi rol gyi steng gi bar snang la mi'i tshad tsam du red de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par 'bar zhing 'dug go/ /glang po rin po che thal
242a3(mdo sde): kar yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'dzin cing 'dug ste/ shing ljon pa de'ang
242a4(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun dang / mu tig gi lda ldi sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / me tog phreng sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing / dar sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dag gis
242a5(mdo sde): legs par brgyan nas shing ljon pa de la rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dag kyang dpyangs par gyur to/ /rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi btsun mo dam pa gang yin pa de'ang bcom ldan
242a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tsan+dan sa mchog pa dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma dag 'thor bar byed do/ /rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi nor bu rin po
242a7(mdo sde): che 'od gsal bar gyur pa gang yin pa de'ang rang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhag go / de nas nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad rtag par
242b1(mdo sde): rgyun du snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rtag par rgyun du khyab par gyur to/ /nyan
242b2(mdo sde): thos re re la'ang tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i rkang rten dag bzhag go / nyan thos re re'i rgyab tu'ang glang po che'i gtso bo thal kar snga ma lta bu dag dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das la 'khor
242b3(mdo sde): lo rin po che mi'i tshad tsam pa bzhag pa de lta bu dag kyang bzhag go / nyan thos re re'i mdun du'ang bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag bkod nas tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i phye ma dag
242b4(mdo sde): kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /nyan thos re re'i mdun du nor bu baiDUR+ya dag kyang bzhag go /skyed mos tshal gyi nang gi kho ra khor yug dag tu rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag kyang bsgrags so/ /skyed
242b5(mdo sde): mos tshal gyi phyi rol gyi kho ra khor yug dag na blon po rin po che dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dag kyang gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud de
242b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nyin gcig bzhin du grong khyer nas byung ste/ de bzhon pas bgrod pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon
242b7(mdo sde): pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang pas skyed mos tshal du zhugs so/ /zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / de bzhin
243a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas
243a2(mdo sde): nas/ rang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la phyag chab gsol te/ bdag nyid lag dar nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / bsod pa mang po dag
243a3(mdo sde): legs par bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bdag nyid lag dar te legs par bstabs shing tshim par byas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag nas lhung bzed bzhag ste
243a4(mdo sde): phyag bcabs par rig nas/ bdag nyid kyis bsil yab blangs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yabs so/ /rgyal bu stong dang / khams kyi rgyal po stong gis kyang nyan thos re re la de
243a5(mdo sde): lta bu'i bsnyen bkur byas nas bsil yab blangs te nyan thos rnams la g.yabs so/ /zhal zas brim pa rdzogs te gdugs tshod rgyu ma thag tu srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
243a6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir kun dga' ra bar lhags so/ /lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char dag
243a7(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu phab nas/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag kyang rab tu bsgrags so/ /lha'i gdugs dang / gos dang / rgyan dag kyang rab tu dpyangs so/ /gnod sbyin gos sngon po can sa
243b1(mdo sde): ya phrag bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bsrung ba'i phyir tsan+dan gyi tshal nas tsan+dan sa mchog ba'i sdong po dag blangs nas thun du blags te mel tshe byed de/
243b2(mdo sde): rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud nyid kyis kyang mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar mar me kha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bus so/ /rigs
243b3(mdo sde): kyi bu/ de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas mgo'i steng du'ang mar me'i kong bu gcig bzhag /phrag pa gnyis dang / lag pa gnyis dang / rkang
243b4(mdo sde): pa gnyis su'ang mar me'i kong bu re re bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mtshan yal nangs su mar me btang yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus lus la ngal ba med cing / 'di
243b5(mdo sde): lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bur lus kyi bde ba tshor bar gyur te/ de ltar lus ngal ba med pa dang / sems ngal ba med par
243b6(mdo sde): zla ba gsum du bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de bzhin du rgyal bu stong dang / khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gzhan yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag
243b7(mdo sde): 'bum gyis kyang nyan thos re re la zla ba gsum du rgyal po'i yo byad dang de lta bu'i bsnyen bkur gyis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /ji ltar rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
244a1(mdo sde): snying po la bsnyen bkur byas ba de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa lha mo dpal gyis kyang zla gsum du spos dang / me tog dag gis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /de
244a2(mdo sde): bzhin du bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis kyang nyan thos re re la zla ba gsum du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dag gis bsnyen bkur byas so/ /rigs kyi
244a3(mdo sde): bu| de nas rgyal po rtsibs kyi mu khyud kyi zla ba gsum po 'das nas bcom ldan 'das la dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i rgyan brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo/ /bcom ldan
244a4(mdo sde): 'das la 'khor lo rin po che la sogs pa gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che brgyad khri bzhi stong yang phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das la glang po rin po che la sogs pa glang po che thal

258a5(mdo sde): tshe ring ba rnams dang / kha cig na tshe thung ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kha cig mes 'jig pa rnams dang / kha cig chu dang / kha cig rlung gis 'jig pa rnams dang /
