344b7(mdo sde): g.yang sar lhung bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma gus pa'i sems dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems su gyur pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la/
345a1(mdo sde): 'khrul ba'i sems su gyur pa dang / 'dod chags kyi sems dag dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / mtshams med pa bgyid par gyur
345a2(mdo sde): pa dag kyang bdag gis byang chub thob nas 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'byin cing mi 'jigs pa'i khyim mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'dzud par gyur cig / ji srid du bdag
345a3(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bas par ma gyur pa de srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po'ang bas par ma gyur cig / bdag gi dam pa'i chos bas par gyur pa
345a4(mdo sde): na bskal pa bzang po'ang bas par gyur cig / bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
345a5(mdo sde): kyis sku legs par brgyan cing mtshan re re'ang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa dpag tu ma mchis/ /grangs ma mchis pa dag tu gyur te gnas par gyur
345a6(mdo sde): cig / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag tu bzhud nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
345a7(mdo sde): sku re res kyang sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa rnams theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig /
345b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na bar gyi bskal pa zhig par ma gyur pa der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag bzhud nas ji ltar sngar brjod pa de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob
345b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing slad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams rin po che dang bral bar gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu mchis
345b3(mdo sde): shing rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang / gter dag kyang rab tu ston par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams dge ba'i spyod pa dang bral zhing nad
345b4(mdo sde): kyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang tsan+dan sa mchog pa dang / sbrul gyi snying po dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag gi spos kyi char rab tu 'bebs
345b5(mdo sde): par gyur cig / spos kyi char de dag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang / lta ba'i nad rnams dang / lus kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid par gyur
345b6(mdo sde): cig / de nas sems can de dag kyang bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dag la mngon par brtson par 'gyur zing mtho ris la gzhol bar yang gyur cig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
345b7(mdo sde): bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig /bdag byang chub thob nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par gyur cig /bdag
346a1(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag gi sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
346a2(mdo sde): gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams kyi sman du'ang mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag gis phyogs bcu'i
346a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa
346a4(mdo sde): de dag bslus par gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang ma gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das/ srog chags
346a5(mdo sde): b ye ba phrag mang po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing lung bstan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa
346a6(mdo sde): de dag kyang bdag gis thugs byung bar bgyis par gyur cig / bdag byang chub kyi slad du yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor ban sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang /
346a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / dge ba'i sgra dang / dge ba'i chos bgyid pa'i sgra dag rna lam du grag par ma gyur cig /gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bur yongs su rdzogs par mi
346b1(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing sems can rnams kyi sman du'ang mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag rtag tu mnar med par rtogs par gyur cig / rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
346b2(mdo sde): snying pos bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ legs so/ /khyod ni sems can rnams kyi sman du 'gyur
346b3(mdo sde): zhing sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar bar byed par yang 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa/ de'i phyir khyod sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gyur cig /sman gyi rgyal
346b4(mdo sde): p o skar ma dri ma med pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis
346b5(mdo sde): p a la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon par rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i bar dag
346b6(mdo sde): bzhin du bsod snyoms 'bul bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug phud bzang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub
346b7(mdo sde): pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsal mdzad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
347a1(mdo sde): kyi bar du 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed du 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge
347a2(mdo sde): 'dun ji snyed du 'gyur ba khyod gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du 'gyur la/ sems can de snyed kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das
347a3(mdo sde): nas kyang ji srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po'i bskal pa zad par ma gyur pa de srid du dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur la/ de srid du sangs rgyas kyi sku dag kyang 'byung bar
347a4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu spos kyi char pas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang / lta ba'i nad rnams dang / lus kyi nad rnams kyi bar
347a5(mdo sde): dag kyang rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur la/ sems can rnams kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la rab tu 'god cing mtho ris la gzhol bar byed par
347a6(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ro/ / //bam po dgu pa/ rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan
347a7(mdo sde): 'das/ gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gis bdag
347b1(mdo sde): gi spyi bo la byug par gsol/ rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa'i spyi bo
347b2(mdo sde): la bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyi brgyan pa'i phyag gis yongs su byug pa mdzad nas de na bzhugs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar
347b3(mdo sde): ma dri ma med pa sems dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos
347b4(mdo sde): phyag byas nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis lha'i ka shi ka'i gos bskon te smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod
347b5(mdo sde): kyis smon lam bzang po btab ste/ da phyin chad khyod kyis kho bo'i bsnyen bkur bya mi dgos kyi ji ltar bde ba nyid du spyod cig /rigs kyi bu/ de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul
347b6(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa 'khor 'di na snang ba ltar bdag gis srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par
347b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go / sems can chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis ni smon lam rgya che ba dgu btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba
348a1(mdo sde): sha stag yongs su blangs te/ khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis rtsod pa'i dus yongs su spangs pas bdag
348a2(mdo sde): gis ni rtsod pa'i dus la bab par gyur pa na/ sems can rnams chos kyi bcud kyis mgron du gnyer bar bya zhing brtson 'grus brtan por bya ste/ bdag gis ci nas kyang
348a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
348a4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di yang bdag la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di'ang bdag la legs so
348a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin zhing lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams
348a6(mdo sde): l a chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
348a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa'ang mdzad la pho nya dag kyang gtong bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang de thos shing pho nya de dag kyang mthong bar
348b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / gang yang phyi ma'i dus na snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de lta bu'i rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas
348b2(mdo sde): kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du smon lam gyis byang chub yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing chos kyi mu ge'i dgon pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nad dag gi sa 'das par gyur pa'i
348b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'ang mdzad par 'gyur la sems can rnams la'ang chos ston par 'gyur ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan
348b4(mdo sde): las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag 'das kyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / dpag
348b5(mdo sde): t u ma mchis pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing snyan pa dang dbyangs kyang
348b6(mdo sde): sgrog par 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du bdag gi smon lam gyi tshul yang brjod par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang snying
348b7(mdo sde): rje chen pos yongs su bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i smon lam thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang sems can rnams la snying rje chen po
349a1(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de nas de dag kyang smon lam de lta bu dag nyid yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing ji ltar de ltar bdag gis yongs su bzung ba de lta bu'i
349a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can dag tu de dag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / chu bo bzhis bdas par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sgrol
349a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bar dag la 'god par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i smon lam gyis seng ge'i sgra
349a4(mdo sde): bsgrag par bya'o snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i smon lam de lta bu dag yang dag par
349a5(mdo sde): bskyed nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ngo / /yang de'i tshe na lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag
349a6(mdo sde): gis nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gsil dkrol zhing / me tog gi char rab tu phab nas tshig mthun par smras pa/ skyes
349a7(mdo sde): bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song la smon lam rab mchog dag shod la gzung zhig dang / khyod ni nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa'i
349b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ye shes kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur re/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag kyang thal mo sbyar te mngon du phyogs nas tshig
349b2(mdo sde): mthun par smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /mkhas pa rab mchog bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa blo mchog mnga' ba smon lam brtan por thob cig dang /
349b3(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang nyan par 'tshal lo/ /gang gi tshe mdun na 'don song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dun na 'don gyis pus mo'i lha nga btsugs pa dang / de'i mod la sangs rgyas
349b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam pa de thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab 'gul/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg
349b5(mdo sde): rab tu ldeg go / sil snyan dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'khrol lo/ /ri dwags dang / bya gag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs so/ /shing ljon pa
349b6(mdo sde): dag las kyang me tog dag 'brul lo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams ma gtogs
349b7(mdo sde): par gang su dag sa la rten cing gnas pa'i 'byung po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pa gang yin pa de dag
350a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang phan pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / kho na med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / ngo
350a2(mdo sde): mtshar gyi sems dag tu gyur to/ /sems can gang dag nam mkha' la rgyu ba de dag kyang bram ze'i smon lam sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba mnyan pa'i phyir nam mkha' la 'khod
350a3(mdo sde): nas 'di ltar mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos
350a4(mdo sde): dang | ras bcos bu dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi lha gang ji snyed pa rnams kyang / bram ze'i smon lam mnyan
350a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir dzam+bu'i gling du babs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing / lha'i spos dang / ras bcos bu'i bar dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to/ /bram zes kyang
350a6(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /bsam gtan dag gis rnam grol tshangs pa bzhin/ /gzugs
350a7(mdo sde): kyis 'od gsal brgya byin 'dra ba ste/ /rgyal po bzhin du nor 'bru rab gtong zhing / /rin chen mchog mnga' thub pa tshong dpon bzhin/ /zhi ba sgrogs mdzad ri la seng ge 'dra/ /
350b1(mdo sde): mi 'gul brtan pa lhun po 'dra ba ste/ rgya mtsho bzhin du 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing / /yon tan skyon la sa bzhin mtshungs par spyod/ /dri ma thams cad ded pa chu bzhin te/ /thub pa me ltar
350b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs nags rnams bsreg/ rlung ltar gang la'ang chags pa mi mnga' zhing / /thub pa lha ltar yang dag nyid kyang ston/ /klu ltar thub pa chos kyi char 'babs shing / /char pa
350b3(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gro kun ngoms par mdzad/ /pha rol mu stegs 'joms pa seng ge 'dra/ /me tog bzhin du yon tan dri yang gtong / /tshangs pa bzhin du snyan pa'i tshig gsung zhing / /'gro
350b4(mdo sde): ba sdug bsngal grol mdzad sman pa bzhin/ /sems mnyam nye bar gnas pa ma bzhin te/ /'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'dzin mdza' bshes 'dra/ /nga rgyal dgra 'joms rdo rje brtan bzhin
350b5(mdo sde): te| |thub pa mtshon bzhin srid pa'i 'khri shing gcod/ /zam pa'i shing bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad cing / /klu ltar thub pa mi shes rtswa rnams bsreg /thub pa zla ltar 'od bsil
350b6(mdo sde): gtong mdzad cing / /mi yi pad+ma kha 'byed nyi ma bzhin/ /'bras bu mchog bzhi sbyin mdzad ljon shing 'dra/ /thub pa bya bzhin drang srong tshogs kyis bskor/ /rgyal ba'i blo yangs rgya
350b7(mdo sde): mtsho 'dra ba ste/ /'gro ba dag la sems snyoms rtswa shing bzhin/ /rmi lam bzhin du chos rnams stong rtog cing / /'jig rten rjes su mthun 'jug chu dang 'dra/ /thub pa mtshan mchog
351a1(mdo sde): mnga' ba thugs rje can/ /khyod kyis sems can byang chub lung yang bstan/ /sems can mang po mtha' yas khyod kyis btul/ /byang chub mchog
351a2(mdo sde): rab tu ni bdag lung ston/ /drang srong chen po bden bzhed shes rab mchog /bdag ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'thab rtsod che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub lung ston dgos ched
351a3(mdo sde): la| |sems can brgya dag zhi bde'i lam du 'khod/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
351a4(mdo sde): po la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ de na 'dug pa de'i mod la lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya
351a5(mdo sde): ba byin no/ /mdun na 'don gyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
351a6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du stsal te/ de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che dgu dag yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can yang bsam pa yongs su dag
351a7(mdo sde): pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrungs pa dang / gdul sla ba dag yongs su bzung lags so/ /gang dag skar ma skyong la sogs pa bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa stong rtsa bzhi po
351b1(mdo sde): 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bzang por lung bstan te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gis kyang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal spyod pa dag theg pa
351b2(mdo sde): gsum po dag gis 'dul bar bgyid lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas che ba dang / rtsod pa'i dus kyi snyigs ma dag yongs su spangs pas/
351b3(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de dag gis kyang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams
351b4(mdo sde): dang | log par lta ba rnams dang / 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang / phar mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / mar mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa
351b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyid pa rnams dang / bsod nams ma lags pa bgyid pa rnams dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par
351b6(mdo sde): mi lta ba rnams dang / legs par spyod pa gsum bo dag don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang / de bzhin du lha dang / mi rnams kyi dpal dang / 'byor ba dag la brtson pa rnams nyes
351b7(mdo sde): par spyod pa gsum po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang bral ba rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyis spangs pa
352a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / mkhas pa thams cad kyis bor ba rnams dang / srid pa'i btson rar chud pa rnams dang / rgyun phyogs su 'das pa rnams dang /
352a2(mdo sde): 'gyur byed kyi chu klung du nub pa rnams dang / 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang ma bral ba rnams dang / mi dge ba'i bgyi ba thams cad ma
352a3(mdo sde): btang ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas
352a4(mdo sde): bcom par gyur pa rnams dang / nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa rnams spangs lags te/ de'i tshe na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na mi'i tshe lo bcu thub

359b2(mdo sde): sems dang / lta ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyi ba'i sems dang / phan tshun mi snyan pa rjod pa'i sems dang / gcig gis gcig bza' ba'i sems dang / phan tshun 'tshe ba la dbang
359b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa'i sems dang / zhe sdang yang dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang / 'dod pa dag gis ngoms mi myong ba'i sems
359b4(mdo sde): dang | thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing 'jungs pa'i sems dang / byas pa mi bzo ba'i sems dang / gzhan gyi chung ma brnab pa'i sems dang / gnod sems kyis 'tshe ba'i
359b5(mdo sde): sems dang / smon lam ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can dag kyang de'i tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/ /der sgra 'di lta bu dag phan tshun thos par yang bgyid
359b6(mdo sde): de| sems can dmyal ba'i sgra dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sgra dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sgra dang / nad kyi sgra dang / rga ba'i sgra dang / 'chi ba'i sgra dang / gsod pa'i
359b7(mdo sde): sgra dang / mi khom pa'i sgra dang / rtag tu sgra bgyid pa'i sgra dang / khung sgro dang / khong sgril dang / 'ching ba dang / btson ra'i sgra dang / chad pa'i sgra dang / gnod pa'i sgra dang / mi snyan pa
360a1(mdo sde): gshe ba dang / spyo ba'i sgra dang / khyim 'bugs pa'i sgra dang / tshogs 'byed pa'i sgra dang / chom rkun gyi sgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi sgra dang / mu
360a2(mdo sde): ge'i sgra dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa'i sgra dang / brdzun du smra ba'i sgra dang / ltas ngan gyi sgra dang / phra ma'i sgra dang / tshig rtsub po'i sgra dang / tshig kyal pa'i sgra dang /
360a3(mdo sde): phrag dog dang ser sna'i sgra dang / kun tu 'dzin pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i sgra dang / 'dod
360a4(mdo sde): pa dang mi 'dod pa'i sgra dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sgra dang / nyo tshong gi sgra dang / gcig gis gcig 'khol zhing 'tsho ba'i sgra dang / mngal na gnas pa'i sgra dang / dri nga ba'i
360a5(mdo sde): sgra dang / grang ba'i sgra dang / tsha ba'i sgra dang / bkres pa dang skom pa'i sgra dang / ngal ba dang chad pa tshol ba'i sgra dang / zhing las kyi sgra dang / bzo'i las sna tshogs kyis yongs su
360a6(mdo sde): skyo ba'i sgra dang / nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sgra dag ste/ sems can de dag gcig la gcig sgra de lta bu dag thos par yang bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe na 'jig rten gyi khams
360a7(mdo sde): mi mjed ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su nyams pa/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de lta bu dag gis kun tu gtam par
360b1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa dag gis stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bor bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / dul ba dang / yang
360b2(mdo sde): dag par sdom pa dang / dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral zhing mi dge ba dang 'grogs la/ mun khrod nas mun khrod du mchi ba'i sems
360b3(mdo sde): can de dag ni de'i tshe na las kyi rkyen rab tu dam pos bskal pa bzang po la lo brgya nyi shu pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /sems can de dag gis las kyi rkyen gyis sangs
360b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad kyis yongs su spangs shing dman par 'gyur te/ sa gzhi pa tshwa can du 'gyur/ sa gzhi gor ma dang /
360b5(mdo sde): gseg ma dang / rdul dang / ri rad rod can du 'gyur/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu ring dang / sbrul dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / gdug pa dag gis kun tu gtam par 'gyur/

360b7(mdo sde): zhing | de ltar sa la lo thog dang / sman dang / rtswa dang / shing ljon pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / nor rnams dang / sems can rnams kyi bza' ba dang /
361a1(mdo sde): btung ba dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa rnams kyang ngan pa dang / rnyog pa can dang / rud rud po dang / rtsub pa dang / dug dang 'dres par

361a3(mdo sde): dang | gcig la gcig mi gus pa dang / 'jigs pa'i sems kyis kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang / gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sha 'tshal ba dang /

361a7(mdo sde): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs rgyud khyad par du 'phags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal
361b1(mdo sde): po'i rigs su btsun mo dam pa'i khong du mngal na gnas pa nye bar 'dzin par gyur cig / de'i tshe bdag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed snang ba rgya chen
361b2(mdo sde): pos khyab par bgyid par 'gyur zhing / steng du ni 'og min gyi gnas gyi bar gyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang / 'og tu ni gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag kyang snang
361b3(mdo sde): ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyid par gyur cig / de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / /

361b5(mdo sde): cing sdug bsngal gyis yid byung ba de dag kyang mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal zhing tha na nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyi ba de'i sems skyed par yang gyur cig / dang por lam mchog gi sa
361b6(mdo sde): bon 'di'ang skyed par gyur cig / gang gi tshe bdag chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad ston pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig gis bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar ston
361b7(mdo sde): cing sems mnyam par bzhag nas zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas par gyur cig / bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid thob nas yongs su skyo ba'i sems can gang dag 'khor ba las
362a1(mdo sde): y ongs su thar bar bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gis bdag zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na nor bu'i snying po yang dag par ston pa la sems
362a2(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag nas skyil mo krung gis mchis pa mthong bar gyur cig / zla ba bcu po 'das nas bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i ting nge
362a3(mdo sde): 'dzin gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bgyid par 'gyur zhing / steng du ni 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar

362b1(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i sa bon 'debs par gyur cig / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu skyed par gyur cig /gang gi tshe bdag

362b7(mdo sde): rten skyong ba rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / brdzus te skyes pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / lha ma

366a7(mdo sde): 'byung ba dag dgag pa ma mchis par 'gyur zhing nyam chung ba dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / sems rnam par 'khrul pa dang / mu cor smra ba dang / spyi brtol can gyi sems dang /

366b2(mdo sde): par gyur cig / bdag la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mchis par gyur cig /skye bo mang po dag gis bdag gi bstan pa rgyas
366b3(mdo sde): par gyur cig / lha rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams kyang 'phags pa'i gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la
366b4(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i bar dag kyang tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par gyur cig /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can
366b5(mdo sde): gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis bdag la mtshon cha'am/ zhugs sam/ mdung ngam/ lag cha rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis 'debs su mchi ba dang / tshig rtsub po dang / brlang
366b6(mdo sde): po dag gis gshe zhing spyo bar 'gyur ba dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu'ang mi snyan pa'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ba dang / dug dang 'dres pa'i bza' ba dang / btung ba
366b7(mdo sde): d ag stobs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su ma bas pa la gnas nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
367a1(mdo sde): bar gyur cig / bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can dag sngon gyi 'khon gyis 'gum pa'i yo byad kyi sbyor bas bdag la tshig rtsub po dang / mtshon
367a2(mdo sde): cha sna tshogs dang / dug dang 'dres pa'i btung ba dag stsol bar 'gyur zhing / khrag kyang 'byin par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag la bdag gis tshul khrims dang / thos pa
367a3(mdo sde): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snying rje chen po bsgoms pa'i tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rnga sgra bsgrags pas de dag gi sems rab tu dang bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston par 'gyur
367a4(mdo sde): zhing dge ba la sbyor bar yang gyur cig / de ltar sems can dag kyang las kyi sgrib pa 'chags par 'gyur zhing slan chad kyang sdom pa len par gyur cig /sems can de dag
367a5(mdo sde): gi mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / zag pa zad pa la sgrib pa'i chos su'ang ma gyur cig /der bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu'ang yongs
367a6(mdo sde): su bas pa dang / mthar thug pa dang / byang bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du bdag gi spu'i khung bu ji snyed
367a7(mdo sde): pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa dag sprul zhing / sangs rgyas kyi sku de dag kyang bdag
367b1(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu 'gyed par gyur cig / stong pa ma lags pa dag tu'ang 'gyed par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag tu 'ang 'gyed
367b2(mdo sde): par gyur cig / sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig gis kyang gdugs gcig la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / dam
367b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang / mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa'i bar dag dang / de na sems can gang dag thon thos kyi theg pa la yang dag
367b4(mdo sde): par zhugs pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag bslab pa dag la 'dren mar bgyid
367b5(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / zhig ral du spyod pa rnams dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba rnams dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang / dge ba'i lam rab tu nyams pa rnams dang / 'khor ba'i
367b6(mdo sde): 'brog dgon par zhugs pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas rnam par bcom zhing nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa de lta bu'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la chos ston
367b7(mdo sde): par gyur cig / sems can gang dag dbang phyug chen po la dad pa'i sems can de dag la'ang dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du de
368a1(mdo sde): bdag gi bsngags pa brjod par yang gyur cig / der sems can rnams smon lam 'debs pa la brtson par yang gyur cig /sems can de dag gis
368a2(mdo sde): bdag gis bsngags pa thos nas/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'tshal zhing smon lam yang 'debs par gyur cig /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag sems
368a3(mdo sde): can de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe mdun du ma mchis sam/ chos ma bstan tam/ sems rab tu dang bar ma bgyis na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
368a4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig / gal te sems can de dag gum nas ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mi'i lus thob
368a5(mdo sde): par ma gyur na bdag gi chos thams cad nyams par gyur cig / bdag slar yang snang bar ma gyur cig /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag sgrub par yang rdo mi thogs
368a6(mdo sde): par gyur cig / gal te sems can gang dag sred med kyi bu la dad pa rnams dang / sems can de dag gum nas ngan 'gror ltung ba'i bar du gyur na/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi
368a7(mdo sde): mdzad pa mtha' dag sgrub par rdo mi thogs par gyur cig / bdag byang chub thob nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dag na sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang /
368b1(mdo sde): lam ngan pas bcom zhing nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa'i sems can dag gum nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi mtshan ma ni 'di lags te/ sems
368b2(mdo sde): can de dag gi kha dog sa lta bur 'gyur ba dang / sha za'i gdong 'dra ba dang / bskyud ngas pa dang / dri mi bda' ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / nad rnam pa sna
368b3(mdo sde): tshogs kyis nyen pa dang / sems can de dag gi yo byad rnams kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ sems can de dag gi don du bdag de'i tshe na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi
368b4(mdo sde): gling bzhi pa ji snyed mchis par gyur pa'i gling bzhi pa thams cad du yongs su dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'bab cing ma'i mngal du skye ba ston par gyur cig / rgya cher bgyi na gzhon
368b5(mdo sde): nu rtse ba dang / bzo dang las kyi gnas dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / gling
368b6(mdo sde): bzhi ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag nye bar ston par yang gyur cig / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sku gdung 'god pa'i bar dag nye bar ston par
368b7(mdo sde): yang gyur cig / bdag byang chub thob nas kyang tshig gcig brjod pas chos ston par 'gyur zhing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gi sa ni nyan thos kyi theg
369a1(mdo sde): pa pa'i gtam gyi sde snod kyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni rang sangs rgyas
369a2(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam gyi chos bstan par

369a4(mdo sde): bde ba 'tshal ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig / gcig la gcig 'jig pa dang / rnyog pa'i sems dang /

369b3(mdo sde): cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pas chos ston par 'tshal par gyur cig / thos pa nyung ba rnams kyis ni bskyud pa ma mchis shing thos pa 'dzin pa chud mi za ba brjod pas chos bstan par

370a1(mdo sde): lags pa brjod pa'i chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig / lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu sbyangs pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni brten pa ma mchis pa brjod
370a2(mdo sde): pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig / de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dge ba'i sems brjod pa dang / dge ba mi bskyud pa rnams
370a3(mdo sde): kyis ni rnam par snang byed brjod pa dang / bdud kyi las la brtson pa rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid brjod pa dang / don dam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni mngon par

370a5(mdo sde): kyis ni rnam par ldog par brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po la ngo mtshar du rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni ldog pa brjod pa dang / 'khor bas skyo ba'i byang chub sems
370a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa dang / dge ba dang / sa dang / ye shes ma rtogs pa rnams kyis ni ma rmongs pa brjod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis
370a7(mdo sde): chog par 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni thos pa brjod pa dang / gcig la gcig sems mi mnyam pa rnams kyis ni 'od zer thogs pa me dpa brjod pa dang / las dga' ba la yang dag
370b1(mdo sde): par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni bya ba la 'jug pa brjod pa dang / 'khor gyis 'jigs par gyur pa rnams kyis ni seng ge'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang / bdud bzhis zil gyis non pa'i sems
370b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dpa' ba brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni 'od bkod pa brjod pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba
370b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni ri bo'i phung po brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang bas zil gyis non pa rnams kyis ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan brjod pa dang / shes rab chen po dang bral
370b4(mdo sde): ba rnams kyis ni sgron ma dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / gti mug gi mun par mchis pa rnams kyis ni nyi ma'i sgron ma brjod pa dang / zad pa'i nges pa'i tshig la brtson pa rnams kyis

370b7(mdo sde): shes pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni rdo rje'i snying po brjod pa dang / chos thams cad smon pa rnams kyis
371a1(mdo sde): ni rdo rje lta bu brjod pa dang / sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni spyod pa dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / dbang po mchog dang

371a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni dgon pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bskor bar 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni 'khor lo dri ma med pa

371a7(mdo sde): tshig dang sgra rab tu 'byed par rngo mi thogs pa rnams kyis ni so sor bsgrub pa brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi dbyings
371b1(mdo sde): rnam par 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la yang dang yang du 'jug pa rnams kyis ni brtan pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rab tu 'tshal

372a2(mdo sde): char rab tu 'bab pas chog ma 'tshal ba rnams kyi sa ni chos kyi sprin brjod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum rgyun chad par lta ba rnams kyis ni rin chen bkod pa brjod pa dang /

372a5(mdo sde): gyi rig pa mngon sum du bgyi ba'i dngos po brjod pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa rnams kyis ni rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul brjod pa dang / phyi ma'i
372a6(mdo sde): mtha'i bskal par chos kyi sgo gcig ston pa rnams kyis ni chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang / mdo sde thams cad la rnam par nges pa rnams kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin
372a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du rnam par nges par brjod pa dang / rnying par 'gyur ba dang / mthun pa'i chos drug yongs su spangs pa rnams kyis ni chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang / rnam
372b1(mdo sde): p ar thar pa'i sems kyi theg pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis ni mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba brjod pa par rtog pa rnams kyis ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa brjod pa
372b2(mdo sde): par rtog pa rnams kyis ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par mi brtson pa rnams kyis ni ye shes thob par brjod pa dang / nye du la
372b3(mdo sde): yang dag par ston pa rnams kyis ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni dbang bskur ba brjod pa dang /

372b5(mdo sde): chos ma 'dres pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mi 'phrogs pa brjod pa dang / mnyan pa dang lta ba don ma mchis pa rnams kyis ni smon lam brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
372b6(mdo sde): mngon sum du rjes su rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rgyun 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho dri ma med pa brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams

373a1(mdo sde): mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag g.yo ma mchis pa/ sgyu ma mchis pa/ drang ba drang ba'i
373a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin can te/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la tshig gcig brjod pas kyang chos kyi sgo
373a3(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gzungs bdun khri lnga stong po'i yon tan de dag rab tu 'god par gyur cig /des byang chub sems dpa'

373a5(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / byang chub kyi yon tan dam pas brgyan par gyur cig /'di lta ste/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan par gyur cig /ngag legs par
373a6(mdo sde): smras pas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig / ting nge 'dzin tshig ma mchis pa'i slad du thos pas
373a7(mdo sde): brgyan pa dang / gzungs bskyud pa ma mchis pa'i slad du dran pas brgyan pa dang / 'gro ba ngan pa khong du chud pa'i slad du yid kyis brgyan cing mya ngan las 'das pas brgyan pa dang /
373b1(mdo sde): dam pa bcas pa la brtan pa'i slad du bsam pas brgyan pa dang / dam bcas pa nyams su lon pa'i slad du sbyor bas brgyan pa dang / sa nas sar 'phar ba'i slad du lhag pa'i bsam
373b2(mdo sde): pas brgyan pa dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i slad du sbyin pas brgyan pa dang / legs par thos pa khong du chud pa dri ma mchis pa'i slad du tshul khrims kyis
373b3(mdo sde): brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis pa'i slad du bzod pas brgyan pa dang / tshogs thams cad nye bar bsags pa'i slad du brtson 'grus
373b4(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'i slad du bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags
373b5(mdo sde): yongs su 'tshal ba'i slad du shes rab kyis brgyan par gyur cig / sems can thams cad yang dag par skyob pa'i rjes su mchis pa'i slad du byams pas brgyan pa dang / sems
373b6(mdo sde): can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i slad du snying rjes brgyan pa dang / chos thams cad la the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i slad du dga' bas brgyan pa dang /
373b7(mdo sde): mthon dman gnyis dang bral ba'i slad du btang snyoms kyis brgyan pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba'i slad du mngon par shes pas brgyan pa dang /
374a1(mdo sde): longs spyod mi bas pa'i rin po che'i lag pa thob pa'i slad du bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mngon
374a2(mdo sde): par 'tshal ba'i slad du ye shes kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis chos rtogs par bgyi ba la mkhas pa'i slad du blos brgyan pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gi
374a3(mdo sde): snang ba thob pa'i slad du snang bas brgyan par gyur cig / don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i slad du so so yang dag par
374a4(mdo sde): rig pas brgyan par gyur cig / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i slad du mi 'jigs pas brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan
374a5(mdo sde): rjes su thob pa'i slad du yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i slad du chos kyis
374a6(mdo sde): brgyan par gyur cig / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du snang bas brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur ba'i slad du 'od kyis
374a7(mdo sde): brgyan pa dang / khyad par lung ston pa'i slad du kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su ston pa stsol ba'i slad du rjes su ston
374b1(mdo sde): pa'i cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
374b2(mdo sde): ba'i rjes su zhugs pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes thob pa'i slad du chos kyi dbang phyug
374b3(mdo sde): gis brgyan pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid cing thams cad kyis mi choms pa'i slad du dge ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan snying por bgyid pas brgyan par gyur
374b4(mdo sde): cig |theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag la'ang bdag gis tshig gcig brjod pas dge ba rnam par sbyong ba yang
374b5(mdo sde): dag par bsags pa chen pos yang dag par tshim par gyur cig / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i ye
374b6(mdo sde): shes thob par gyur cig / chos kyi snang ba chen po dang yang ldan par gyur cig /myur du bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang gyur cig
374b7(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po pa'i sems can gang dag
375a1(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i bar gyi nongs pa dang bcas pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig par gyur pa de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis
375a2(mdo sde): bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig / sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa/ rtsub pa/ sdig pa 'tshal ba/ khra khro dang / dmu rgod kyi rgyud can/ blo ldog pa kun
375a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i rgyud can de dag la'ang bdag gi sems dang skad brgyad khri bzhi stong dag ston par gyur cig / sems can le lo can gyi bar dag la'ang bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri
375a4(mdo sde): bzhi stong dag rgya cher ston par gyur cig / de na sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa chen por gyur pa de dag la'ang bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos rnams rgya cher
375a5(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher ston par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig /yang de na sems can gang
375a6(mdo sde): dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun cing bstan bcos la mngon par dga' bar ma gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gis
375a7(mdo sde): gsum la skyabs su mchi ba la 'god par 'gyur zhing / slad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la'ang sbyor bar gyur cig/ rnam par 'tshe ba la dga' ba rnams ni srog gcod pa
375b1(mdo sde): spong ba la 'god par gyur cig / 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams ni ma byin par len pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig /chos ma lags pa la 'dod pas chags pa rnams
375b2(mdo sde): ni 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig / phan tshun rdzun gyi tshig smra ba rnams ni brdzun du smra ba spong ba la 'god par gyur cig /myos par 'gyur ba la mngon par
375b3(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams ni chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig / sems can gang dag nongs pa lnga po thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag
375b4(mdo sde): ni nongs pa lnga po spong zhing dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la 'god pa gyur cig / sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag ni bdag gis nyin zhag gcig

375b6(mdo sde): bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nye bar sbyar bar bgyi zhing / rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bcu'i tshangs par spyod pa la 'god par gyur cig /sems can

377a1(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ram/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs nas gnas sam/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar dag
