380b5(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul 'di'ang ston par gyur cig /byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs
380b6(mdo sde): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang rgya chen po la mos par gyur cig /de dag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen
380b7(mdo sde): po bskyed par 'gyur zhing / de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su snyigs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi dge
381a1(mdo sde): ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rab tu 'dzin par gyur pa de lta bu'i smon lam yang 'debs par gyur cig / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
381a2(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa bdo ba'i rtsod pa'i dus su smon lam btab pa bzhin
381a3(mdo sde): byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du de lta bu'i lung bstan pas lung ston par gyur cig/
381a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag kyang sems can byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'di skad du yun ring po 'di srid cig na rgyal ba nyi
381a5(mdo sde): m a mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams kyi don de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna
381a6(mdo sde): tshogs dag dang / rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag mdzad de/ de'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pa dag gis nged cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
381a7(mdo sde): tu bskul nas/ nged cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pas dang po sems bskyed cing / pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag la brtson par
381b1(mdo sde): byas so zhes bdag gi sku gdung gi rnam par 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi tshul dag rgya cher ji ltar sngar smos pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur cig / de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul
381b2(mdo sde): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po lnga brgya po
381b3(mdo sde): de dag btab nas des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de ltar bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang / 'thab mo dang /
381b4(mdo sde): snyigs ma bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa na 'jig rten ldongs shing 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / lta ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mun par chud pa'i 'jig
381b5(mdo sde): rten na mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / sngar smos pa lta bu'i bar dag la bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / gal te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam
381b6(mdo sde): btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad sgrub par rngo thogs pa lta na byang chub kyi slad du smon pa spang bar mi bgyi zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang zhing gzhan du yongs su bsngo bar mi
381b7(mdo sde): bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ni bdag gi nges pa lags so/ /yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'tshal/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'ang mi 'tshal/ lha
382a1(mdo sde): dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid kyang mi 'tshal/ lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug kyang mi 'tshal/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyi longs spyod kyang mi
382a2(mdo sde): 'tshal/ lhar skye ba'ang mi 'tshal/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding du skye ba'ang mi 'tshal la dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan du yongs
382a3(mdo sde): su bsngo bar yang mi bgyid de/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye/ thos pas ni shes rab chen por
382a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bsgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs la/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos
382a5(mdo sde): pas ni re ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang bdag gis kyang spyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / thos
382a6(mdo sde): pa las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dag bsgrubs pas na/ gal te bdag gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/
382a7(mdo sde): de'i slad du bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba mnar med par rab tu rtsub cing drag pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i
382b1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi slad du bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba des de dag de nas ldang bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mi 'thob par gyur cig/
382b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur zhing mchog nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gyur cig /sems can de dag gi las kyi
382b3(mdo sde): 'bras bu yongs su ma bas par gyur na'ang de'i slad du bdag gum nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gi lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
382b4(mdo sde): snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang mi rtsol ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig / bdag gi lus re re'i tshad kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig /bdag gi lus re res kyang ji
382b5(mdo sde): ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig bu 'dis bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal bar gyur
382b6(mdo sde): cig / bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal ba ba'i sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa mi bzad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag myong bar gyur cig /da ltar phyogs
382b7(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na sems can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mnar med pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba'i
383a1(mdo sde): las yang dag par gsog par 'gyur ba rnams dang / sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar
383a2(mdo sde): dag 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu mtshams ma mchis pa'i las kyis 'phen par 'gyur ba'am/ kun
383a3(mdo sde): n as slong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi don du bdag las des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing bdag gi sems can
383a4(mdo sde): dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig / sems can de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las brgal
383a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid kyis bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
383a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las kun nas bslang ba dang / 'phangs pa dang / myong bar 'gyur
383a7(mdo sde): bar nges pas sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du tsha ba dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / ngu 'bod dang / bsdus gzhom dang / thig nag dang / yang
383b1(mdo sde): sos kyi bar dag la'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du dud 'gro sna tshogs dag la'ang brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten
383b2(mdo sde): la'ang brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin dbul po la'ang brjod par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du grul bum dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dag la'ang brjod
383b3(mdo sde): par bgyi'o/ /gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sems can rnams sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs
383b4(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du 'on pa dang / long pa dang / lce ma mchis pa dang / lag pa ma mchis pa dang / rkang pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa rab tu
383b5(mdo sde): nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du'ang bdag sems can dmyal ba mnar
383b6(mdo sde): med pa dag tu skye bar gyur cig / gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na/ 'khor bar sems can rnams yun
383b7(mdo sde): ring po ji srid du khams dang / skye mched dang / phung po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro
384a1(mdo sde): dang | yi dwags dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / srin po rnams su mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis de ltar
384a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur cig / ji ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i bar gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba
384a3(mdo sde): lta na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gi dpang du gyur cig / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
384a4(mdo sde): 'das dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis dpang du 'gyur zhing ye shes su 'gyur bar gyur cig /btsun pa
384a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag sgrub par rngo thogs shing bdag bskal ba bzang po la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na de
384a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ba lta na bdag bla na med pa yang dag
384a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du
384b1(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten sa dang nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa de dag thams cad mchi ma rab tu 'dzag bzhin du yan lag lngas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod
384b2(mdo sde): kyis dran pa zab mo thob pa dang / sems can zab mo rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang / smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa des sems
384b3(mdo sde): can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no/ /
384b4(mdo sde): ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i smon lam des na sems can rnams kyi sman dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du gyur par shes so/ /
384b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams sdug bsngal las rab tu thar bar bya ba'i smon lam btab pa de bzhin du khyod kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag
384b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par yang gyur cig / rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa nyid kyang du zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smras pa/ e ma'i mchog tu zab pa po//
384b7(mdo sde): khyod ni bde la mi gnas te/ /khyod ni sems can snying rje ldan/ /khyod ni bdag gi mtshon ma yin/ /de bzhin du sbyar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ sems can chags pa
385a1(mdo sde): pa dag la khyod ma chags/ /dbang po rta thul rnams las dbang rta thul/ /dbang po 'di rnams la ni dbang mdzad de/ /gzungs dang ye shes kyi ni mdzod
385a2(mdo sde): du 'gyur/ /de bzhin du sbyar te mthu chen thob kyis smras pa/ sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams/ /dge ba'i don du kun nas 'das pa dag /mchog tu dka' ba'i sdug
385a3(mdo sde): bsngal chen po yi/ /khyod ni snying rje la ni ngu bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ brtson 'grus ting 'dzin brtan pa dang / /mkhas pa dang ni shes rab
385a4(mdo sde): mchog / phreng ba dri dang byug pa yis/ /de phyir khyod la mchod par 'os/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras pa/ snying rje chen pos sems can la/ /de ltar khyod
385a5(mdo sde): kyis sbyin pa byin/ /khyod ni dus 'di zad nas kyang / /mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces
385a6(mdo sde): smras so/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba/ /de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas/ /khyod kyis sems can 'jigs med la/ /byang chub spyod pa dag kyang bstan/ /byang chub sems dpa'
385a7(mdo sde): rnam par snang byed shugs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ /sems can la brtse gzhan med de/ /gang phyir shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog /khyod ni yon
385b1(mdo sde): tan kun dang ldan/ /spos kyi seng ges smras pa/ khyod ni ma 'ongs dus na ni/ /bzang la nyon mongs bdud kyi tshe/ /sems can sdug bsngal sgrol byed cing / /khyod kyi grags dang snyan pa
385b2(mdo sde): 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ skye ba'i dgon par brtson gyur cing / /log sgyus shin tu nyam nga ba/ /sha za ba dang khrag 'thung ba'i/ /sems rgyud tshig
385b3(mdo sde): rnams bzung bar gyur/ /mi 'khrugs pas smras pa/ ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs chud cing / /nyon mongs 'dam du byin gyur la/ /mtshams med pa dag byed pa po/ /sems rgyud tshig rnams
385b4(mdo sde): bzung bar gyur/ /spos kyi glang pos smras pa/ khyod kyis ma 'ongs 'jigs mthong ba/ /ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /dam pa'i chos ni spong byed pa'i/ /sems rgyud tshig rnams
385b5(mdo sde): bzung bar gyur/ /rin po che tog gis smras pa/ ye shes tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang / /snying rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa po/ /'phags la skur ba 'debs byed pa/ /sems rgyud tshig rnams
385b6(mdo sde): bzung bar gyur/ /'jigs dang gdung bral gyis smras pa/ khyod kyis ngan song gsum lam du/ /sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong ba/ /chang ba stong 'drar gnas gyur pa/ /sems
385b7(mdo sde): rgyud tshig rnams bzung ba gyur/ /lag na ut+pa las smras pa/ khyod kyi snying rje ye shes dang / /brtson 'grus kyis ni 'khor ba bcom/ skye dang 'chi bas gzir gyur pa/ /sems rgyud
386a1(mdo sde): tshig rnams bzung bar gyur/ /ye shes grags pas smras pa/ nad mang dag gis nyen pa dang / /nyon mongs rlung gis ded pa dag /ye shes chu yis zhi
386a2(mdo sde): byas te/ /bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom/ /gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa/ ji ltar khyod ni nyi ma bzhin/ /nyon mongs dra ba rab bcom ste/ /nyon mongs zad cing rnam thar pa'i/ /
386a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtan pa nged la med/ /ut+pa la zla bas kyang smras pa/ ji ltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa yang dag mos/ /srid pa'i 'ching bas rab
386a4(mdo sde): bsdams pa/ /khams gsum po dag grol bar byed/ /dri med dbang pos smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi/ /snying rje chen po dag bstan pa/ snying rje'i rgyu las byung
386a5(mdo sde): ba po/ /khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs chen shugs 'chang gis kyang smras pa/ nyon mongs ldan pa'i rtsod dus tshe/ /byang chub gang dag khyod la rten/ /khyod kyis nyon
386a6(mdo sde): mongs brtsad nas bcad/ /smon lam brtan pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /skar ma skyong gis kyang smras pa/ ye shes mdzod dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /dri med smon lam btab pa yis/ /byang
386a7(mdo sde): chub spyod phyir sems can gyi/ /sman dang rten du khyod 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs yang dag par ston pa ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag
386b1(mdo sde): lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/ kye ma shes sgron sems can rnams/ /nyon mongs nad rnams rnam par bcom/ /khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can/ /sems can sdug bsngal
386b2(mdo sde): grol bar mdzad/ /rigs kyi bu/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang bcas pa dag gis kyang bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas thal mo
386b3(mdo sde): sbyar te don dang / tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas 'khod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs
386b4(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa dang / de nas de'i mod la sa cher g.yos par gyur cing phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas
386b5(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi sa'ang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ /'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ /kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ /ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg
386b6(mdo sde): cing / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur gyi bar du gyur nas yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
386b7(mdo sde): yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag tu'ang snang ba chen po byung bar gyur
387a1(mdo sde): cing me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog mnad ra ba dang / me tog mnad ra ba dang / mnad ra ba chen po dang / 'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi
387a2(mdo sde): me tog gi char de lta bu dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
387a3(mdo sde): d ag gi spyan snga na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sa g.yos pa de mthong nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa'
387a4(mdo sde): de dag gis 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing / me tog gi char chen po'ang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/
387a5(mdo sde): rkyen ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus so/ /yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed
387a6(mdo sde): 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bsags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che bsags pa de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
387a7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po chen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
387b1(mdo sde): gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po
387b2(mdo sde): che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de bzhin gshegs pa
387b3(mdo sde): rin chen zla ba la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po dag rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen
387b4(mdo sde): ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed
387b5(mdo sde): 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan
387b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i
387b7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
388a1(mdo sde): chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ /byang chub sems dpa'
388a2(mdo sde): rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston ba bshad pa dang / srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag gis byang chub tu smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
388a3(mdo sde): yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung ba'i bar gyi smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gis thams cad
388a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams med
388a5(mdo sde): pa byed cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dag dang 'grogs la/ sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig
388a6(mdo sde): pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de
388a7(mdo sde): b zhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar zhing 'dug
388b1(mdo sde): nas de'i bsngags pa'ang rjod par byed do/ /sems can chen po de'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to/ /gang gi
388b2(mdo sde): tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
388b3(mdo sde): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag g.yos shing me tog char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
388b4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges pa
388b5(mdo sde): bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi phyogs nas bsdu
388b6(mdo sde): bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin
388b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul dag bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa
389a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrugs bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs
389a2(mdo sde): su bzung ste/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su
389a3(mdo sde): bzung bar gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid
389a4(mdo sde): cig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni da gdod bla na med pa
389a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po
389a6(mdo sde): che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der deng la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa
389a7(mdo sde): med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'ang nyon cig / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs
389b1(mdo sde): pa rin chen zla ba skyes bu dam pa khyod la 'dri bar mdzad de/ /me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di'ang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar
389b2(mdo sde): sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sgras gang bar gyur te/ des na khyod kyis thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ming rab tu thob pa yin no/
389b3(mdo sde): /skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
389b4(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la'ang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa/ de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i
389b5(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu'ang / yang dang yang du khyod kyi
389b6(mdo sde): snyan pa dang grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
389b7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la
390a1(mdo sde): bkod par gyur te/ de la kha cig smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag
390a2(mdo sde): ni phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs
390a3(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid
390a4(mdo sde): thob cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ de dag khyod las brtsams nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang
390a5(mdo sde): smros shig / yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis kyis tshig mthun par gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ba/dag cag
390a6(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
390a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing / me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa
390b1(mdo sde): de'ang blta ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de'i dus
390b2(mdo sde): la dbab par shes na deng la/ der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'ang nyon
390b3(mdo sde): cig / rigs kyi bu/ de nas rin po che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba las me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa blangs te/ byang chub
390b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bsags pa nas 'phags nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ glog
390b5(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen bsags pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi dzam+bu'i tshal gyi
390b6(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal 'dir lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos
390b7(mdo sde): phyag btsal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na bram ze
391a1(mdo sde): la thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar cing bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems
391a2(mdo sde): d pa' de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i snying rje chen po dang
391a3(mdo sde): ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyir phyogs te/ bram ze la me tog phul nas 'di skad ces
391a4(mdo sde): smras so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod la
391a5(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba'ang spring ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa dag nas
391a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa dang / bram ze
391a7(mdo sde): la me tog bskur ba dang / yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba spring ba'ang ji ltar sngar smos ba bzhin no/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
391b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams pa gam gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba gam
391b2(mdo sde): g yis bsgyings pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng+ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
391b3(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to/ /'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
391b4(mdo sde): po gnyis la gcig ni ye shes rdo rje'i tog ces bya/ cig shos ni seng+ge rdo rje'i tog ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
391b5(mdo sde): seng+ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni
391b6(mdo sde): gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med/ grangs med pa gzhan dang
391b7(mdo sde): g zhan dag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lhags pa'i
392a1(mdo sde): bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /yang de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
392a2(mdo sde): phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul pa yangs
392a3(mdo sde): pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
392a4(mdo sde): par snang byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa seng+ge ltar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis
392a5(mdo sde): k yis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan la sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab pa ci las gyur ces don de yongs su zhus pa'i bar du'ang ji ltar
392a6(mdo sde): sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /yang de'i tshe na byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pa de na 'jig
392a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams ngur smrig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig theg pa
392b1(mdo sde): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
392b2(mdo sde): chen po gnyis la gcig ni mi g.yo brtan pa zhes bya/ cig shos ni shes rab 'dzin ces bya ste/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la/ btsun
392b3(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus pa'i bar du'ang ji
392b4(mdo sde): ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /yang de'i tshe na 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na 'jig rten
392b5(mdo sde): gyi khams gti mug mun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
392b6(mdo sde): la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyis chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig ni rnam par snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/ cig shos ni rnam
392b7(mdo sde): par snang byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /yang de'i tshe na steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis 'bum 'das
393a1(mdo sde): pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa
393a2(mdo sde): r nam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyi
393a3(mdo sde): chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis shig 'khod pa la gcig ni rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag
393a4(mdo sde): par 'khrugs pa zhes bya/ cig shos ni byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba ste/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis
393a5(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par
393a6(mdo sde): gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag
393a7(mdo sde): ' di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyis 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod
393b1(mdo sde): de| de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang zhing
393b2(mdo sde): yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam gyi yul bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
393b3(mdo sde): mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/ /de na byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa
393b4(mdo sde): des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par
393b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas
393b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
393b7(mdo sde): 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams med pa byed
394a1(mdo sde): cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la/ sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
394a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de gcig bu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
394a3(mdo sde): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa bya ba spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa
394a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa'ang rjod par byed do/ /sems can chen po de'ang bcom ldan 'das
394a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to/ /gang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo
394a6(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
394a7(mdo sde): dag gis chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos shing / 'gul ba dang / me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta
394b1(mdo sde): bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
394b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
394b3(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs
394b4(mdo sde): pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul bstan to/ / //bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu/
394b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa
394b6(mdo sde): dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis
394b7(mdo sde): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi
395a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur
395a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid cig
395a3(mdo sde): tu byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni
395a4(mdo sde): gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
395a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam
395a6(mdo sde): grangs de'ang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog der deng la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis
395a7(mdo sde): dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri bar mdzad de/ me tog zla ba ma dog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag
395b1(mdo sde): kyang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
395b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu sgras gang bar gyur cing / snying rje chen po'i sgra'ang rab tu thob pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de'i phyir na khyod ni theg pa chen po
395b3(mdo sde): l a yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la'ang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang
395b4(mdo sde): yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa/ de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal ba grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi
395b5(mdo sde): rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar
395b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dam pa/ de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag
395b7(mdo sde): p ar 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod
396a1(mdo sde): par gyur te/ de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su bzung
396a2(mdo sde): ba dag dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang snying rje'i 'od zer dag gis kun tu bkab par gyur to/ /gang dag khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
396a3(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa
396a4(mdo sde): s angs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs
396a5(mdo sde): rgyas nyid thob cing chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas khyod nyid las brtsams shing bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na/ skyes bu dam pa
396a6(mdo sde): khyod legs so/ /zhes kyang smros shig /yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
396a7(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
396b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis lags so zhes bgyi ba spring zhig /me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de'ang
396b2(mdo sde): blta ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas des bka' stsal pa/ rigs
396b3(mdo sde): kyi bu dag/ de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyed cag deng la der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos
396b4(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs de'ang nyon cig / rigs kyi bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par
396b5(mdo sde): r ab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de las me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa
396b6(mdo sde): d ag blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas
396b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di'i dzam+bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos tshal du lhags te phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ngo / /yang de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i
397a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i
397a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag dang / lha rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis 'di ltar yongs su gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i
397a3(mdo sde): tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi
397a4(mdo sde): bu rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis yongs su gang zhing khyab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i
397a5(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin
397a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams thal mo sbyar te bsngags pa brjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub
397a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis gang la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag
397b1(mdo sde): bskur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das
397b2(mdo sde): kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ bram ze de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag phul nas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog
397b3(mdo sde): rab rgyas kyis khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di bskur zhing / skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin te/ yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes
397b4(mdo sde): bya ba brjod pa'i bar du'ang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ /me tog gang yin pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu char bzhin du rab tu 'bab pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag
397b5(mdo sde): tu dge ba'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun gyis gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / snang ba'i sgra dang / pha
397b6(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gag
397b7(mdo sde): pa med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams pa chen po'i sgra dang / snying rje chen po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang / dbang
398a1(mdo sde): bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i sgra dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi sgra ste/ me tog gi char chen po de dag gis dge ba'i sgra de lta bus
398a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ chos zab mo la dbang thob pa/ gang dag
398a3(mdo sde): ' dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag tu lhags pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas sangs
398a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthu dang / smon lam gyi dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes
398a5(mdo sde): bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag nas dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag
398a6(mdo sde): rtogs 'dir lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
398a7(mdo sde): rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa byas shing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la'ang mchod pa byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir gnas ji lta bu thob par 'khod do/ /
398b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag gis mchod
398b2(mdo sde): pa byas te gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
398b3(mdo sde): rin po che'i snying po ting nge 'dzin glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin des thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog rin po che
398b4(mdo sde): sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur nas ri dang / shing ljon pa rnams dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / sa gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu snang ngo //
398b5(mdo sde): sems can gang dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kha cig ni ser po/ kha cig ni dkar po/ kha cig
398b6(mdo sde): ni btsod kha/ kha cig ni dmar po/ kha cig ni nag po/ kha cig ni skya bor gnas te/ kha cig gi lus ni rlung lta bur kun tu snang / kha cig ni me lta bur/ kha cig ni nam mkha'
398b7(mdo sde): lta bur/ kha cig ni smig rgyu lta bur/ kha cig ni chu lta bur/ kha cig ni ri lta bur/ kha cig ni tshangs pa lta bur/ kha cig ni brgya byin lta bur/ kha cig ni me tog lta bur/ kha cig
399a1(mdo sde): ni nam mkha' lding lta bur/ kha cig ni seng+ge lta bur/ kha cig ni nyi ma lta bur/ kha cig ni zla ba lta bur/ kha cig ni skar ma lta bur/ kha cig ni bya rgod
399a2(mdo sde): lta bu dang / kha cig ni wa lta bu dag tu kun tu snang ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su
399a3(mdo sde): kun tu snang ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de na sems can gang dag gis rang rang gi lus ji lta bur mthong ba de lta bur sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
399a4(mdo sde): snying po'i sku'ang mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po rin po che'i sna bdun
399a5(mdo sde): gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze ba la bzhugs bar mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de na sems can gang dag sa dang nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba'i sems
399a6(mdo sde): can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku'ang de ltar mthong ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug ste/ thugs
399a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag gcig bu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
399b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bram ze chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las yang
399b2(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa rnams la phan pa byed pa dang / 'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa yin te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /bram ze/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me
399b3(mdo sde): tog gi shing phun sum tshogs pa zhig kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / reg pa sna tshogs dang / 'dab ma sna tshogs dang / sdong bu sna tshogs dang / rtsa ba sna tshogs
399b4(mdo sde): dang / sman gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod do/ /de la me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni dpag tshad brgyar/ kha cig gis ni dpag tshad nyis brgyar/ kha cig gis ni
399b5(mdo sde): dpag tshad sum brgyar lhang nge lhan ner byed cing de bzhin du sbyar te/ de na me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang dris ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhang nge lhan
399b6(mdo sde): ner byed la/ de na sems can gang dag mig med pa de dag gis me tog de'i dri bsnams na ni mig dag thob par 'gyur/ 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna ba dag thob par 'gyur
399b7(mdo sde): yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyis ni yan lag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi po dag gis
400a1(mdo sde): gces par gyur pa de dag gis dri bsnams na ni nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag myos pa
400a2(mdo sde): dang / brgyal ba dang / smyos pa dang / rengs pa dang / sems rmugs pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis me tog de dag
400a3(mdo sde): gi dri bsnams na ni dran pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/ me tog gi shing de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po mkhrang ba/ sra ba/ rdo rje las grub pa/ 'jam pa/

400a5(mdo sde): yod pa gcig cig skyes par gyur la/ pad+ma dkar po de'i kha dog dang dris phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu
400a6(mdo sde): khyab cing lhang nge lhan ner 'gyur la/ bram ze/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi
400a7(mdo sde): gang dag lus mi mthun pa dang / nad kyis nyen pa dang / yan lag mthun pa dang / nad kyis nyen pa dang / yan lag nyams pa dang / myos pa dang / brgyal ba dang / myos pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / dran pa
400b1(mdo sde): rab tu nyams pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsnams na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
400b2(mdo sde): zhing dran pa'ang thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring po ma lon zhing lus ma zhig pa de dag gi ro la pad+ma
400b3(mdo sde): dkar po de'i 'od zer dag gis phog gam/ dris reg na ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang po 'thob par 'gyur zhing / yang phyis langs te mdza' bshes dang / snag gi
400b4(mdo sde): gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba
400b5(mdo sde): dang / gang dag yang de nas shi 'phos par 'gyur pa de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur la/ de dag der tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing yun
400b6(mdo sde): ring por gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na/ bram ze/ me tog gi shing de ji lta bar theg pa chen po'i
400b7(mdo sde): 'dus pa 'di'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba nye bar gnas pa'i dus na me tog de dag kha bye zhing rab tu rgyas bar gyur nas lhang nge lhan ne/
401a1(mdo sde): shing kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya/ kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur nas sems can mang po de dag gi nad sna tshogs rab
401a2(mdo sde): tu zhi bar byed pa de ltar ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa byung ba yin no/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i 'od zer dag gis me tog de dag kha
401a3(mdo sde): phye zhing lam me lhang nge lhan ner gyur nas/ nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar ni skyes bu dam pa nga 'jig rten du byung ste/
401a4(mdo sde): thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis sems can rnams la khyab par mdzad cing kha phye nas yang dang yang du sems can rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag
401a5(mdo sde): la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad pa dang / khyod kyis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
401a6(mdo sde): bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas nga la phul ba de dag thams cad kyis nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag yongs su bzung ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi
401a7(mdo sde): zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung / kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa dag yongs su bzung zhing / rang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas
401b1(mdo sde): kyang lung bstan pa yin no/ /skyes bu dam pa gang dag gis nga'i thad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ba de dag gis ni 'dul ba'i sems
401b2(mdo sde): can bsam pa dag pa/ gdul sla ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung bas na de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya
401b3(mdo sde): ste| de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni snying rje chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba dag la 'jug pa ma yin no/ /byang chub sems
401b4(mdo sde): dpa' de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 'tshol ba ma yin te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi
401b5(mdo sde): zhing yongs su dag pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni snying brtse ba spangs pa yin no/ /gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
401b6(mdo sde): kyi theg pa dag yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag ni ye shes dang / bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin no/ /gang dag
401b7(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas spangs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa/ bud med rnam par spangs pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i
402a1(mdo sde): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
402a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs
402a3(mdo sde): su spangs pa theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gis chos ston par gyur cig / bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang tshe ring por gyur te/ yun ring du gnas shing
402a4(mdo sde): bskal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang / gdul sla ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams la chos ston par gyur cig /ces smon lam
402a5(mdo sde): de lta bu 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni des na ye shes dang / bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa'ang ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
402a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs
402a7(mdo sde): kha dog du ma/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dag rab tu bkye'o/ /'od zer de dag tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i phyogs su dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
402b1(mdo sde): zhing rnams snang bar byas nas/ de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can de na mi rnams ni tshe lo bcu pa mdog ngan pa/
402b2(mdo sde): mi sdug pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste/ khrun ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam mo/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma la
402b3(mdo sde): dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i khrun yang rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang / mthe bo can gyi mi rnams kyi khru gsum dang /
402b4(mdo sde): sor bdun gyi tshad tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston to/ /rigs
402b5(mdo sde): kyi bu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / mi de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
402b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med pa
402b7(mdo sde): ' das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
403a1(mdo sde): d e| srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de
403a2(mdo sde): rab tu bkod do/ /sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
403a3(mdo sde): smon lam btab ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ngo / /kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa snyigs
403a4(mdo sde): ma lnga dang ldan pa dag yongs su bzung ngo / /de na sems can chen po des nga'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing
403a5(mdo sde): bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas nas/ der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
403a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya bar smon lam btab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs
403a7(mdo sde): pa des kyang nga la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de na gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
403b1(mdo sde): p a'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma lnga shin tu bdo zhing nyon mongs pa dang rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
403b2(mdo sde): su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyam nga
403b3(mdo sde): b ar zhugs pa dag smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na
403b4(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes pho nyan btang ste/ snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar
403b5(mdo sde): ming btags so/ /nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de da ltar 'jig
403b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des
403b7(mdo sde): mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ des dang po bla na med
404a1(mdo sde): p a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
404a2(mdo sde): p hyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir pho nya
404a3(mdo sde): dag btang ngo / /des dang po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod
404a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dgongs pa de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro/ /bram ze/ sangs rgyas
404a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba dag na sems can tshe ring ba/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs
404a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur
404a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyid thob nas sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe thung ngus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
404b1(mdo sde): mang po lhag par mdzad cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos ston pa la ltos/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing
404b2(mdo sde): shin tu ngan cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing
404b3(mdo sde): smon lam khyad par can btab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis sems can
404b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams
404b5(mdo sde): yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni me tog lta bu
404b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ste/ gang dag shin tu dul ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems
404b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no/ /bram ze/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
405a1(mdo sde): par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan
405a2(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
405a3(mdo sde): kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/ des ni byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams zhes bya'i/ pad+ma dkar po lta bu'ang ma yin la sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang
405a4(mdo sde): mi bya ste/ bram ze/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
405a5(mdo sde): ma dag pa yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs su
405a6(mdo sde): bzung ba lta bu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
405a7(mdo sde): yongs su ma dag par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas
405b1(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi thung ba zhig bar mar sgrub par
405b2(mdo sde): smon pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems
405b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dkar po lta bu rnams zhes bya'i/ me tog lta bu rnams zhes mi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes
405b4(mdo sde): kyang bya'o/ /bram ze/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med
405b5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi nang du dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying rje pad+ma dkar po lta bur skyes pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas mtshams med pa byed pa
405b6(mdo sde): dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs
405b7(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ pho nya dag
406a1(mdo sde): kyang btang nas khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la mchod pa'i
406a2(mdo sde): las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig 'das nas lhag
406a3(mdo sde): m a bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing
406a4(mdo sde): rga ba dang / 'chi ba mang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jig rten ldongs pa/ 'dren pa med pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing / sems can lam ngan
406a5(mdo sde): pas bcom pa/ nyam nga ba chen po thob pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nas
406a6(mdo sde): j i skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur
406a7(mdo sde): te| 'gro ba'i 'khor lo ni bzlog / chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor/ dbang sgyur ba'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcil te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
406b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu sgras khyab par byas nas/ khyod kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang lhan

409a3(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar yang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
409a4(mdo sde): phrag dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bdag gi
409a5(mdo sde): mdun du slong mo pa gang dag mchis nas zas slong bar bgyid cing tshig 'jam po'am/ tshig rtsub po'am/ brnyas pa'i tshig gam/ tshig gsal bas slong
409a6(mdo sde): bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gis slong mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems
409a7(mdo sde): bskyed par gyur tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas sbyin pa rtsol par gyur na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs
409b1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa gzhan dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gis bslus par gyur cig / bdag kyang bla na med pa

409b3(mdo sde): pas sbyin pa stsol tam/ sbyin pa de'ang len pa po la ma dad pas byin par 'gyur zhing chud za bar 'gyur ram/ gal te tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig dge
409b4(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig / gal te skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig
409b5(mdo sde): len pa po'i dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na bdag kyang mnar med par mchi bar gyur cig / zas la ji lta ba de bzhin du slong mo pa gang dag bdag
409b6(mdo sde): la gos dang / mgo'i bar dag slong bar 'gyur zhing tshig 'jam po'am/ tshig rtsub po'am/ brnyas tshig gam/ tshig gsal bas ma go'i bar dag slong bar bgyid na/
409b7(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag gis slong mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems
410a1(mdo sde): bskyed par gyur tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas mgo bo'i bar dag yongs su gtong bar gyur na/ bdag gis
410a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag mnar med par mchi ba'i bar du gyur cig /sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims
410a3(mdo sde): nas shes rab kyi bar dag yongs su gtong ba la'ang brjod par bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des byang chub sems
410a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i sems kyis
410a5(mdo sde): smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang /
410a6(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang thal mo sbyar te 'khor nas de la legs so zhes bya ba yin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la
410a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i yid kyis smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod ni snying por 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i chos drug gis
410b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar sbyin pa len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed des smon
410b2(mdo sde): lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam btab bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
410b3(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa des ji ltar 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed kyis smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam de lta bu dag btab
410b4(mdo sde): pa thos pa dang / de nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bltas
410b5(mdo sde): te mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis smras pa/ a la la bdag chos kyi mu ge dang / zad pa'i dus dang / nyon mongs pa chen pos dkrugs shing rtsod pa'i dus na snyigs ma
410b6(mdo sde): lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi mgon med pa'i ded dpon dang / snang ba byed pa dang / sgron ma byed pa dang / byis pa skyabs med pa dang / ldongs pa rnams kyi lam ston par

411a1(mdo sde): dang / lce dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang / khrag dang / kha zas kyi bar dag len par 'gyur zhing / bla na med
411a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub kyis spyod pa'i grogs byed pa de lta bu dag rnyed pa ni ngo mtshar to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
411a3(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshe rabs gzhan gyi bskal pa bye ba khrag
411a4(mdo sde): k hrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag nas byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du bdag gi drung du slong mo pa gang dag nye bar mchis par 'gyur zhing
411a5(mdo sde): yun ring po de srid kyi bar du zas sam/ skom dag blangs par gyur pa dang / bdag gis sug pa nas tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam gyi sbyin pa blangs par gyur pa'i sems

411b1(mdo sde): bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

411b7(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang
412a1(mdo sde): dag mtho zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur cing / lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po lha ma
412a2(mdo sde): med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs so/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ye tog rtul phal byang chub dbang phyur yang dag mtho
412a3(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ni lo stong du gnas par gyur to/ /dam pa'i chos nub nas dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang lo stong

412a7(mdo sde): dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang / yo byad gcod

413a2(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'god par 'gyur
413a3(mdo sde): ba'am/ tha na dge ba'i rtsa ba skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam la sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag las sems can 'ga' tsam zhig zhig bdag gis theg pa gsum

413b1(mdo sde): mchog gsum la 'khrul par gyur cing / nongs pa dang bcas par gyur pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag skad cig gcig tsam

416a2(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyi zhu ba bzang po spobs pa dge ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta

416a6(mdo sde): de la gnas pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rjes su zhugs pa yin no/ /rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ des ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag
416a7(mdo sde): rgyas 'debs par byed do/ /seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ de la gnas nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse bar byed do/ /zla ba
416b1(mdo sde): bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed do/ /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan to gces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal
