460b7(mdo sde): byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni de lta de ltar go skabs yangs pa yin no/ /de bzhin
461a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yang 'di ltar rgya che ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ni sus
461a2(mdo sde): kyang tshad gzung ba'am bgrang bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'ang rgya che ba yin te/ de bzhin
461a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'ang rgya che ba yin te/ de'i spyi
461a4(mdo sde): gtsug blta ba'am sku'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /gal te de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa 'di
461a5(mdo sde): dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i khong du zhugs par gyur cing de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar gyur tam/ sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa
461a6(mdo sde): d a'i spu'i sgo gcig tu zhugs shing 'byung bar gyur kyang de dag gis cher na lha'i mig gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i sgo gcig gi mtha' yang bri ba'am gang
461a7(mdo sde): bar tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i sku ni de ltar rgya che ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
461b1(mdo sde): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po ji snyed pa dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar nga'i sangs
461b2(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing mi mjed bzhin du sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du zhugs par gyur kyang
461b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
461b4(mdo sde): bskyed pa na smon lam de lta bu btab pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed dag lta zhog gi /rigs kyi bu dag /gal te phyogs
461b5(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed po de ltar rgya che ba dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed bzhin du sems can rnams kyi yongs
461b6(mdo sde): su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du zhugs par gyur kyang de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de
461b7(mdo sde): b zhin gshegs pa des sngon dang po sems bskyed pa na bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam de lta bu btab pas na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni
462a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni ji skad smos pa'i chos bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin
462a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyod kyis me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag long la nub phyogs logs su
462a3(mdo sde): rang rang gis ji ltar mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der dengs shig / nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la snyun mi mnga'am thugs bde'am zhes
462a4(mdo sde): kyang snyun gsol cig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa'
462a5(mdo sde): gsang bsgrags dang / byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i 'od zer la byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas khyed cag
462a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du dengs shig / de na srog chags nyi khris kyang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus
462a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi lags so/ /de bzhin
462b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dengs shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid
462b2(mdo sde): yon tan rgyal po de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' gsang bsgrags dang / snang ba'i 'od zer de gnyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan cig
462b3(mdo sde): 'grogs te 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin te bya rgod kyi phung
462b4(mdo sde): po'i ri la so sor 'khod nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom
462b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang chig 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bgyi ba
462b6(mdo sde): mchis te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs
462b7(mdo sde): l a de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa sgrogs shing 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho
463a1(mdo sde): zhing gzhes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ des nga thams
463a2(mdo sde): cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so/ /de'i tshig gis ngas bla na
463a3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des nga dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzhag pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs
463a4(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa de ni chos bzhi po de dag gis khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag de skad du gsungs te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs
463a5(mdo sde): pa des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'am/ thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol lags so/ /de
463a6(mdo sde): b zhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i gdan yang g.yos shing byang chub sems dpa' gang dag der 'dus par
463a7(mdo sde): gyur pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i gdan g.yos par mthong ste/ yongs su zhus pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar de
463b1(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o/ /de'i tshe na shar phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag de bzhin
463b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongs su zhu ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med
463b3(mdo sde): pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang / sangs rgyas
463b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing yongs su bsgrags pa dag mthar phyin ma thag tu'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis lho phyogs logs kyi yongs su bsgrags pa brtsams te/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas sangs rgyas
463b5(mdo sde): k yi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa
463b6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de'ang sngon byang chub
463b7(mdo sde): s ems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas ji skad sngar smon pa'i bar
464a1(mdo sde): dag bzhin no/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dzam+bu'i 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug rnam sgrogs zhes bya ba dang / sangs
464a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing lhun po rab gnas zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyug sA la'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan dbang po'i ba gam zhes
464a3(mdo sde): bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge bsgyings pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu gzhir bkod ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bus rnam par
464a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od 'gyed yang dag bsags zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsgyings pa yang dag bsags zhes bya ba
464a5(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing lha'i zla ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsan+dan gyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs
464a6(mdo sde): pa rgyu skar chog grags pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri mchog ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs
464a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rtog pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtsod med ces bya
464b1(mdo sde): bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i thig pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zla bsgrags zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbang phyug 'od ces
464b2(mdo sde): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen khyu mchog
464b3(mdo sde): ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rin chen ngos zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen ljon shing 'bras bu dpag med rin po che zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs
464b4(mdo sde): pa chos sprin sgra dbyangs dbang phyug zla ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi gdan dag
464b5(mdo sde): g.yos shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsngags pa dang / snyan pa dang / grags pa brjod par mdzad pa da
464b6(mdo sde): d e'i tshe na lho phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa'i dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongs su zhu
464b7(mdo sde): dang / chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags pa'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin
465a1(mdo sde): du sbyar ro/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
465a2(mdo sde): k hrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing blo gros nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba
465a3(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'ang nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing spyad pa spyod pa na ngas thams cad
465a4(mdo sde): kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
465a5(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mkhyen mdzod ces bya ba dang / pa bla grags pa
465a6(mdo sde): dang / kun tu snying po dang / tshangs pa'i me tog dang / sku mchog rnam par gnon dang / chos kyi shugs kyi sgron ma dang / lhun po phrag med pa sgra dbyangs rnam par
465a7(mdo sde): grags pa'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po dbyangs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa gang dag gi
465b1(mdo sde): mtshan dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas yongs su bsgrags pa de dag gi gdan dag g.yos shing / de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas sangs rgyas kyi pho nya byang chub sems
465b2(mdo sde): dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags shing
465b3(mdo sde): 'khod pa'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng dang / de bzhin du 'og dang / de bzhin du shar lho dang / de bzhin du
465b4(mdo sde): lho nub dang / de bzhin du nub byang dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs rnams su'ang snga ma bzhin du sbyar te brjod par bya'o/ /yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka'
465b5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na sangs
465b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de
465b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
466a1(mdo sde): byang chub dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas/ thams cad kyi dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
466a2(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag gi thad du phul nas der dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo/ /gang gi tshe de'i mtshan yongs
466a3(mdo sde): su bsgrags pa de'i tshe gdan g.yos pa nas kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / dad pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra skad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis
466a4(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de bzhin du mthong zhing chos kyang thos so zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro/ /'khor de na byang chub sems dpa'
466a5(mdo sde): gnyis la gcig 'khrugs med rtse mo zhes bya ba dang / gcig shos ni sangs rgyas yang dag 'dod ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags
466a6(mdo sde): pa rnam thos kyi bu snga la'i rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rigs kyi bu dang / khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du
466a7(mdo sde): de nga la nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la snyun mi mnga'am/ thugs 'dod bde ba 'jog pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol cig /de gnyis kyis
466b1(mdo sde): gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa dang nam mkha' thams cad yang dag par rjes su mthong
466b2(mdo sde): ste/ de na sa dang nam mkha' la sems can 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang ma mchis na/ bdag cag gang du gnas par bgyi lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa/ rigs
466b3(mdo sde): kyi bu dag / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na go skabs med do zhes de skad ma zer cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon
466b4(mdo sde): tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis go skabs yangs pa yin te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pa las brtsams te chos
466b5(mdo sde): ston par mdzad pa dang / bslab pa gsum gyi sdom pa ston par mdzad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag ston par mdzad pa dang / sems can rnams ngan song
466b6(mdo sde): gsum po dag las 'dren par mdzad pa dang / zhi ba'i lam gsum po dag la rab tu 'god par mdzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thugs rje dang bstan pa la 'jug pa
466b7(mdo sde): ni yangs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa'i dus shig na/ 'dul ba'i sems
467a1(mdo sde): c an la gzigs shing ri brag mi mnyam pa'i dbus na gnod sbyin dbang po'i mi gces bya ba'i gnas shing sA la'i phug na rnam par grol ba'i
467a2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / bde ba nyams su myong zhing skyil mo krung gcig gi zhag bdun 'da' bar mdzad cing bzhugs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sA la'i phug thams
467a3(mdo sde): cad khyab par gyur te/ de na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab par ma gyur pa'i go skabs ni tha na sor bzhi tsam gyi gtos kyang med do/ /zhag bdun po de 'das
467a4(mdo sde): pa dang / phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur
467a5(mdo sde): bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi ri de gang yin pa de logs su mngon du phyogs te 'khod pa dang zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
467a6(mdo sde): t hub pa de ni ji skad smros pa'i chos bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa
467a7(mdo sde): bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dag /khyed kyis me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag long la/ lho nub kyi phyogs logs su rang rang gis ji ltar mthong ba'i sangs
467b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der dengs shig / nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la snyun mi mnga'am/ thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol cig /de nas de bzhin
467b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sA la'i rgyal po des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug
467b3(mdo sde): med rtse mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yang dag 'dod la byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas khyed
467b4(mdo sde): cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du dengs shig / de na srog chags nyi khris kyang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus
467b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchis lags so/ /de bzhin
467b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dengs shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis
467b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan cig 'grogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba de nas 'phags pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi
468a1(mdo sde): zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin te bya rgod phung po'i ri la so sor 'khod do/ /'khod nas kyang de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
468a2(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs logs su zhes bya ba nas de bzhin
468a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing / bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs bde'am zhes kyang snyun gsol
468a4(mdo sde): lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'joms pa'i gdan yang g.yos
468a5(mdo sde): te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'joms pa'i gdan g.yos pa mthong ste/ de
468a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de la yongs su zhus pa nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po
468a7(mdo sde): dang / rnam par gnon pa chen po'i 'od zer dang / pad+ma dam pa dang / tsan+dan dang / lhun po'i rgyal po dang / rgya mtsho dang / skar ma'i snying po dang / rnam par gnon pa'i ye
468b1(mdo sde): shes dang / byang shar gyi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i bar dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la
468b2(mdo sde): yongs su zhu ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi
468b3(mdo sde): zhing mi mjed 'dir lhag pa dang / de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'dus pa de
468b4(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyi sems can re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzed thams cad de lta bu'i sems can dag gis kyang khyab par gyur to/ /
468b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sa dang nam mkha' thams cad sems can de dag gis khyab par gyur te/ gang du sems can dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa go skabs ni tha
468b6(mdo sde): na mig sman gyi thur ma gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang med do/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mthong ba ma gtogs par nam
468b7(mdo sde): mkha' stong pa mthong du zad kyi gcig gis gcig ma mthong ngo / /de dag gi mig gi lam du ri rab dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / ri rnams kyang snang bar ma
469a1(mdo sde): gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar dag kyang mi snang / lha'i gzhal med khang rnams kyang mi snang ste/ 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo la thug pa'i bar dang /
469a2(mdo sde): de'i steng gi sa gzhi'ang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' khyab chos sel shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs pa
469a3(mdo sde): dang / des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i sgo thams cad du zhugs te/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi khongs
469a4(mdo sde): su chud par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo / /sems can de dag gi sems las byung ba dag kyang gzugs la kun tu lta ba'i yid la
469a5(mdo sde): byed pa dang bral zhing de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i sgo 'ba' zhig tu nges par rtogs te/ der yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'jig rten gyi khyams bde ba can gyi skyed mos
469a6(mdo sde): tshal lta bur rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dang / lo ma sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i skyed mos tshal dag mthong ngo / /shing ljon
469a7(mdo sde): pa bcos bu sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dpung rgyan dang / mu tig gi chun po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de
469b1(mdo sde): dag mthong ba dang / sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag skyed mos tshal de ltar 'dong ngo snyam nas/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi khongs su chud par
469b2(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams dang / gzugs
469b3(mdo sde): med pa na spyod pa rnams ma gtogs par sems can lhag ma thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i sgo dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du zhugs par gyur to/ /
469b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag slar bsdus te bzhengs pa dang / de nas sems can de dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
469b5(mdo sde): thub pa ga la bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ kye sems can dag /bdag cag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs par
469b6(mdo sde): shes bzhin gyis soms shig / de nas sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyi nang bcas par mthong zhing ji ltar bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i
469b7(mdo sde): sku'i khong par zhugs te 'dug par gyur pa rang rang gi mngon sum du gyur nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs
470a1(mdo sde): shing sus 'dir bcug snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la sgras mngon par go bar
470a2(mdo sde): byas te smras pa/ khyed cag nyon cig /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul yin te/ gang gi phyir bdag cag la phan par
470a3(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i ston pas chos ston par mdzad kyi/ de'i phyir khyed cag sems can thams cad kyis soms shig /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis
470a4(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad bstan to/ /de la bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba'i
470a5(mdo sde): 'dam las bsgral ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang
470a6(mdo sde): byung gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la bsam gtan la gzud pa'i sems bskyed pa yongs su bsngo ba rnam pa bcu ste/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i dngos
470a7(mdo sde): po yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems kyis gnas pa dang / sems can ma brgal ba brnams bsgral ba'i phyir gru chen
470b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir ma grol ba dgral ba'i go cha dang / chos la bdag med par so sor
470b2(mdo sde): brtag pa'i phyir seng+ge'i sgra chen pos mi sgra pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mi g.yor lta bur rtogs pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams
470b3(mdo sde): cad du 'gro ba'i go cha dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa la gnas pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas brgyan par byed pa'i go cha dang / pha
470b4(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su sgrub pa'i go cha dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i phyir mi
470b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa'i go cha dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ji ltar thos pa'i chos bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ma
470b6(mdo sde): lus par thob pa'i go cha dang / spros pa med pa ste/ de dag ni bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad la gzud pa rnam pa bcu'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i sgo yongs su shes pa
470b7(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i spyod pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med par yid la byed pa dang / sems skyes ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par rtogs pa gang yin pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa
471a1(mdo sde): yin te/ de la ni 'jug pa dang / ldog pa chad cing rtag pa med pa dang / gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
471a2(mdo sde): b shad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs pa'i sems can gang+gA'i klung dud phyur phrag brgyad kyi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
471a3(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed po de dag gis ni gzungs dang bzod pa rnam pa sna
471a4(mdo sde): tshogs thob par gyur nas/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spu'i sgo dag nas phyir thon pa dang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
471a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sku'i tshad brtag pa'i phyir phyogs bcur rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dong ngo / /de
471a6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shar phyogs logs su dong ba dang / shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'das kyang de bzhin
471a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni nyams pa med cing der yang tshig dang / don dang / yig 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra dag de bzhin du thos te/
471b1(mdo sde): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga na 'dug pa'i chos thos pa de bzhin du de'i chos thos so/ /gzhan yang de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku'ang skye
471b2(mdo sde): ba'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dag gis khyab par snang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spu'i
471b3(mdo sde): sgo gcig na'ang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'jug cing 'byung bar snang ngo / /de bzhin du spu'i sgo gnyis pa nas spu'i sgo thams cad kyi
471b4(mdo sde): bar dag tu'ang 'jug cing 'byung bar snang ste/ phyogs bcu'i bar du'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i khong par
471b5(mdo sde): zhugs par gyur pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i spu'i sgo dag nas phyir 'thon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal de/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
471b6(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la don dang / tshig dang / yi ge dang / 'bru dang / sgra dang / brjod pa sna tshogs dag gis bstod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na
471b7(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /de nas de'i mod la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs kyi char dag rab tu phab ste/
472a1(mdo sde): lha'i sil snyan dag kyang rab tu gsil nas lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / na bza' dang / ras bcos bu dang / rgyan dag
472a2(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med yang dag 'dren ces bya ba des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
472a3(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lung bstan pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags/ bcom
472a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po pa zhes bya ba dang / mang po 'dus
472a5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lam du sgrol ba zhes bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rtog pa la 'jug pa zhes bya
472a6(mdo sde): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang / rgya mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba dang / bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / snying rje pad+ma dkar po zhes
472a7(mdo sde): kyang bya'o/ /yang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang
472b1(mdo sde): klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags/
472b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ ngas de'i bsod nams sngar yang smras te/ de yang mdor bsdus te brjod par bya'o/ /gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang /
472b3(mdo sde): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa dang / gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya
472b4(mdo sde): pa tha ma na tha na bris te 'chang bar byed na de bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bskal pa chen po chen bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyin
472b5(mdo sde): pa drug la spyod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge
472b6(mdo sde): sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / klu dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / mi'am ci dang / lha ma yin rnams dang
472b7(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sdang ba'i sems rab tu dang bar bya ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad nye
473a1(mdo sde): bar zhi bar bya ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / dus ma yin pa'i char pa dang / 'chi ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / mu ge thams
473a2(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bde bar bya ba dang / lo legs par bya ba dang / nad med pa tshogs par bya ba dang / skrag pa rnams 'jigs pa med pa cing bde bar bya ba dang /
473a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum po
473a4(mdo sde): dag gi lam yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa thob par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba dang / rdo rje'i
473a5(mdo sde): gdan la 'dug par bya ba dang / bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba
473a6(mdo sde): dang / 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan par bya ba dang / 'khor mang por bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i grong khyer gyi
473a7(mdo sde): gnas su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i lag tu gtad pa dang / su zhig lnga brgya tha ma la nga'i
473b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar 'gyur zhing / chos ma yin pa lhur len pa'i sems can rnams dang / tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong rnams kyi rna lam du sgrogs par
473b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ chos ma yin pa la chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams dang / 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams dang / chos log pas yongs su dkris pa rnams dang / sems
473b3(mdo sde): can yongs su ma smin pa rnams kun tu skyo ba med par 'gyur zhig gu snyam du dgongs pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi yongs su rtog
473b4(mdo sde): pa sems kyis shes nas 'khor de na gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po zhes bya ba zhig kyang 'dug go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
473b5(mdo sde): pas gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po de khrid nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ drang srong chen po khyod kyis chos
473b6(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung la/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan du song ba'i bar dag gi rna lam du sgrogs shig /de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i
473b7(mdo sde): sems bskyed du chug cig / gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag smon lam gyis bskal ba chen po brgyad cu rtsa
474a1(mdo sde): bzhi 'das pa nas gnod sbyin gyi drang srong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag gis sems can bgrang
474a2(mdo sde): ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag la rab tu bkod cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la'ang rab tu bkod lags te/ bdag gis sems can
474a3(mdo sde): gang dag lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / gang dag 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam gyi bar dag 'dzin par bgyid pa de
474a4(mdo sde): dag kyang bdag nyid kyis yongs su smin par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang
474a5(mdo sde): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa snying rje pad+ma dkar po
474a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de
474a7(mdo sde): ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //
